children.text: tasya hareḥ pada-kamalaṃ vande caitanya-devasya || RBhrs_1,1.2 ||
sphuratu sanātana suciraṃ tava bhakti-rasāmṛtāmbhodhiḥ || RBhrs_1,1.5 ||
ajñenāpi mayāsya kriyate suhṛdām pramodāya || RBhrs_1,1.6 ||
catvārah khalu vakṣyante bhāgāḥ pūrvādayaḥ kramāt || RBhrs_1,1.7 ||
bhāvāśritā tṛtīyā ca turyā prema-nirūpikā || RBhrs_1,1.9 ||
tatrādau suṣṭhu vaiśiṣṭyam asyāḥ kathayituṃ sphuṭam |
lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate bhakter uttamāyāḥ satāṃ matam || RBhrs_1,1.10 ||
ahaituky avyavahitā yā bhaktiḥ puruṣottame || RBhrs_1,1.13 ||
dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ || RBhrs_1,1.14 ||
sa eva bhakti-yogākhya ātyantika udāhṛtaḥ || RBhrs_1,1.15 ||
kleśās tu pāpaṃ tad-bījam avidyā ceti te tridhā || RBhrs_1,1.18 ||
aprārabdhaṃ bhavet pāpaṃ prārabdhaṃ ceti tad dvidhā || RBhrs_1,1.19 ||
kutaḥ punas te bhagavan nu darśanāt || RBhrs_1,1.21 ||
durjāty-ārambhakaṃ pāpaṃ yat syāt prārabdham eva tat || RBhrs_1,1.22 ||
sroto-gaṇās tam araṇaṃ bhaja vāsudevam || RBhrs_1,1.25 ||
avidyāṃ nirdahaty āśu dāva-jvāleva pannagīm || RBhrs_1,1.26 ||
sadguṇāḥ sukham ity-ādīny ākhyātāni manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_1,1.27 ||
yenārcito haris tena tarpitāni jaganty api |
rajyanti jantavas tatra jangamāḥ sthāvarā api || RBhrs_1,1.28 ||
sukhaṃ vaiṣayikaṃ brāhmam aiśvaraṃ ceti tat tridhā || RBhrs_1,1.30 ||
siddhayaḥ paramāścaryā bhuktir muktiś ca śāśvatī |
nityaṃ ca paramānando bhaved govinda-bhaktitaḥ || RBhrs_1,1.31 ||
bhūyo 'pi yāce deveśa tvayi bhaktir dṛḍhāstu me |
yā mokṣānta-caturvarga phaladā sukhadā latā || RBhrs_1,1.32 ||
puruṣārthās tu catvārās tṛṇāyante samantataḥ || RBhrs_1,1.33 ||

yathā śrī-nārada-pañcarātre--
hari-bhakti-mahā-devyāḥ sarvā mukty-ādi-siddhayaḥ |
bhuktyaś cādbhutās tasyāś ceṭikāvad anuvratāḥ || RBhrs_1,1.34 || iti |
hariṇā cāśvadeyeti dvidhā sā syāt sudurlabhā || RBhrs_1,1.35 ||
rājan patir gurur alaṃ bhavatāṃ yadūnāṃ
daivaṃ priyaḥ kula-patiḥ kva ca kiṅkaro vaḥ |
astv evam aṅga bhajatāṃ bhagavān mukundo
muktiṃ dadāti karhicit sma na bhakti-yogam || RBhrs_1,1.37 ||
sukhāni goṣpadāyante brāhmāṇy api jagad-guro || RBhrs_1,1.39 ||
kurvanti kṛtinaḥ kecit catur-vargaṃ tṛṇopamam || RBhrs_1,1.40 ||
na sādhyati mām yogo na sāṅkhyaṃ dharma uddhava |
na svādhyāyas tapas tyāgo yathā bhaktir mamorjitā || RBhrs_1,1.42 ||
dviśaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padair etan māhātyaṃ parikīrtitam || RBhrs_1,1.44 ||
yuktis tu kevalā naiva yad asyā apratiṣṭhatā || RBhrs_1,1.45 ||

iti śrī śrī bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau
pūrva-bhāge bhakti-sāmānya laharī prathamā
sā bhaktiḥ sādhanaṃ bhāvaḥ premā ceti tridhoditā || RBhrs_1,2.1 ||
nitya-siddhasya bhāvasya prākaṭyaṃ hṛdi sādhyatā || RBhrs_1,2.2 ||
sā bhaktiḥ saptama-skandhe bhaṅgyā devarṣiṇoditā || RBhrs_1,2.3 ||

yathā saptame (7.1.31)--
tasmāt kenāpy upāyena manaḥ kṛṣṇe niveśayet || RBhrs_1,2.4 || iti |
vaidhī rāgānugā ceti sā dvidhā sādhanābhidhā || RBhrs_1,2.5 ||
śāsanenaiva śāstrasya sā vaidhī bhaktir ucyate || RBhrs_1,2.6 ||
tasmād bhārata sarvātmā bhagavān īśvaro hariḥ |
śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaś ca smartavyaś cecchatābhayam || RBhrs_1,2.7 ||
smartavyaḥ satataṃ viṣṇur vismartavyo na jātucit |
sarve vidhi-niṣedhāḥ syur etayor eva kiṅkarāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.8 ||
ity asau syād vidhir nityaḥ sarva-varṇāśramādiṣu |
catvāro jajñire varṇā guṇair viprādayaḥ pṛthak || RBhrs_1,2.10 ||
ya eṣāṃ puruṣaṃ sākṣād ātma-prabhavam īśvaram |
na bhajanty avajānanti sthānād bhraṣṭāḥ patanty adhaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.11 ||
arcann ubhyataḥ siddhiṃ matto vindaty abhīpsitām || RBhrs_1,2.12 ||
surarṣe vihitā śāstre harim uddiśya yā kriyā |
saiva bhaktir iti proktā tayā bhaktiḥ parā bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.13 ||
nātisakto na vairāgya-bhāg asyām adhikāry asau || RBhrs_1,2.14 ||
na nirviṇṇo nātisakto bhakti-yogo 'sya siddhidaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.15 ||
uttamo madhyamaś ca syāt kaniṣṭhaś ceti sa tridhā || RBhrs_1,2.16 ||
śāstre yuktau ca nipuṇaḥ sarvathā dṛḍha-niścayaḥ |
prauḍha-śraddho 'dhikārī yaḥ sa bhaktāv uttamo mataḥ || RBhrs_1,2.17 ||
yaḥ śāstrādiṣv anipuṇaḥ śraddhāvān sa tu madhyamaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.18 ||
yo bhavet komala-śraddhaḥ sa kaniṣṭho nigadyate || RBhrs_1,2.19 ||
madhye yasmin bhagavatah kṛpā syāt tat-priyasya vā || RBhrs_1,2.20 ||
yathebhaḥ śaunakādiś ca dhruvaḥ sa ca catuḥsanaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.21 ||
tāvad bhakti-sukhasyātra katham abhyudayo bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.22 ||
tatrāpi ca viśeṣeṇa gatim aṇvīm anicchataḥ |
bhaktir hṛta-manaḥ-prāṇān premṇā tān kurute janān || RBhrs_1,2.23 ||
anicchato me gatim aṇvīṃ prayuṅkte || RBhrs_1,2.24 ||
eṣāṃ mokṣāya bhaktānāṃ na kadācit spṛhā bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.25 ||
dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.28 ||
sā brahmaṇi sva-mahimany api nātha mā bhūt
kiṃ tv antakāsi-lulitāt patatāṃ vimānāt || RBhrs_1,2.29 ||
na kāmaye nātha tad apy ahaṃ kvacin
vidhatsva karṇāyutam eṣa me varaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.30 ||
ye tu necchanty api paraṃ te svārtha-kuśalāḥ smṛtāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.34 ||
tuṣṭe ca tatra kim alabhyam ananta ādye
kiṃ tair guṇa-vyatikarād iha ye sva-siddhāḥ |
sāraṃ juṣāṃ caraṇayor upagāyatāṃ naḥ || RBhrs_1,2.35 ||
pratyānītāḥ parama bhavatā trāyatā naḥ sva-bhāgā
kāla-grastaṃ kiyad idam aho nātha śuśrūṣatāṃ te
muktis teṣāṃ na hi bahumatā nārasiṃhāparaiḥ kim || RBhrs_1,2.36 ||
necchanti sevayā pūrṇāḥ kuto 'nyat kāla-viplutam || RBhrs_1,2.38 ||
na parilaṣanti kecid apavargam apīśvara te
na kiñcit sādhavo dhīrā bhaktā hy ekāntino mama |
vāñchanty api mayā dattaṃ kaivalyam apunar-bhavam || RBhrs_1,2.41 ||
naivecchaty āśiṣaḥ kvāpi brahmarṣir mokṣam apy uta |
bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati labdhavān puruṣe 'vyaye || RBhrs_1,2.43 ||
varaṃ deva mokṣaṃ na mokṣāvadhiṃ vā
sadā me manasy avirāstāṃ kim anyaiḥ || RBhrs_1,2.44 ||
na mokṣe graho me 'sti dāmodareha || RBhrs_1,2.45 ||
na dharma kāmam arthaṃ vā mokṣaṃ vā varadeśvara |
prārthaye tava pādābje dāsyam evābhikāmaye || RBhrs_1,2.46 ||
punaḥ punar varān ditsur viṣṇur muktiṃ na yācitaḥ |
bhaktir eva vṛtā yena prahlādaṃ taṃ namāmy ahaṃ || RBhrs_1,2.47 ||
yadṛcchayā labdham api viṣṇor dāśarathes tu yaḥ |
naicchan mokṣaṃ vinā dāsyaṃ tasmai hanumate namaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.48 ||
bhavān prabhur ahaṃ dāsa iti yatra vilupyate || RBhrs_1,2.49 ||
icchāmi hi mahābhāga kāruṇyaṃ tava suvrata || RBhrs_1,2.51 ||
sudurlabhaḥ praśāntātmā koṭiṣv api mahā-mune || RBhrs_1,2.52 ||
bhakti-yoga-vidhānārthaṃ kathaṃ paśyema hi striyaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.53 ||
ātmārāmāś ca munayo nirgranthā apy urukrame |
kurvanty ahaitukīṃ bhaktim ittham-bhūta-guṇo hariḥ || RBhrs_1,2.54 ||
sālokyādis tathāpy atra bhaktyā nātivirudhyate || RBhrs_1,2.55 ||
sālokyādir dvidhā tatra nādyā sevā-juṣaṃ matā || RBhrs_1,2.56 ||
naivāṅgīkurvate jātu muktiṃ pañca-vidhām api || RBhrs_1,2.57 ||
yeṣāṃ śrīśa-prasādo 'pi mano hartuṃ na śaknuyāt || RBhrs_1,2.58 ||
dṛṣtāntitā vaśiṣṭhena hari-bhaktir nṛpaṃ prati || RBhrs_1,2.60 ||
sarve 'dhikāriṇo hy atra hari-bhaktau yathā nṛpa || RBhrs_1,2.61 ||
samprāpya vaiṣṇavīṃ dīkṣāṃ dīkṣitā iva sambabhuḥ || RBhrs_1,2.62 ||
na karmaṇām akaraṇād eṣa bhakty-adhikāriṇām || RBhrs_1,2.63 ||
iti vaiṣṇava-śāstrāṇāṃ rahasyaṃ tad-vidāṃ matam || RBhrs_1,2.64 ||
sve sve 'dhikāre yā niṣṭhā sā guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ |
viparyayas tu doṣaḥ syād ubhayor eṣa niścayaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.65 ||
yatra kva vābhadram abhūd amuṣya kiṃ
ājñāyaiva guṇān doṣān mayādiṣṭān api svakān |
dharmān santyajya yaḥ sarvān māṃ bhajet sa ca sattamaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.67 ||
na kiṅkaro nāyam ṛṇī ca rājan |
sarva-dharman parityājya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja |
ahaṃ tvāṃ sarva-pāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā sucaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.69 ||
tathā na spṛśato rāmopāsakaṃ vidhi-pūrvakam || RBhrs_1,2.70 ||
kintu tāni prasiddhāni nirdiśyante yathāmati || RBhrs_1,2.72 ||
ekaṃ karmātra vidvadbhir ekaṃ bhakty-aṅgam ucyate || RBhrs_1,2.73 ||
nivāso dvārakādau ca gaṅgāder api sannidhau || RBhrs_1,2.75 ||
eṣām atra daśāṅgānāṃ bhavet prārambha-rupatā || RBhrs_1,2.77 ||
nirmālyādeś ca tasyāgre tāṇḍavaṃ daṇḍavan-natiḥ || RBhrs_1,2.84 ||
arcanaṃ paricaryā ca gītaṃ saṅkīrtanaṃ japaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.85 ||
smṛtir dhyānaṃ tathā dāsyaṃ sakhyam ātma-nivedanam || RBhrs_1,2.87 ||
sarvathā śaraṇāpattis tadīyānāṃ ca sevanam || RBhrs_1,2.88 ||
śraddhā viśeṣataḥ prītiḥ śrī-mūrter aṅghri-sevane || RBhrs_1,2.90 ||
sajātīyāśaye snigdhe sādhau saṅgaḥ svato vare || RBhrs_1,2.91 ||
nikhila-śraiṣṭhya-bodhāya punar apy atra kīrtanam || RBhrs_1,2.93 ||
tasmād guruṃ prapadyeta jijñāsuḥ śreya uttamam |
śābde pare ca niṣṇātaṃ brahmaṇy upaśamāśrayam || RBhrs_1,2.97 ||
amāyayānuvṛttyā yais tuṣyed ātmātma-do hariḥ || RBhrs_1,2.98 ||
sa mṛgyaḥ śreyasāṃ hetuḥ panthāḥ santāpa-varjitaḥ |
anvāpta-śramaṃ pūrve yena santaḥ pratasthire || RBhrs_1,2.100 ||
aikāntikī harer bhaktir utpātāyaiva kalpate || RBhrs_1,2.101 ||
vastutas tu tathā naiva yad aśāstrīyatekṣyate || RBhrs_1,2.102 ||
acirād eva sarvārthaḥ sidhyaty eṣām abhīpsitaḥ |
harim uddiśya bhogāni kāle tyaktavatas tava |
saṃvatsaraṃ vā ṣaṇmāsān māsaṃ māsārdham eva vā |
dvārakā-vāsinaḥ sarve narā nāryaś caturbhujāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.105 ||
diviṣṭhā yatra paśyanti sarvān eva caturbhujān || RBhrs_1,2.106 ||
kas tāṃ na seveta mariṣyamāṇaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.107 ||
yāvatā syāt sva-nirvāhaḥ svīkuryāt tāvad artha-vit |
ādhikye nyūnatāyāṃ ca cyavate paramārthataḥ || RBhrs_1,2.108 ||
pūjitāḥ praṇatāḥ dhyātāḥ kṣapayanti nṝṇām agham || RBhrs_1,2.110 ||
na śiṣyān anubadhnīta granthān naivābhyased bahūn |
na vyākhyām upayuñjīta nārambhān ārabhet kvacit || RBhrs_1,2.113 ||
aviklava-matir bhūtvā harim eva dhiyā smaret || RBhrs_1,2.114 ||

16-- śokādy-avaśa-vartitā, yathā tatraiva--
śokāmarṣādibhir bhāvair ākrāntaṃ yasya mānasam |
kathaṃ tatra mukundasya sphūrti-sambhāvanā bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.115 |||
piteva putraṃ karuṇo nodvejayati yo janam |
viśuddhasya hṛṣīkeśas tūrṇaṃ tasya prasīdati || RBhrs_1,2.117 ||
vaiṣṇavena sadā te tu varjanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ || RBhrs_1,2.118 ||
harer apy aparādhān yaḥ kuryād dvipadapāṃśulaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.119 ||
nāmāśrayaḥ kadācit syāt taraty eva sa nāmataḥ |
nāmno hi sarva-suhṛdo hy aparādhāt pataty adhaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.120 ||
nindāṃ bhagavataḥ śrṇvaṃs tat-parasya janasya vā |
tato nāpaiti yaḥ so 'pi yāty adhaḥ sukṛtāc cyutaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.121 ||
te vaiṣṇavā bhuvanam āśu pavitrayanti || RBhrs_1,2.122 ||
sa loka-pāvano bhutvā tasya lokam avāpnuyāt || RBhrs_1,2.124 ||
ucchiṣṭa-bhojino dāsās tava māyāṃ jayemahi || RBhrs_1,2.125 ||
kṛṣṇottīrṇaṃ tu nirmālyaṃ yasyāṅgaṃ spṛśate mune |
sarva-rogais tathā pāpair mukto bhavati nārada || RBhrs_1,2.126 ||
yo nṛtyati prahṛṣṭātmā bhāvair bahuṣu bhaktitaḥ |
sa nirdahati pāpāni manvantara-śateṣv api || RBhrs_1,2.127 ||
yān ārūḍhaṃ puraḥ prekṣya samāyāntaṃ janārdanam |
abhyutthānaṃ naraḥ kurvan pātayet sarva-kilbiṣam || RBhrs_1,2.130 ||
viṣṇunaiva samāḥ sarve bhavanti śvapadādayaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.131 ||
sthānaṃ tīrthaṃ gṛhaṃ cāsya tatra tīrthe gatir yathā || RBhrs_1,2.132 ||
slāghyau tāv eva caraṇau yau hares tīrtha-gāminau || RBhrs_1,2.133 ||
na bhūyaḥ praviśen mātuḥ kukṣi-kārāgṛhaṃ sudhīḥ || RBhrs_1,2.134 ||
tad evāvartanaṃ tasya punar nāvartate bhave || RBhrs_1,2.135 ||
catur-vāraṃ bhramībhis tu jagat sarvaṃ carācaram |
sarvāsām api siddhīnāṃ mūlaṃ tāc-caraṇārcanaṃ || RBhrs_1,2.138 ||
śrī-viṣṇor arcanaṃ ye tu prakurvanti narā bhuvi |
te yānti śāśvataṃ viṣṇor ānandaṃ paramaṃ padam || RBhrs_1,2.139 ||
muhūrtaṃ vā muhūrtārdhaṃ yas tiṣṭhed dhari-mandire |
sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ kim u śuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.141 ||
na tāni likhitāny atra grantha-bāhulya-bhītitaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.143 ||
hareḥ sālokyam āpnoti rudra-gānādhikaṃ bhavet || RBhrs_1,2.144 ||
kṛṣṇeti maṅgalaṃ nāma yasya vāci pravartate |
idaṃ hi puṃsas tapasaḥ śrutasya vā
mantrasya sulaghūccāro japa ity abhidhīyate || RBhrs_1,2.149 ||
kṛṣṇāya nama ity eṣa mantraḥ sarvārtha-sādhakaḥ |
harim uddiśya yat kiñcit kṛtaṃ vijñāpanaṃ girā |
mokṣa-dvārārgalān mokṣas tenaiva vihitas tava || RBhrs_1,2.151 ||
ity ādir vividhā dhīraiḥ kṛṣṇe vijñaptir īritā || RBhrs_1,2.152 ||
yuvatīnāṃ yathā yūni yūnāṃ ca yuvatau yathā |
mat-tulyo nāsti pāpātmā nāparādhī ca kaścana |
parihāre 'pi lajjā me kiṃ brūve puruṣottama || RBhrs_1,2.154 ||
kadā gambhīrayā vācā śriyā yukto jagat-pate |
cāmara-vyagra-hastaṃ mām evaṃ kurv iti vakṣyasi || RBhrs_1,2.155 ||
stotraiḥ stavaś ca devāgre yaḥ stauti madhusūdanam |
na dānaṃ na havir yeṣāṃ svādhyāyo na surārcanam |
te 'pi pādodakaṃ pītvā prayānti paramāṃ gatim || RBhrs_1,2.161 ||
pāpa-bandhair vinirmuktaḥ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt || RBhrs_1,2.165 ||
vṛndāvane tu govindaṃ ye paśyanti vasundhare |
na te yama-puraṃ yānti yānti puṇya-kṛtāṃ gatim || RBhrs_1,2.166 ||
dahaty āloka-mātreṇa viṣṇoḥ sārātrikaṃ mukham || RBhrs_1,2.167 ||
devatānāṃ gaṇāḥ sarve bhavanti śvapacādayaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.168 ||
pūjitaṃ pūjyamānaṃ vā yaḥ paśyed bhaktito harim || RBhrs_1,2.169 ||
kṛṣṇeti vaiṣṇavaṃ mantraṃ śrutvā mukto bhaven naraḥ || RBhrs_1,2.171 ||
tā ye pibanty avitṛṣo nṛpa gāḍha-karṇais
jīveta yo mukti-pade sa dāya-bhāk || RBhrs_1,2.174 ||
yathā kathaṃ cin-manasā sambandhaḥ smṛtir ucyate || RBhrs_1,2.175 ||
puruṣaṃ tam ajaṃ nityaṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ harim || RBhrs_1,2.176 ||
prayāṇe cāprayāṇe ca yan-nāma smaratāṃ nṝṇām |
sadyo naśyati pāpaugho namas tasmai cid-ātmane || RBhrs_1,2.177 ||
pāpino 'pi prasaṅgena vihitaṃ suhitaṃ param || RBhrs_1,2.179 ||
ye kurvanti sadā bhaktyā guṇānusmaraṇaṃ hareḥ |
prakṣīṇa-kaluṣaughās te praviśanti hareḥ padam || RBhrs_1,2.180 ||
dhyāyan hareś caritrāṇi lalitāni vimucyate || RBhrs_1,2.181 ||
pare vāṅ-manasā'gamyaṃ taṃ sākṣāt pratipedire || RBhrs_1,2.182 ||
dāsyaṃ karmārpaṇaṃ tasya kaiṅkaryam api sarvathā || RBhrs_1,2.183 ||
bhaved bhāgavato dharmas tat-karma kimutārpitam || RBhrs_1,2.184 ||
itīdaṃ dvividhaṃ kṛṣṇe vaiṣṇavair dāsyam arpitam || RBhrs_1,2.185 ||
tad-arpitaṃ harau dāsyam iti kaiścid udīryate || RBhrs_1,2.186 ||
īhā yasya harer dāsye karmaṇā manasā girā |
nikhilāsv apy avasthāsu jīvan-muktaḥ sa ucyate || RBhrs_1,2.187 ||
viśvāso mitra-vṛttiś ca sakhyaṃ dvividham īritam || RBhrs_1,2.188 ||
pratijñā tava govinda na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati |
iti saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya prāṇān saṃdhārayāmy aham || RBhrs_1,2.189 ||
lava-nimiṣārdham api yaḥ sa vaiṣṇavāgryaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.190 ||
aṅgatvam asya viśvāsa-viśeṣasya tu keśave || RBhrs_1,2.191 ||
paricaryā parāḥ kecit prāsādeṣu ca śerate |
manuṣyam iva taṃ draṣṭuṃ vyāvahartuṃ ca bandhuvat || RBhrs_1,2.192 ||
mārga-dvayena caitena sādhyā sakhya-ratir matā || RBhrs_1,2.193 ||
dehy-ahantāspadaṃ kaiścid dehaḥ kaiścin mamatva-bhāk || RBhrs_1,2.195 ||
cintāṃ kuryān na rakṣāyai vikrītasya yathā paśoḥ |
tathārpayan harau dehaṃ viramed asya rakṣanāt || RBhrs_1,2.197 ||
keṣāṃcid eva dhīrāṇāṃ labhate sādhanārhatām || RBhrs_1,2.198 ||
yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāti-priyam ātmanaḥ |
tat tan nivedayen mahyaṃ tad ānantyāya kalpate || RBhrs_1,2.199 ||
laukikī vaidikī vāpi yā kriyā kriyate mune |
hari-sevānukūlaiva sā kāryā bhaktim icchatā || RBhrs_1,2.200 ||
tavāsmīti vadan vācā tathaiva manasā vidan |
tat-sthānam āśritas tanvā modate śaraṇāgataḥ || RBhrs_1,2.201 ||
iti yaḥ śaraṇaṃ prāptas taṃ kleśād uddharāmy aham || RBhrs_1,2.202 ||
53-- atha tadīyānāṃ sevanam | tulāsyaḥ, yathā skānde--
nyastā tac-caraṇe vimukti-phaladā tasyai tulasyai namaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.203 ||
dṛṣtā spṛṣṭā tathā dhyātā kīrtitā namitā stutā |
ropitā sevitā nityaṃ pūjitā tulasī śubhā || RBhrs_1,2.204 ||
navadhā tulasīṃ devīṃ ye bhajanti dine dine |
yuga-koṭi-sahasrāṇi te vasanti harer gṛhe || RBhrs_1,2.205 ||
śāstram atra samākhyātaṃ yad bhakti-pratipādakam || RBhrs_1,2.206 ||
vaiṣṇavāni tu śāstrāṇī ye śṛṇvanti paṭhanti ca |
dhanyās te mānavā loke tesāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prasīdati || RBhrs_1,2.207 ||
vaiṣṇavāni tu śāstrāṇī ye 'rcayanti gṛhe narāḥ |
tiṣṭhate vaiṣṇavaṃ śāstraṃ likhitaṃ yasya mandire |
tatra nārāyaṇo devaḥ svayaṃ vasati nārada || RBhrs_1,2.209 ||
tad-rasāmṛta-tṛptasya nānyatra syād ratiḥ kvacit || RBhrs_1,2.210 ||
mathurāṃ ca parityajya yo 'nyatra kurute ratim |
mūḍho bhramati saṃsāre mohitā mama māyayā || RBhrs_1,2.211 ||
śrutā smṛtā kīrtitā ca vāñchitā prekṣitā gatā |
spṛṣṭā śritā sevitā ca mathurābhīṣṭadā nṛṇām |
iti khyātaṃ purāṇeṣu na vistāra-bhiyocyate || RBhrs_1,2.213 ||
tasmāt parataraṃ devi tadīyānāṃ samarcanam || RBhrs_1,2.214 ||
rati-rāso bhavet tīvraḥ pādayor vyasanārdanaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.215 ||
gopī-candana-liptāṅgo dṛṣtaś cet tad-aghaṃ kutaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.216 ||
yeṣāṃ saṃsmaraṇāt puṃsāṃ sadyaḥ śuddhyanti vai gṛhāḥ |
ye me bhakta-janāḥ pārtha na me bhaktāś ca te janāḥ |
mad-bhaktānāṃ ca ye bhaktās te me bhaktatamā matāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.218 ||
prāyas tāvanti tad-bhakta-bhakter api budhā viduḥ || RBhrs_1,2.219 ||
yaḥ karoti mahīpāla harer gehe mahotsavam |
tasyāpi bhavati nityaṃ hari-loke mahotsava || RBhrs_1,2.220 ||
tasyāyaṃ tādṛśo māsaḥ svalpam apy uru-kārakaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.221 ||
bhuktiṃ muktiṃ harir dadyād arcito 'nyatra sevinām |
bhaktiṃ tu na dadāty eva yato vaśyakarī hareḥ || RBhrs_1,2.222 ||
sā tv añjasā harer bhaktir labhyate kārttike naraiḥ |
yasmin dine prasūteyaṃ devakī tvāṃ janārdana |
tad-dinaṃ brūhi vaikuṇṭha kurmas te tatra cotsavam |
tena samyak-prapannānāṃ prasādaṃ kuru keśavaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.224 ||
bhaktis tasmai pradātavyā na tu muktiḥ kadācana || RBhrs_1,2.225 ||
muhur aho rasikā bhuvi bhāvukāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.226 ||
gṛhita-cetā rājarṣe ākhyānaṃ yad adhītavān || RBhrs_1,2.227 ||
yasya yat-saṅgatiḥ puṃso maṇivat syāt sa tad-guṇaḥ |
sva-kūlarddhyai tato dhīmān sva-yūthyān eva saṃśrayet || RBhrs_1,2.229 ||
yogināṃ nṛpa nirṇītaṃ harer nāmānukīrtanaṃ || RBhrs_1,2.230 ||
gītvā ca mama nāmāni vicaren mama sannidhau |
iti bravīmi te satyaṃ krīto 'haṃ tasya cārjuna || RBhrs_1,2.231 ||
tan-mukhe hari-nāmāni sadā tiṣṭhanti bhārata || RBhrs_1,2.232 ||
ataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-nāmādi na bhaved grāhyaṃ indriyaiḥ |
sevonmukhe hi jihvādau svayam eva sphuraty adaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.234 ||
muktaiḥ prārthyā harer bhaktir mathurāyāṃ tu labhyate || RBhrs_1,2.235 ||
tri-vargadā kāmināṃ yā mumukṣūṇāṃ ca mokṣadā |
bhaktīcchor bhaktidā kas tāṃ mathurāṃ nāśrayed budhaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.236 ||
aho madhu-purī dhanyā vaikuṇṭhāc ca garīyasī |
dinam ekaṃ nivāsena harau bhaktiḥ prajāyate || RBhrs_1,2.237 ||
yatra svalpo 'pi sambandhaḥ sad-dhiyāṃ bhāva-janmane || RBhrs_1,2.238 ||
mā prekṣiṣṭhās tava yadi sakhe bandhu-sange 'sti raṅgaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.239 ||
yad garhantaḥ sukhamayam amī mokṣam apy ākṣipanti || RBhrs_1,2.240 ||
skhalann antaḥ-phullo dadhad atipṛthuṃ vepathum api |
dṛśoḥ kakṣāṃ yāvan mama sa puruṣaḥ ko 'py upayayau
na jāte kiṃ tāvan matir iha gṛhe nābhiramate || RBhrs_1,2.241 ||
manasi kam api bhāvaṃ kānana-śrīs tanoti || RBhrs_1,2.243 ||
bhāvaṃ tad-viṣayaṃ cāpi yā sahaiva prakāśayet || RBhrs_1,2.244 ||
keṣāṃcit kvacid aṅgānāṃ yat kṣudraṃ śrūyate phalaṃ |
bahir-mukha-pravṛttyaitat kintu mukhyaṃ phalaṃ ratiḥ || RBhrs_1,2.245 ||
saṃmataṃ bhakti-vijñānāṃ bhakty-aṅgatvaṃ na karmaṇām || RBhrs_1,2.246 ||
tāvat karmāṇi kurvīta na nirvidyeta yāvatā |
mat-kathā-śravaṇādau vā śraddhā yāvan na jāyate || RBhrs_1,2.247 ||
īṣat prathamam eveti nāṅgatvam ucitaṃ tayoḥ || RBhrs_1,2.248 ||
yad ubhe citta-kāṭhinya-hetū prāyaḥ satāṃ mate |
na jñānaṃ na ca vairāgyaṃ prāyaḥ śreyo bhaved iha || RBhrs_1,2.250 ||
yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgya taś ca yat |
yogena dāna dharmeṇa śreyobhir itarair api || RBhrs_1,2.252 ||
svargāpavargaṃ mad-dhāma kathañcid yadi vāñchati || RBhrs_1,2.253 ||
rucim udvahatas tatra janasya bhajane hareḥ |
viṣayeṣu gariṣṭho 'pi rāgaḥ prāyo vilīyate || RBhrs_1,2.254 ||
nirbandhaḥ kṛṣṇa-sambandhe yuktaṃ vairāgyam ucyate || RBhrs_1,2.255 ||
mumukṣubhiḥ parityāgo vairāgyaṃ phalgu kathyate || RBhrs_1,2.256 ||
spaṣṭatārthaṃ punar api tad evedaṃ nirākṛtaṃ || RBhrs_1,2.258 ||
vidūratvād uttamatā-hānyā tasyāś ca nāṅgatā || RBhrs_1,2.259 ||
vivekādīny ato 'mīṣām api nāṅgatvam ucyate || RBhrs_1,2.260 ||
kṛṣṇonmukhaṃ svayaṃ yānti yamāḥ śaucādayas tathā |
ity eṣāṃ ca na yuktā syād bhakty-aṅgāntara-pātitā || RBhrs_1,2.261 ||
ete na hy adbhutā vyādha tavāhiṃsādayo guṇāḥ |
hari-bhaktau pravṛttā ye na te syuḥ para-tāpinaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.262 ||
śrī viṣṇoḥ śravaṇe parīkṣid abhavad vaiyāsakiḥ kīrtane
prahlādaḥ smaraṇe tad-aṅghri-bhajane lakṣmīḥ pṛthuḥ pūjane |
akrūras tv abhivandane kapi-patir dāsye 'tha sakhye 'rjunaḥ
sarvasvātma-nivedane balir abhūt kṛṣṇāptir eṣāṃ parā || RBhrs_1,2.265 ||
kāmaṃ ca dāsye na tu kāma-kāmyayā
vaidhi bhaktir iyaṃ kaiścan maryādā-mārga ucyate || RBhrs_1,2.269 ||
rāgātmikām anusṛtā yā sā rāgānugocyate || RBhrs_1,2.270 ||
tan-mayī yā bhaved bhaktiḥ sātra rāgātmikoditā || RBhrs_1,2.272 ||
sā kāmarūpā sambandha-rūpā ceti bhaved dvidhā || RBhrs_1,2.273 ||
kāmād dveṣād bhayāt snehād yathā bhaktyeśvare manaḥ |
āveśya tad aghaṃ hitvā bahavas tad-gatiṃ gatāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.274 ||
gopyaḥ kāmād bhayāt kaṃso dveṣāc caidyādayo nṛpāḥ |
sambandhād vṛṣṇayaḥ snehād yūyaṃ bhaktyā vayaṃ vibho || RBhrs_1,2.275 ||
bhaktyā vayam iti vyaktaṃ vaidhī bhaktir udīritā || RBhrs_1,2.277 ||
yad-arīṇāṃ priyāṇāṃ ca prāpyam ekam ivoditam |
brahmaṇy eva layaṃ yānti prāyeṇa ripavo hareḥ |
kecit prāpyāpi sārūpyābhāsaṃ majjanti tat-sukhe || RBhrs_1,2.279 ||
siddha-lokas tu tamasaḥ pāre yatra vasanti hi |
siddhā brahma-sukhe magnā daityāś ca hariṇa hatāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.280 ||
rāga-bandhena kenāpi taṃ bhajanto vrajanty amī |
aṅghri-padma-sudhāḥ prema-rūpās tasya priyā janāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.281 ||
vayam api te samāḥ sama-dṛśo 'ṅghri-saroja-sudhāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.282 ||
sā kāmarūpā sambhoga-tṛṣṇāṃ yā nayati svatām |
yad asyāṃ kṛṣṇa-saukhyārtham eva kevalam udyamaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.283 ||
āsāṃ prema-viśeṣo 'yaṃ prāptaḥ kām api mādhurīṃ |
tat-tat-krīḍā-nidānatvāt kāma ity ucyate budhaiḥ || RBhrs_1,2.284 ||
premaiva gopa-rāmāṇāṃ kāma ity agamat prathām || RBhrs_1,2.285 ||
ity uddhavādayo 'py etaṃ vāñchati bhagavat-priyāḥ || RBhrs_1,2.286 ||
kāma-prāyā ratiḥ kintu kubjāyām eva sammatā || RBhrs_1,2.287 ||
rāgātmikāyā dvaividhyād dvidhā rāgānugā ca sā |
kāmānugā ca sambandhānugā ceti nigadyate || RBhrs_1,2.290 ||
teṣāṃ bhāvāptaye lubdho bhaved atrādhikāravān || RBhrs_1,2.291 ||
nātra śāstraṃ na yuktiṃ ca tal-lobhotpatti-lakṣaṇam || RBhrs_1,2.292 ||
atra śāstraṃ tathā tarkam anukūlam apekṣate || RBhrs_1,2.293 ||
kṛṣṇaṃ smaran janaṃ cāsya preṣṭhaṃ nija-samīhitam |
tat-tat-kathā-rataś cāsau kuryād vāsaṃ vraje sadā || RBhrs_1,2.294 ||
yāny aṅgāni ca tāny atra vijñeyāni manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_1,2.296 ||
śrī-mūrter mādhurīṃ prekṣya tat-tal-līlāṃ niśamya vā |
purāṇe śruyate pādme puṃsam api bhaved iyam || RBhrs_1,2.300 ||
dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ hariṃ tatra bhoktum aicchan suvigraham || RBhrs_1,2.301 ||
te sarve strītvam āpannāḥ samudbhūtāś ca gokule |
hariṃ samprāpya kāmena tato muktā bhavārṇavāt || RBhrs_1,2.302 ||
riraṃsāṃ suṣṭhu kurvan yo vidhi-mārgeṇa sevate |
kevalenaiva sa tadā mahiṣītvam iyāt pure || RBhrs_1,2.303 ||
bhartāraṃ ca jagad-yoniṃ vāsudevam ajaṃ vibhum || RBhrs_1,2.304 ||
sā sambandhānugā bhaktiḥ procyate sadbhir ātmani |
tathā hi śruyate śāstre kaścit kurupurī-sthitaḥ |
ye dhyāyanti sadodyuktās tebhyo 'pīha namo namaḥ || RBhrs_1,2.308 ||
rucibhiś citta-māsṛṇya-kṛd asau bhāva ucyate || RBhrs_1,3.1 ||
premṇas tu prathamāvasthā bhāva ity abhidhīyate |
vastutaḥ svayam āsvāda-svarūpaiva ratis tv asau |
ādyas tu prāyikas tatra dvitīyo viralodayaḥ || RBhrs_1,3.6 ||
harāv āsaktim utpādya ratiṃ saṃjanayaty asau || RBhrs_1,3.8 ||

tatra ādyo (1.5.26)--
tatrānvahaṃ kṛṣṇa-kathāḥ pragāyatām
anugraheṇāśṛṇavaṃ manoharāḥ |
tāḥ śraddhayā me 'nupadaṃ viśṛṇvataḥ
priya-śravasy aṅga mamābhavad ratiḥ || RBhrs_1,3.9 || iti |
ratyā tu bhāva evātra na tu premābhidhīyate |
mama bhaktiḥ pravṛtteti vakṣyate sa yad agrataḥ || RBhrs_1,3.10 ||
purāṇe nātya-śāstre ca dvayos tu rati-bhāvayoḥ |
samānārthatayā hy atra dvayam aikyena lakṣitam || RBhrs_1,3.13 ||
itthaṃ manorathaṃ bālā kurvatī nṛtya utsukā |
hari-prītyā ca tāṃ sarvāṃ rātrim evātyavāhayat || RBhrs_1,3.14 ||
dvijendra tava mayy astu bhaktir avyābhicāriṇī || RBhrs_1,3.17 ||
prasāda āntaro yaḥ syāt sa hārda iti kathyate || RBhrs_1,3.19 ||
guṇair alam asaṅkhyeyair mahātmyaṃ tasya sūcyate |
vāsudeve bhagavati yasya naisargikī ratiḥ || RBhrs_1,3.21 ||
nisargaḥ saiva tenātra ratir naisargikī matā || RBhrs_1,3.22 ||
aho dhanyo 'si devarṣe kṛpayā yasya tat-kṣaṇāt |
nīco 'py utpulako lebhe lubdhako ratim acyute || RBhrs_1,3.23 ||
bhaktānāṃ bhedataḥ seyaṃ ratiḥ pañca-vidhā matā |
agre vivicya vaktavyā tena nātra prapañcyate || RBhrs_1,3.24 ||
āśā-bandhaḥ samutkaṇṭhā nāma-gāne sadā ruciḥ || RBhrs_1,3.25 ||
ity ādayo 'nubhāvāḥ syur jāta-bhāvāṅkure jane || RBhrs_1,3.26 ||
kṣobha-hetāv api prāpte kṣāntir akṣubhitātmatā || RBhrs_1,3.27 ||
viraktir indriyārthānāṃ syād arocakatā svayaṃ || RBhrs_1,3.30 ||
yo dustyajān dāra-sutān suhṛd rājyaṃ hṛdi-spṛśaḥ |
harau ratiṃ vahann eṣa narendrāṇāṃ śikhā-maṇiḥ |
bhikṣām aṭann ari-pure śvapākam api vandate || RBhrs_1,3.33 ||
na premā śravaṇādi-bhaktir api vā yogo 'thavā vaiṣṇavo
jñānaṃ vā śubha-karma vā kiyad aho saj-jātir apy asti vā |
he gopī-jana-vallabha vyathayate hā hā mad-āśaiva mām || RBhrs_1,3.35 ||
ālolām anurāgiṇor nayanayor ārdrāṃ mṛdau jalpite |
āśāste mama locanaṃ vraja-śiśor-mūrtiṃ jagan-mohinīm || RBhrs_1,3.37 ||
tava madhura-svara-kaṇṭhī gāyati nāmāvalīṃ bālā || RBhrs_1,3.38 ||
ceto bata harati hanta kiṃ kurmaḥ || RBhrs_1,3.39 ||
tad vasati-sthale prītiḥ, yathā padyāvalyām {*Not found in my edition.}--
ānandāśru-dharaḥ kadā madhu-purīṃ dhanyaś cariṣyāmy aham || RBhrs_1,3.40 ||
mumukṣu-prabhṛtīnāṃ ced bhaved eṣā ratir na hi || RBhrs_1,3.41 ||
yā kṛṣṇenātigopyāśu bhajadbhyo 'pi na dīyate || RBhrs_1,3.42 ||
hṛdaye sambhavaty eṣāṃ kathaṃ bhāgavatī ratiḥ || RBhrs_1,3.43 ||
pratibimbas tathā cchāyā raty-ābhāso dvidhā mataḥ || RBhrs_1,3.45 ||
rateś chāyā bhavet kiṃcit tat-sādṛśyāvalambinī || RBhrs_1,3.49 ||
apy ānuṣaṅgikād eṣa kvacid ajñeṣv apīkṣyate || RBhrs_1,3.50 ||
kintu bhāgyaṃ vinā nāsau bhāva-cchāyāpy udañcati |
yad abhyudayataḥ kṣemaṃ tatra syād uttarottaram || RBhrs_1,3.51 ||
krameṇa kṣayam āpnoti kha-sthaḥ pūrṇa-śaśī yathā || RBhrs_1,3.53 ||
ābhāsatāṃ ca śanakair nyūna-jātīyatām api || RBhrs_1,3.54 ||
ābhāsatām asau kiṃ vā bhajanīyeśa-bhāvatām || RBhrs_1,3.55 ||
ata eva kvacit teṣu navya-bhakteṣu dṛśyate |
sādhanekṣāṃ vinā yasminn akasmād bhāva īkṣyate |
yaḥ prathīyān bhaved bhāvaḥ sa tu kṛṣṇa-prasādajaḥ || RBhrs_1,3.58 ||
jane cej jāta-bhāve 'pi vaiguṇyam iva dṛśyate |
kāryā tathāpi nāsūyā kṛtārthaḥ sarvathaiva saḥ || RBhrs_1,3.59 ||
uṣmāṇam api vamantī sudhāṃśu-koṭer api svādvī || RBhrs_1,3.61 ||

iti śrī-śrī bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau
purva-vibhāge bhāva-bhakti-laharī tṛtīyā ||
bhāvaḥ sa eva sāndrātmā budhaiḥ premā nigadyate || RBhrs_1,4.1 ||
bhaktiḥ premocyate bhīṣma-mukhyair yatra tu saṅgatā |
bhāvottho 'ti-prasādotthaḥ śrī-harer iti sa dvidhā || RBhrs_1,4.4 ||
na patiṃ kāmayet kañcid brahmacarya-sthitā sadā |
māhātmya-jñāna-yuktaś ca kevalaś ceti sa dvidhā || RBhrs_1,4.11 ||
sneho bhaktir iti proktas tayā sārṣṭyādinānyathā || RBhrs_1,4.12 ||

kevalo, yathā tatraiva--
manogatir avicchinnā harau prema-pariplutā |
abhisandhi-vinirmuktā bhaktir-viṣṇu-vaśaṅkarī || RBhrs_1,4.13 || iti |
rāgānugāśritānāṃ tu prāyaśaḥ kevalo bhavet || RBhrs_1,4.14 ||
tato 'nartha-nivṛttiḥ syāt tato niṣṭhā rucis tataḥ || RBhrs_1,4.15 ||
sādhakānām ayaṃ premnaḥ prādurbhāve bhavet kramaḥ || RBhrs_1,4.16 ||
antarvāṇībhir apy asya mudrā suṣṭhu sudurgamā || RBhrs_1,4.17 ||
bhāvonmatto hareḥ kiñcin na veda sukham ātmanaḥ |
dukhaṃ ceti maheśāni paramānanda āplutaḥ || RBhrs_1,4.18 ||
premṇa eva vilāsatvād vairalyāt sādhakeṣv api |
atra snehādayo bhedā vivicya na hi śaṃsitāḥ || RBhrs_1,4.19 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau
rasopayogi-sthāyi-bhāvopapādano nāma
pūrvavibhāgaḥ samāptaḥ
agha-damano mathurāyāṃ sadā sanātana-tanur jayati || RBhrs_2,1.1 ||
asya pañca laharyaḥ syur vibhāvākhyāgrimā matā |
vyabhicāry-abhidhā turyā sthāyi-saṃjñā ca pañcamī || RBhrs_2,1.3 ||
eṣā kṛṣṇa-ratiḥ sthāyī bhāvo bhakti-raso bhavet || RBhrs_2,1.5 ||
eṣa bhakti-rasāsvādas tasyaiva hṛdi jāyate || RBhrs_2,1.6 ||
ratir ānanda-rūpaiva nīyamānā tu rasyatām || RBhrs_2,1.9 ||
kintu premā vibhāvādyaiḥ svalpair nīto 'py aṇīyasīm |
vibhāvanādy-avasthāṃ tu sadya āsvādyatāṃ vrajet || RBhrs_2,1.11 ||
kārya-bhūtāḥ smitādyāś ca tathāṣṭau stabdhatādayaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.12 ||
nirvedādyāḥ sahāyāś ca te jñeyā rasa-bhāvane |
vibhāvā anubhāvāś ca sāttvikā vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.13 ||
te dvidhālambanā eke tathaivoddīpanāḥ pare || RBhrs_2,1.14 ||
vibhāvyate hi raty-ādir yatra yena vibhāvyate |
kṛṣṇaś ca kṛṣṇa-bhaktāś ca budhair ālambanā matāḥ |
nāyakānāṃ śiro-ratnaṃ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam |
hanta me katham udeti sa-vatse, vatsa-pāla-paṭale ratir atra |
ity aniścita-matir baladevo, vismaya-stimita-mūrtir ivāsīt || RBhrs_2,1.18 ||
āvṛtaṃ prakaṭaṃ ceti svarūpaṃ kathitaṃ dvidhā || RBhrs_2,1.19 ||
māṃ snehayati kim uccair, mahileyaṃ dvārakāvarodhe 'tra |
āṃ viditaṃ kutukārthī, vanitā-veśo hariś carati || RBhrs_2,1.21 ||
karoty uccair modaṃ mama madhura-mūrtir madhuripuḥ || RBhrs_2,1.22 ||
ruciras tejasā yukto balīyān vayasānvitaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.23 ||
sthiro dāntaḥ kṣamā-śīlo gambhīro dhṛtimān samaḥ |
vadānyo dhārmikaḥ śūraḥ karuṇo mānya-mānakṛt || RBhrs_2,1.26 ||
samudrā iva pañcāśad durvigāhā harer amī || RBhrs_2,1.29 ||
tathā hi pādme pārvatyai śiti-kaṇṭhena tad-guṇāḥ |
eta eva guṇāḥ prāyo dharmāya vana-mālinaḥ |
satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā kṣāntis tyāgaḥ santoṣa ārjavam |
śamo damas tapaḥ sāmyaṃ titikṣoparatiḥ śrutam || RBhrs_2,1.33 ||
jñānaṃ viraktir aiśvaryaṃ śauryaṃ tejo balaṃ smṛtiḥ |
svātantryaṃ kauśalaṃ kāntir dhairyaṃ mārdavam eva ca || RBhrs_2,1.34 ||
prāgalbhyaṃ praśrayaḥ śīlaṃ saha ojo balaṃ bhagaḥ |
gāmbhīryaṃ sthairyam āstikyaṃ kīrtir māno 'nahaṅkṛtiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.35 ||
ime cānye ca bhagavan nityā yatra mahā-guṇāḥ |
prārthyā mahattvam icchadbhir na viyanti sma karhicit || RBhrs_2,1.36 ||
atha pañca-guṇā ye syur aṃśena giriśādiṣu || RBhrs_2,1.37 ||
ity asādhāraṇaṃ proktaṃ govindasya catuṣṭayam || RBhrs_2,1.43 ||
sodāharaṇam eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate kramāt || RBhrs_2,1.44 ||
ślāghyāṅga-sanniveśo yaḥ suramyāṅgaḥ sa kathyate || RBhrs_2,1.45 ||
parikṣāmo madhyaḥ sphurati murahantur madhurimā || RBhrs_2,1.46 ||
tanau guṇottham aṅkottham iti sal-lakṣaṇaṃ dvidhā || RBhrs_2,1.47 ||
guṇotthaṃ syād guṇair yogo raktatā-tuṅgatādibhiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.48 ||
rāgaḥ saptasu hanta ṣaṭsv api śiśor aṅgeṣv alaṃ tuṅgatā
visāras triṣu kharvatā triṣu tathā gambhīratā ca triṣu |
dairghyaṃ pañcasu kiṃ ca pañcasu sakhe samprekṣyate sūkṣmatā
dvātriṃśad-vara-lakṣaṇaḥ katham asau gopeṣu sambhāvyate || RBhrs_2,1.49 ||
rekhāmayaṃ rathāṅgādi syād aṅkotthaṃ karādiṣu || RBhrs_2,1.50 ||
tejo dhāma prabhāvaś cety ucyate dvividhaṃ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.55 ||
hari-vakṣasi ruci-niviḍe maṇirāḍ ayam uḍur iva sphurati || RBhrs_2,1.57 ||
prāṇena mahatā pūrṇo balīyān iti kathyate || RBhrs_2,1.60 ||
vāmas tāmarasākṣasya bhuja-daṇḍaḥ sa pātu vaḥ |
krīḍā-kandukatāṃ yena nīto govardhano giriḥ || RBhrs_2,1.62 ||
murārer mādhuryaṃ manasi madirākṣīr madayati || RBhrs_2,1.64 ||
vividhādbhuta-bhāṣāvit sa prokto yas tu kovidaḥ |
nānā-deśyāsu bhāṣāsu saṃskṛte prākṛteṣu ca || RBhrs_2,1.65 ||
syān nānṛtaṃ vaco yasya satya-vākyaḥ sa kathyate || RBhrs_2,1.67 ||
raṇorvaritam ity abhūt tava yathārtham evoditam |
ravir bhavati śītalaḥ kumuda-bandhur apy uṣṇalas
tathāpi na murāntaka vyabhicariṣṇur uktis tava || RBhrs_2,1.68 ||
māṃ viddhi kṛṣṇaṃ bhavataḥ sapatnam || RBhrs_2,1.69 ||
iti dvidhā nigadito vāvadūko manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.72 ||
hari-vāg iyaṃ mama dhinoti dhiyaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.74 ||
vidvān nītijña ity eṣa supaṇḍityo dvidhā mataḥ |
vidvān akhila-vidyā-vin nītijñas tu yathārha-kṛt || RBhrs_2,1.75 ||
tvāṃ labdhāvasarā cirād gurukule prekṣya svasaṅgārthinaṃ
vidyā nāma vadhūś caturdaśa-guṇā govinda śuśrūyate || RBhrs_2,1.77 ||
śāsti svasti-dhurandharo madhupurīṃ nītyā madhūnāṃ patiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.78 ||
medhāvī sūkṣmadhīś ceti procyate buddhimān dvidhā || RBhrs_2,1.79 ||
guror jagati darśayan samayam atra vidyārthinām |
dadhau hṛdaya-mandire kim api citravan mādhavaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.80 ||
yadubhir ayam avadhyo mleccha-rājas tad enaṃ
jhara-muci mucukundaḥ kandare yatra śete || RBhrs_2,1.81 ||
vāsaḥ samprati keśava kva bhavato mugdhekṣaṇe nanv idaṃ
yāminyām uṣitaḥ kva dhūrta vitanur muṣṇāti kiṃ yāminī
śaurir gopa-vadhūṃ chalaiḥ parihasann evaṃ-vidhaiḥ pātu vaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.83 ||
gītaṃ gumphati tāṇḍavaṃ ghaṭayati brūte prahelī-kramaṃ
veṇuṃ vādayate srajaṃ viracayaty ālekhyam abhyasyati |
nirmāti svayam indrajāla-paṭalīṃ dyūte jayaty unmadān
duṣkare kṣipra-kārī yas taṃ dakṣaṃ paricakṣate || RBhrs_2,1.88 ||
haris tāny acchinat tīkṣṇaiḥ śarair ekaika-śastribhiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.89 ||
dadṛśur adhikam etās taṃ yathā sva-sva-pārśve || RBhrs_2,1.90 ||
kṛtajñaḥ syād abhijño yaḥ kṛta-sevādi-karmaṇām || RBhrs_2,1.91 ||
yathā mahābhārate {*Not found in critical edition.}--
ṛṇam etat pravṛddhaṃ me hṛdayān nāpasarpati |
yad govindeti cukrośa kṛṣṇā māṃ dūra-vāsinam || RBhrs_2,1.92 ||
katham api kṛtam alpaṃ vismaren naiva sādhuḥ
kim uta sa khalu sādhu-śreṇi-cūḍāgra-ratnam || RBhrs_2,1.93 ||
pratijñā-niyamau yasya satyau sa sudṛḍha-vrataḥ || RBhrs_2,1.94 ||
tatra satya-pratijño, yathā hari-vaṃśe (2.68.38) {*Not found in critical edition.}--
mune samarthāḥ khalu satyam astu te || RBhrs_2,1.95 ||
satyāṃ ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca sukhām akārṣīt || RBhrs_2,1.96 ||
girer uddharaṇaṃ kṛṣṇa duṣkaraṃ karma kurvatā |
mad-bhaktaḥ syān na duḥkhīti sva-vrataṃ vivṛtaṃ tvayā || RBhrs_2,1.97 ||
śaraj-jyotsnā-tulyaḥ katham api paro nāsti samayas
trilokyām ākṛīḍaḥ kvacid api na vṛndāvana-samaḥ |
mano me sotkaṇṭhaṃ muhur ajani rāsotsava-rase || RBhrs_2,1.99 ||
śāstrānusāri-karmā yaḥ śāstra-cakṣuḥ sa kathyate || RBhrs_2,1.100 ||
pāvanaś ca viśuddheś cety ucyate dvividhaḥ śuciḥ |
pāvanaḥ pāpa-nāśī syād viśuddhas tyakta-dūsaṇaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.102 ||
taṃ nirvyājaṃ bhaja guṇa-nidhe pāvanaṃ pāvanānāṃ
yasyendriyaṃ vimathituṃ kuhakair na śekuḥ || RBhrs_2,1.106 ||
āhṛtya hanta maṇim eva puraṃ prapede
syād udyamaḥ kṛta-dhiyāṃ hi phalodayāntaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.108 ||
sa dānto duḥsaham api yogyaṃ kleśaṃ saheta yaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.109 ||
kim api manasi citraṃ cintyamānā tanoti || RBhrs_2,1.110 ||
raghuvara yad abhūs tvaṃ tādṛśo vāyasasya
praṇata iti dayālur yac ca caidyasya kṛṣṇa |
vada kim apadam āgas tasya te 'sti kṣamāyāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.113 ||
durvibodhāśayo yas tu sa gambhīraḥ itīryate || RBhrs_2,1.114 ||
śakto na harir vidhinā ruṣṭas tuṣṭo 'thavā jñātum || RBhrs_2,1.115 ||
pūrṇa-spṛhaś ca dhṛtimān śāntaś ca kṣobha-kāraṇe || RBhrs_2,1.117 ||
rāga-dveṣa-vimukto yaḥ samaḥ sa kathito budhaiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.120 ||
ripur api yadi śuddho maṇḍanīyas tavāsau
kvacid api viṣamaṃ te ceṣṭitaṃ jāghaṭīti || RBhrs_2,1.122 ||
dāna-vīro bhaved yas tu sa vadānyo nigadyate || RBhrs_2,1.123 ||
ekaikaṃ prati teṣu tarṇaka-bhṛtāṃ bhūṣā-juṣām anvahaṃ
gṛṣṭīnāṃ yugapac ca baddham adadād yas tasya vā kaḥ samaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.125 ||
kurvan kārayate dharmaṃ yaḥ sa dhārmika ucyate || RBhrs_2,1.126 ||
utsāhī yudhi śūro 'stra-prayoge ca vicakṣaṇaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.129 ||
dṛṣṭaḥ ko 'py atra nādaṣṭo hareḥ praharaṇāhibhiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.131 ||
para-duḥkhāsaho yas tu karuṇaḥ sa nigadyate || RBhrs_2,1.132 ||
auddhatya-parihārī yaḥ kathyate vinayīty asau || RBhrs_2,1.139 ||
śālīnatvena saṅkocaṃ bhajan hrīmān udīryate || RBhrs_2,1.141 ||
puro dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ jayati namitāsyo madhuripuḥ || RBhrs_2,1.142 ||
jvara parihara vitrāsaṃ tvam atra samare kṛtāparādhe 'pi |
sadyaḥ prapadyamāne yad indavati yādavendro 'yam || RBhrs_2,1.144 ||
bhoktā ca duḥkha-gandhair apy aspṛṣṭaś ca sukhī bhavet || RBhrs_2,1.145 ||
svapne dambholi-pāṇer api duradhigamaṃ dvāri tauryatrikaṃ ca |
sīmantinyaś ca nityaṃ yaduvara bhuvane kas tvad-anyo 'sti bhogī || RBhrs_2,1.146 ||
na ghoraṃ nodghūrṇāṃ na kila kadanaṃ vetti kim api |
harir vṛndāraṇye param aniśam uccair viharati || RBhrs_2,1.147 ||
susevyo dāsa-bandhuś ca dvidhā bhakta-suhṛn mataḥ || RBhrs_2,1.148 ||
vikrīṇīte svam ātmānaṃ bhaktebhyo bhakta-vatsalaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.149 ||
harir iva hantum ibhaṃ gatottarīyaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.150 ||
priyatva-mātra-vaśyo yaḥ prema-vaśyo bhaved asau || RBhrs_2,1.151 ||
prīto vyamuñcad adhvindūn netrābhyāṃ puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.152 ||
dṛṣṭvā pariśramaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kṛpayāsīt sva-bandhane || RBhrs_2,1.153 ||
sarveṣāṃ hita-kārī yaḥ sa syāt sarva-śubhaṅkaraḥ || RBhrs_2,1.154 ||
na kasya pathyaṃ hariṇā vyadhāyi || RBhrs_2,1.155 ||
sādguṇyair nirmalaiḥ khyātaḥ kīrtimān iti kīrtyate || RBhrs_2,1.158 ||
bhītā rudraṃ tyajati girijā śyāmam aprekṣya kaṇṭhaṃ
śubhraṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣipati vasanaṃ vismito nīla-vāsāḥ |
gīte dāmodara-yaśasi te vīṇayā nāradena || RBhrs_2,1.160 ||
pātraṃ lokānurāgāṇāṃ rakta-lokaṃ vidur budhāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.161 ||

yathā prathame (1.11.9)--
yarhy ambujākṣāpasasāra bho bhavān
raviṃ vinākṣṇor iva nas tavācyuta || RBhrs_2,1.162 ||
āśīs tathyā jaya jaya jayety āvirāste munīnāṃ
harṣād ghoṣaḥ sphurati parito nāgarīṇāṃ garīyān
ke vā raṅga-sthala-bhuvi harau bhejire nānurāgam || RBhrs_2,1.163 ||
sad-eka-pakṣapātī yaḥ sa syāt sādhu-samāśrayaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.164 ||
urugāyorugīto vā paśyantīnāṃ ca kiṃ punaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.167 ||
tvaṃ cumbako 'si mādhava loha-mayī nūnam aṅganā-jātiḥ |
dhāvati tatas tato 'sau yato yataḥ krīḍayā bhramasi || RBhrs_2,1.168 ||
sarveṣām agra-pūjyo yaḥ sa sarvārādhya ucyate || RBhrs_2,1.169 ||
mama dṛśi-gocara eṣa āvir ātmā || RBhrs_2,1.170 ||
mahā-sampatti-yukto yo bhaved eṣa samṛddhimān || RBhrs_2,1.171 ||
varṣanty aṣṭau kim api nidhayaś cārtha-jātaṃ tavāmī |
śuddhāntaś ca sphurati navabhir lakṣitaḥ saudha-lakṣmair
lakṣmīṃ paśyan mura-damana te nātra citrāyate kaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.172 ||
yathā vā kṛṣṇa-karṇāmṛte {*Not in any of the extant KK centuries.}--
vṛndāni ceti sukha-sindhur aho vibhūtiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.173 ||
sarveṣām ati-mukhyo yaḥ sa varīyān itīryate || RBhrs_2,1.174 ||
brahmann atra puru-dviṣā saha puraḥ pīṭhe niṣīda kṣaṇaṃ
tuṣṇīṃ tiṣṭha surendra cāṭubhir alaṃ vārīśa dūrībhava |
ete dvāri muhuḥ kathaṃ sura-gaṇāḥ kurvanti kolāhalaṃ
hanta dvāravatī-pater avasaro nādyāpi niṣpadyate || RBhrs_2,1.175 ||
dvidheśvaraḥ svatantraś ca durlaṅghyājñaś ca kīrtyate || RBhrs_2,1.176 ||
na brahmaṇe dṛśam api stuvate 'py apūrvaṃ
navye brahmāṇḍa-vṛnde sṛjati vidhigaṇaḥ sṛṣṭaye yaḥ kṛtājño
rudraughaḥ kāla-jīrṇe kṣayam avatanute yaḥ kṣayāyānuśiṣṭaḥ |
rakṣāṃ viṣṇu-svarūpā vidadhati taruṇe rakṣiṇo ye tvad-aṃśāḥ
kaṃsāre santi sarve diśi diśi bhavataḥ śāsane 'jāṇḍanāthāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.179 ||
na yujyate sadātma-sthair yathā buddhis tad-āśrayā || RBhrs_2,1.181 ||
yo jānāti samastārthaḥ sa sarvajño nigadyate || RBhrs_2,1.182 ||
yo no jugopa vana etya duranta-kṛcchrād
vismayaṃ mādhurībhir yaḥ sa prokto nitya-nūtanaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.184 ||
calāpi yac chrīr na jahāti karhicit || RBhrs_2,1.185 ||
yugapad ayam apūrvaḥ kaḥ puro viśva-karmā
govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi || RBhrs_2,1.189 ||
tad brahma śrī-bhagavato vibhūtir iti kīrtyate || RBhrs_2,1.190 ||
parātparaṃ brahma ca te vibhūtayaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.191 ||
daśabhiḥ siddha-sakhībhir vṛtā mahā-siddhayaḥ kramād aṣṭau |
aṇimādayo labhante nāvasaraṃ dvāri kṛṣṇasya || RBhrs_2,1.193 ||
āsīc chāyā-dvitīyaḥ prathamam atha vibhur vatsa-ḍimbhādi-dehān
aṃśenāṃśena cakre tad anu bahu-catur-bāhutāṃ teṣu tene |
vṛttas tattvādi-vītair atha kam alabhavaiḥ stūyamāno 'khilātmā
tāvad brahmāṇḍa-sevyaḥ sphuṭam ajani tato yaḥ prapadye tam īśam || RBhrs_2,1.195 ||
tattvair brahmāṇḍam āḍhyaṃ surakula-bhuvanaiś cāṅkitaṃ yojanānāṃ
dṛṣṭaṃ yasyātra vṛndāvanam api bhavataḥ kaḥ stutau tasya śaktaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.201 ||
vedān uddharate jaganti vahate bhūgolam udbibhrate
daityaṃ dārayate baliṃ chalayate kṣatra-kṣayaṃ kurvate |
paulastyaṃ jayate halaṃ kalayate kāruṇyam ātanvate
mlecchān mūrcchayate daśākṛti-kṛte kṛṣṇāya tubhyaṃ namaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.203 ||
bandhaṃ ca bhītiṃ ca mṛtiṃ ca kṛtvā |
ātmārāma-gaṇākarṣīty etad vyaktārtham eva hi || RBhrs_2,1.207 ||
kṛtvā bata sāraṅgaṃ vyadhita kathaṃ sārase tṛṣitam || RBhrs_2,1.208 ||
santi yadyapi me prājyā līlās tās tā manoharāḥ |
na hi jāne smṛte rāse mano me kīdṛśaṃ bhavet || RBhrs_2,1.209 ||
bibharti hṛdi vismayaṃ kam api rāsa-līlā-rasaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.210 ||
rundhann ambu-bhṛtaś camatkṛti-paraṃ kurvan muhus tumburuṃ
bhindann aṇḍa-kaṭāha-bhittim abhito babhrāma vaṃśī-dhvaniḥ || RBhrs_2,1.214 ||
ayam aham api hanta prekṣya yaṃ lubdha-cetāḥ
guṇānām iha kṛṣṇasya diṅ-mātram upadarśitam || RBhrs_2,1.218 ||
nitya-guṇo vanamālī, yad api śikhāmaṇir aśeṣa-netṝṇām |
bhaktāpekṣikam asya, trividhatvaṃ likhyate tad api || RBhrs_2,1.220 ||
hariḥ pūrṇatamaḥ pūrṇataraḥ pūrṇa iti tridhā |
śreṣṭha-madhyādibhiḥ śabdair nāṭye yaḥ paripaṭhyate || RBhrs_2,1.221 ||
sa punaś caturvidhaḥ syād dhīrodāttaś ca dhīra-lalitaś ca |
tat-tal-līlā-bhedād virudhyate na hi catur-vidhāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.225 ||
mayy uccaiḥ kṛta-kilbiṣe 'pi madhuraṃ stutyā muhur yantritaṃ
prekṣya tvāṃ mama durvitarkya-hṛdayaṃ dhīr gīś ca na spandate || RBhrs_2,1.227 ||
idaṃ hi dhīrodāttatvaṃ pūrvaiḥ proktaṃ raghūdvahe |
niścinto dhīra-lalitaḥ syāt prāyaḥ preyasī-vaśaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.230 ||
kaiśoraṃ saphalī-karoti kalayan kuñje vihāraṃ hariḥ || RBhrs_2,1.231 ||
dvija-patir iva sākṣāt prekṣyate kaṃsa-vairī || RBhrs_2,1.234 ||
vikatthanaś ca vidvadbhir dhīroddhata udāhṛtaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.236 ||
āḥ pāpin yavanendra dardura punar vyāghuṭya sadyas tvayā
jāgarmi tvad-upagrahāya bhujagaḥ kṛṣṇo 'tra kṛṣṇābhidhaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.237 ||
dhīroddhatas tu vidvadbhir bhīmasenādir ucyate || RBhrs_2,1.238 ||
mātsaryādyāḥ pratīyante doṣatvena yad apy amī |
durvāraḥ para-vāraṇaḥ svayam ahaṃ labdho 'smi kṛṣṇaḥ puro
re śrīdāma-kuraṅgasaṅgara-bhuvo bhaṅgaṃ tvam aṅgīkuru || RBhrs_2,1.240 ||
mitho virodhino 'py atra kecin nigaditā guṇāḥ |
harau niraṅkuśaiśvaryāt ko 'pi na syād asambhavaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.241 ||
asthūlaś cāṇuś caiva sthūlo 'ṇuś caiva sarvataḥ |
guṇā viruddhā apy ete samāhāryāḥ samantataḥ || RBhrs_2,1.243 ||
sarve nityāḥ śāśvatāś ca dehās tasya parātmanaḥ |
mohas tandrā bhramo rukṣa-rasatā kāma ulbaṇaḥ |
viṣṇur mahān sa iha yasya kalā-viśeṣo
govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi || RBhrs_2,1.250 ||
lalitaudāryam ity ete sattva-bhedās tu pauruṣāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.252 ||
nīce dayādhike spardhā śauryotsāhau ca dakṣatā |
satyaṃ ca vyaktim āyāti yatra śobheti tāṃ viduḥ || RBhrs_2,1.253 ||
svarga-dhvaṃsaṃ vidhitsur vraja-bhuvi kadanaṃ suṣṭhu vīkṣyātivṛṣṭyā
aprekṣya svena tulyaṃ kam api nija-ruṣām atra paryāpti-pātraṃ
bandhūn ānandayiṣyann udaharatu hariḥ satya-sandho mahādrim || RBhrs_2,1.254 ||
vṛṣabhasyeva gambhīrā gatir dhīraṃ ca vīkṣaṇam |
sa-smitaṃ ca vaco yatra sa vilāsa itīryate || RBhrs_2,1.255 ||
tan mādhuryaṃ bhaved yatra ceṣṭādeḥ spṛhaṇīyatā || RBhrs_2,1.257 ||
māṅgalyaṃ jagatām eva viśvāsāspadatā matā || RBhrs_2,1.259 ||
anyāyyaṃ na harāv iti vyapagata-dvārārgalā dānavā
rakṣī kṛṣṇa iti pramattam abhitaḥ krīḍāsu raktāḥ surāḥ |
sākṣī vetti sa bhaktim ity avanata-vrātāś ca cintojjhitāḥ
ke viśvambhara na tvad-aṅghri-yugale viśrambhitāṃ bhejire || RBhrs_2,1.260 ||
vyavasāyād acalanaṃ sthairyaṃ vighnākulād api || RBhrs_2,1.261 ||
pratikule 'pi sa-śūle, śive śivāyāṃ niraṃśukāyāṃ ca |
vyalunād eva mukundo vindhyāvali-nandanasya bhujān || RBhrs_2,1.262 ||
mallānām aśanir nṝṇāṃ naravaraḥ strīṇāṃ smaro mūrtimān
gopānāṃ svajano 'satāṃ kṣitirbhujāṃ śāstā sva-pitroḥ śiśuḥ |
mṛtyur bhoja-pater virāḍ aviduṣāṃ tattvaṃ paraṃ yogināṃ
vṛṣṇīnāṃ paradevateti vidito raṅgaḥ gataḥ sāgrajaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.264 ||
tejo budhair avajñāder asahiṣṇutvam ucyate || RBhrs_2,1.265 ||
nande cānakadundubhau ca purataḥ kaṃsena viśva-druhā |
mañcasyopari sañcukurdiṣur asau paśyācyutaḥ prāñcati || RBhrs_2,1.266 ||
śṛṅgāra-pracurā ceṣṭā yatra taṃ lalitaṃ viduḥ || RBhrs_2,1.267 ||
ariṣṭe sāṭopaṃ kaṭu ruvati savyena vihasann
udañcad-romāñcaṃ racayati ca kṛṣṇaḥ parikaram || RBhrs_2,1.268 ||
vadānyaḥ ko bhaved atra vadānyaḥ puruṣottamāt |
sāmānyā nāyaka-guṇāḥ sthiratādyā yad apy amī |
tathāpi pūrvataḥ kiñcid viśeṣāt punar īritāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.271 ||
uddhavādyās tathā mantre sahāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.272 ||
yo satya-vākya ity ādyā hrīmān ity antimā guṇāḥ |
proktāḥ kṛṣṇe 'sya bhakteṣu te vijñeyā manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.274 ||
te sādhakāś ca siddhāś ca dvi-vidhāḥ parikīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.275 ||
prema-maitrī-kṛpopekṣā yaḥ karoti sa madhyamaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.277 ||
tiṣṭhaty eva bhavāgni-hetir iti te dhīmann alaṃ cintayā |
bilvamaṅgala-tulyā ye sādhakās te prakīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.279 ||
samprāpta-siddhayaḥ siddhā nitya-siddhāś ca te tridhā || RBhrs_2,1.281 ||
sādhanaiḥ kṛpayā cāsya dvidhā samprāpta-siddhayaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.282 ||
dūre yamā hy upari naḥ spṛhaṇīya-śīlāḥ |
nirdhautāsya-taṭān muhuḥ pulakino dhanyān namaskurmahe || RBhrs_2,1.284 ||
nāsāṃ dvijāti-saṃskāro na nivāso gurāv api |
na tapo nātma-mīmāṃsā na śaucaṃ na kriyāḥ śubhāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.286 ||
bhaktir dṛḍhā na cāsmākaṃ saṃskārādimatām api || RBhrs_2,1.287 ||
na sādhana-vidhau ca te śrama-lavasya gandho 'py abhūt |
āgato 'haṃ gaṇāḥ sarve jātās te 'pi mayā saha || RBhrs_2,1.291 ||
ete hi yādavāḥ sarve mad-gaṇā eva bhāmini |
yan-mitraṃ paramānandaṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma sanātanam || RBhrs_2,1.293 ||
nanda te tanaye 'smāsu tasyāpy autpattikaḥ katham || RBhrs_2,1.294 ||
sanātanaṃ mitram iti tasyāpy autpattikaḥ katham |
sneho 'smāsv iti caiteṣāṃ nitya-preṣṭhatvam āgatam || RBhrs_2,1.295 ||
eṣāṃ laukikavac-ceṣṭā līlā mura-ripor iva || RBhrs_2,1.296 ||
tathā tenaiva jāyante nija-lokād yadṛcchayā || RBhrs_2,1.297 ||
punas tenaiva gacchanti tat-padaṃ śāśvataṃ param |
na karma-bandhanaṃ janma vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca vidyate || RBhrs_2,1.298 ||
ye proktāḥ pañca-pañcāśat kramāt kaṃsaripor guṇāḥ |
te cānye cāpi siddheṣu siddhidatvādayo matāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.299 ||
bhaktās tu kīrtitāḥ śāntās tathā dāsa-sutādayaḥ |
sakhāyo guru-vargāś ca preyasyaś ceti pañcadhā || RBhrs_2,1.300 ||
uddīpanās tu te proktā bhāvam uddīpayanti ye |
te tu śrī-kṛṣṇa-candrasya guṇāś ceṣṭāḥ prasādhanam || RBhrs_2,1.301 ||
guṇās tu trividhāḥ proktāḥ kāya-vāṅ-mānasāśrayāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.303 ||
guṇāḥ svarūpam evāsya kāyikādyā yadapy amī |
bhedaṃ svīkṛtya varṇyante tathāpy uddīpanā iti || RBhrs_2,1.305 ||
atas tasya svarūpasya syād ālambanataiva hi |
uddīpanatvam eva syād bhūṣaṇādes tu kevalam || RBhrs_2,1.306 ||
eṣām ālambanatvaṃ ca tathoddīpanatāpi ca || RBhrs_2,1.307 ||
vayaḥ kaumāra-paugaṇḍa-kaiśoram iti tat tridhā || RBhrs_2,1.308 ||
ā-ṣoḍaśāc ca kaiśoraṃ yauvanaṃ syāt tataḥ param || RBhrs_2,1.309 ||
aucityāt tatra kaumāraṃ vaktavyaṃ vatsale rase |
śraiṣṭhyam ujjvala evāsya kaiśorasya tathāpy adaḥ |
ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ kaiśoraṃ trividhaṃ bhavet || RBhrs_2,1.312 ||
praviśati dṛśor ante kāntir manāg iva lohinī |
sakhi tanu- ruhāṃ rājiḥ sūkṣmā darāsya virohate
sphurati suṣamā navyedānīṃ tanau vana-mālinaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.314 ||
radānāṃ rañjanaṃ rāga-cūrṇair ity ādi ceṣṭitam || RBhrs_2,1.317 ||
śarālir iva śāṇitā nakhara-rājir agre kharā |
na kā sakhi samīkṣaṇād yuvatir asya vitrasyati || RBhrs_2,1.318 ||
kartuṃ mugdhāḥ svayam acaṭunā na kṣamante 'bhiyogaṃ
na vyādātuṃ kvacid api jane vaktram apy utsahante |
sva-prāṇebhyas trayam udasṛjann adya toyāñjalīnām || RBhrs_2,1.319 ||
ūru-dvayasya bāhvoś ca kāpi śrīr urasas tathā |
mūrter mādhurimādyaṃ ca kaiśore sati madhyame || RBhrs_2,1.320 ||
tri-jagan-mohanaṃ gītam ity ādir iha mādhurī || RBhrs_2,1.322 ||
hares taruṇimāṅkure sphurati mādhurī kāpy abhūt || RBhrs_2,1.323 ||
govindasya vilāsa-vṛndam adhikaṃ vṛndāṭavī śaṃsati || RBhrs_2,1.325 ||
kathaṃ hā nas trāṇaṃ sakhi mukulayan bodha-kumudaṃ
tri-vali-vyaktir ity ādyaṃ kaiśore carame sati || RBhrs_2,1.327 ||
idam eva hareḥ prājñair nava-yauvanam ucyate || RBhrs_2,1.330 ||
kāntābhiḥ kalahāyate kvacid ayaṃ kandarpa-lekhān kvacit
sandhiṃ kvāpy anuśāsti kuñja-nṛpatiḥ śṛṅgāra-rājyottamam || RBhrs_2,1.332 ||
kaiśoreṇa tavādya kṛṣṇa guruṇā gaurī-gaṇaḥ paṭhyate || RBhrs_2,1.333 ||
netuḥ svarūpam evoktaṃ kaiśoram iha yadyapi |
tan nātirasa-vāhitvān na rasajñair udāhṛtam || RBhrs_2,1.335 ||
bhavet saundaryam aṅgānāṃ sanniveśo yathocitam || RBhrs_2,1.336 ||
na kasyāḥ kaṃsāre harati hṛdayaṃ paṅkaja-dṛśaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.337 ||
vibhūṣaṇaṃ vibhūṣyaṃ syād yena tad rūpam ucyate || RBhrs_2,1.338 ||
śaktā babhūva na manāg api tad-vidhāne
sā pratyuta svayam analpam alaṅkṛtāsīt || RBhrs_2,1.339 ||
api nava-pallava-saṅgād aṅgāny aparajya śīryanti || RBhrs_2,1.341 ||
guṇāḥ proktānta evātra jñeyā uddīpanā budhaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.342 ||
ceṣṭā rāsādi-līlāḥ syus tathā duṣṭa-vadhādayaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.343 ||
rāsārambha-rasārthino madhurimā cetāṃsi naḥ karṣati || RBhrs_2,1.344 ||
mlānaḥ salīlam api yatra śiro dhunāne |
taṃ duṣṭa-puṅgavam asau harir unmamātha || RBhrs_2,1.345 ||
yugaṃ catuṣkaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ vasanaṃ tri-vidhaṃ hareḥ || RBhrs_2,1.347 ||
priyam iva kila varṇaṃ rāga-yuktaṃ priyāyāḥ
uṣṇīṣaṃ dadhad aruṇaṃ dhaṭīṃ ca citrāḥ
kaṃsārir vahati mahotsave mudaṃ naḥ || RBhrs_2,1.351 ||
aneka-varṇaṃ vasanaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.352 ||
karoti karabhoru me ghana-rucir mudaṃ mādhavaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.353 ||
syāj jūṭaḥ kavarī cūḍā veṇī ca kaca-bandhanam |
pāṇḍuraḥ karburaḥ pīta ity ālepas tridhā mataḥ || RBhrs_2,1.355 ||
tathā viśeṣako 'pi syād anyad ūhyaṃ svayaṃ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_2,1.357 ||
śyāmāṅga-dyutir adya me sakhi dṛśor dugdhe mudaṃ mādhavaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.358 ||
kāñcī citrā mukuṭam atulaṃ kuṇḍale hāri-hīre
hāras tāro valayam amalaṃ candrā-cāruś catuṣkī |
ramyā cormir madhurima-pūre nūpure cety aghārer
aṅgair evābharaṇa-paṭalī bhūṣitā dogdhi bhūṣām || RBhrs_2,1.360 ||
pulakayati vapur naḥ kāpy apūrvā munīnām |
eṣa tridhā bhaved veṇu-muralī-vaṃśikety api || RBhrs_2,1.365 ||
sthaulye 'ṅguṣṭha-mitaḥ ṣaḍbhir eṣa randhraiḥ samanvitaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.366 ||
tataḥ sārdhāṅgulād yatra mukha-randhraṃ tathāṅgulam || RBhrs_2,1.368 ||
śiro vedāṅgulaṃ pucchaṃ try-aṅgulaṃ sā tu vaṃśikā |
mahānandeti vyākhyātā tathā saṃmohinīti ca || RBhrs_2,1.370 ||
bhavet sūryāntarā sā cet tata ākarṣiṇī matā |
ānandinī tadā vaṃśī bhaved indrāntarā yadi || RBhrs_2,1.371 ||
gopānāṃ vallabhā seyaṃ vaṃśulīti ca viśrutā |
kramān maṇimayī haimī vaiṇavīti tridhā ca sā || RBhrs_2,1.372 ||
bahir adya hanta guravaḥ puraḥ sthitāḥ || RBhrs_2,1.375 ||
prabhor amūny aṅghri-rajāṃsy aho iti || RBhrs_2,1.378 ||
praviśan nāma mano dhinoti naḥ || RBhrs_2,1.380 ||
atha tulasī, yathā bilvamaṅgale {*Not in any of the KK centuries.}--
kathaya sa dayitas te kvāyam āste vayasyaḥ || RBhrs_2,1.383 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau dakṣiṇa-vibhāge
bhakti-rasa-sāmānya-nirūpaṇe vibhāva-laharī prathamā |
te bahir vikriyā prāyāḥ proktā udbhāsvarākhyayā || RBhrs_2,2.1 ||
te śītāḥ kṣepaṇāś ceti yathārthākhyā dvidhoditāḥ |
śītāḥ syur gīta-jṛmbhādyā nṛtyādyāḥ kṣepaṇābhidhāḥ || RBhrs_2,2.3 ||
aho paśyata nārīṇām api kṛṣṇe jagad-gurau |

yathā vā padyāvalyām (73)--
parivadatu jano yathā tathā vā
śaṅke prema-bhujaṅgena daṣṭaḥ kaṣṭaṃ gato muniḥ |
niścalasya yad etasya lālā sravati vaktrataḥ || RBhrs_2,2.16 ||
na putri racayauṣadhaṃ visṛja romam atyuddhataṃ
mudhā priya-sakhīṃ prati tvam aśivaṃ kim āśaṅkase |
varākṣi harir ity asau vitanute 'dya hikkā-bharam || RBhrs_2,2.20 ||
bhāvaiś cittam ihākrāntaṃ sattvam ity ucyate budhaiḥ || RBhrs_2,3.1 ||
sattvād asmāt samutpannā ye ye bhāvās te tu sāttvikāḥ |
snigdhā digdhās tathā rukṣā ity amī trividhā matāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.2 ||
snigdhās tu sāttvikā mukhyā gauṇāś ceti dvidhā matāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.3 ||
ākramān mukhyayā ratyā mukhyāḥ syuḥ sāttvikā amī |
vijñeyaḥ kṛṣṇa-sambandhaḥ sākṣād evātra sūribhiḥ || RBhrs_2,3.4 ||
mukhyaḥ stambho 'yam itthaṃ te jñeyāḥ svedādayo 'pi ca || RBhrs_2,3.6 ||
atra kṛṣṇasya sambandhaḥ syāt kiñcid vyavadhānataḥ || RBhrs_2,3.7 ||
jane jāta-ratau digdhās te ced raty-anugāminaḥ || RBhrs_2,3.9 ||
kampo raty-anugāmitvād asau digdha itīryate || RBhrs_2,3.11 ||
jātā bhaktopame rukṣā rati-śūnye jane kvacit || RBhrs_2,3.12 ||
mumukṣu-prabhṛtau pūrvaṃ yo ratābhyāsa īritaḥ || RBhrs_2,3.14 ||
cittaṃ sattvībhavat prāṇe nyasyaty ātmānam udbhaṭam |
prāṇas tu vikriyāṃ gacchan dehaṃ vikṣobhayaty alam |
tadā stambhādayo bhāvā bhakta-dehe bhavanty amī || RBhrs_2,3.15 ||
vaivarṇyam aśru pralaya ity aṣṭau sāttvikāḥ smṛtāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.16 ||
kadācit sva-pradhānaḥ san dehe carati sarvataḥ || RBhrs_2,3.17 ||
romāñca-kampa-vaivarṇyāṇy atra trīṇi tanoty asau || RBhrs_2,3.19 ||
bahir antaś ca vikṣobha-vidhāyitvād ataḥ sphuṭam |
tad-dhāmnābhūd ajas tūṣṇīṃ pūr-devy-antīva putrikā || RBhrs_2,3.24 ||
śiśoḥ śyāmasya paśyantī śailam abhraṃlihaṃ kare |
kiṃ te kṛtaṃ kṣiti tapo bata keśavāṅghri-
śrīdāmno yoddhu-kāmasya reme romāñcitaṃ vapuḥ || RBhrs_2,3.35 ||
vaisvaryaṃ svara-bhedaḥ syād eṣa gadgadikādikṛt || RBhrs_2,3.37 ||
tvayy arpitaṃ vitara veṇum iti pramādī
patrī mukunda tad anena sa hārito 'sti || RBhrs_2,3.42 ||
cakampe drāg amarṣeṇa bhū-kampe girirāḍ iva || RBhrs_2,3.45 ||
vihasasi kathaṃ hatāśe paśya bhayenādya kampamānāsmi |
cañcalam upasīdantaṃ nivāraya vraja-pates tanayam || RBhrs_2,3.46 ||
gokulaṃ kṛṣṇa devarṣeḥ śvetadvīpa-bhramaṃ dadhe || RBhrs_2,3.48 ||
viṣāde śvetimā proktā dhausaryaṃ kālimā kvacit |
roṣe tu raktimā bhītyāṃ kālimā kvāpi śuklimā || RBhrs_2,3.51 ||
nābhyajānan imaṃ lokam ātma-lokaṃ gatā iva || RBhrs_2,3.60 ||
sarve hi sattva-mūlatvād bhāvā yadyapi sāttvikāḥ |
tata eva tāratamyaṃ sarveṣāṃ sāttvikānāṃ syāt || RBhrs_2,3.62 ||
vṛddhiṃ yathottaraṃ yāntaḥ sāttvikāḥ syuś catur-vidhāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.63 ||
svarūpeṇa tathotkarṣa iti vṛddhis tridhā bhavet || RBhrs_2,3.64 ||
prāyo dhūmāyitā eva rukṣās tiṣṭhanti sāttvikāḥ |
snigdhās tu prāyaśaḥ sarve caturdhaiva bhavanty amī || RBhrs_2,3.68 ||
jvalanty ullāsinaḥ kvāpi te rukṣā api kasyacit || RBhrs_2,3.69 ||
ete hi tad-vinābhāvān na camatkāritāśrayāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.70 ||
īṣad-vyaktā apahnotuṃ śakyā dhūmāyitā matāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.71 ||
te dvau trayo vā yugapad yāntaḥ suprakaṭāṃ daśām |
śakyāḥ kṛcchreṇa nihnotuṃ jvalitā iti kīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.73 ||
na guñjām ādātuṃ prabhavati karaḥ kampa-taralo
dṛśau sāsre piñchaṃ na paricinutaṃ satvara-kṛti |
kṣamāv ūrū stabdhau padam api na gantuṃ tava sakhe
vanād vaṃśī-dhvāne parisaram avāpte śravaṇayoḥ || RBhrs_2,3.74 ||
niruddhaṃ bāṣpāmbhaḥ katham api mayā gadgada-giro
hriyā sadyo gūḍhāḥ sakhi vighaṭito vepathur api |
tathāpy ūhāñcakre mama manasi rāgaḥ parijanaiḥ || RBhrs_2,3.75 ||
prauḍhāṃ tri-caturā vyaktiṃ pañca vā yugapad-gatāḥ |
saṃvarītum aśakyās te dīptā dhīrair udāhṛtāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.76 ||
na śaktim upavīṇane ciram adhatta kampākulo
madhu-dviṣi parisphuraty avaśam-mūrtir āsīn muniḥ || RBhrs_2,3.77 ||
kim unmīlaty asre kusumaja-rajo gañjasi mudhā
sa-romāñce kampe himam anilam ākrośasi kutaḥ |
kim ūru-stambhe vā vana-viharaṇaṃ dvekṣi sakhi te
nirābādhā rādhe vadati madanādhiṃ svara-bhidā || RBhrs_2,3.78 ||
ekadā vyaktim āpannāḥ pañca-ṣāḥ sarva eva vā |
ārūḍhā paramotkarṣam uddīptā iti kīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.79 ||
adya svidyati vepate pulakibhir nispandatām aṅgakair
dhatte kākubhir ākulaṃ vilapati mlāyaty analpoṣmabhiḥ |
sadyas tad-viraheṇa muhyati muhur goṣṭhādhivāsī janaḥ || RBhrs_2,3.80 ||
uddīptā eva sūddiptā mahā-bhāve bhavanty amī |
sarva eva parāṃ koṭiṃ sāttvikā yatra bibhrati || RBhrs_2,3.81 ||
niḥsattvāś ca pratīpāś ca yathā-pūrvam amī varāḥ || RBhrs_2,3.83 ||
vārāṇasī-nivāsī kaścid ayaṃ vyāharan hareś caritam |
yati-goṣṭhyām utpulakaḥ siñcati gaṇḍa-dvayīm asraiḥ || RBhrs_2,3.85 ||
mud-vismayāder ābhāsaḥ prodyan jātyā ślathe hṛdi |
sattvābhāsa iti proktaḥ sattvābhāsa-bhavās tataḥ || RBhrs_2,3.86 ||
niśamya vijayaṃ prabhor dadhati bāṣpa-dhārām amī || RBhrs_2,3.88 ||
sattvābhāsaṃ vināpi syuḥ kvāpy aśru-pulakādayaḥ || RBhrs_2,3.89 ||
niśamayato hari-caritaṃ na hi sukha-duḥkhādayo 'sya hṛdi bhāvāḥ |
anabhiniveśāj jātā katham asravad asram aśrāntam || RBhrs_2,3.90 ||
prakṛtyā śithilaṃ yeṣāṃ manaḥ picchilam eva vā |
teṣv eva sāttvikābhāsaḥ prāyaḥ saṃsadi jāyate || RBhrs_2,3.91 ||
hitād anyasya kṛṣṇasya pratīpāḥ krud-bhayādibhiḥ || RBhrs_2,3.92 ||
vaktraṃ kaṃsasya roṣeṇa rakta-sūryāyate tadā || RBhrs_2,3.93 ||
sāttvikānāṃ vivekāya dik tathāpi pradarśitā || RBhrs_2,3.96 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau dakṣiṇa-vibhāge
bhakti-rasa-sāmānya-nirūpaṇe sāttvika-laharī tṛtīyā |
ūrmivad vardhayanty enaṃ yānti tad-rūpatāṃ ca te || RBhrs_2,4.3 ||
nirvedo 'tha viṣādo dainyaṃ glāni-śramau ca mada-garvau |
moho mṛtir ālasyaṃ jāḍyaṃ vrīḍāvahitthā ca |
smṛtir atha vitarka-cintā-mati-dhṛtayo harṣa utsukatvaṃ ca || RBhrs_2,4.5 ||
augryam arṣāsūyāś cāpalyaṃ caiva nidrā ca |
suptir bodha itīme bhāvā vyabhicāriṇaḥ samākhyātāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.6 ||
īrṣyayā, yathā hari-vaṃśe (2.67.11) {*In critical edition, appendix 29.} satyādevī-vākyam--
stotavyā yadi tāvat sā nāradena tavāgrataḥ |
durbhago 'yaṃ janas tatra kim artham anuśabditaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.11 ||
amaṅgalam api procya nirvedaṃ prathamaṃ muniḥ |
mene 'muṃ sthāyinaṃ śānta iti jalpanti kecana || RBhrs_2,4.13 ||
jarāṃ yātā mūrtir mama vivaśatāṃ vāg api gatā
mayā hanta prāpto na bhajana-rucer apy avasaraḥ || RBhrs_2,4.16 ||
hā tāvad eva tarasā virarāma nidrā || RBhrs_2,4.17 ||
katham asau na nigṛhya gṛhe dhṛtaḥ |

aparādhāt, yathā śrī-daśame (10.14.9)--
paśyeśa me 'nāryam ananta ādye
hy ahaṃ kiyān aiccham ivārcir agnau || RBhrs_2,4.19 ||
syamantakam ahaṃ hṛtvā gato ghorāsyam antakam |
karavai taraṇīṃ kāṃ vā kṣipto vaitaraṇīyam anu || RBhrs_2,4.20 ||
abhayam ṛtam aśokaṃ pāhi māpannam īśa || RBhrs_2,4.22 ||
abhidravati mām īśa śaras taptāyaso vibho |
kāmaṃ dahatu māṃ nātha mā me garbho nipātyatām || RBhrs_2,4.23 ||

aparādhena, yathā śrī-daśame (10.14.10) --
ataḥ kṣamasvācyuta me rajo-bhuvo
mā'nayaṃ bhoḥ kṛthās tvāṃ tu nanda-gopa-sutaṃ priyam |
jānīmo 'ṅga vraja-ślāghyaṃ dehi vāsāṃsi vepitāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.25 ||
ojaḥ somātmakaṃ dehe bala-puṣṭi-kṛd asya tu |
prāmṛjat karuṇaḥ premṇā śantamenāṅga pāṇinā || RBhrs_2,4.34 ||
viveka-hara ullāso madaḥ sa dvi-vidho mataḥ |
bile kva nu vililyire nṛpa-pipīlikāḥ pīḍitāḥ
pinasmi jagad-aṇḍakaṃ nanu hariḥ krudhaṃ dhāsyati |
śacī-gṛha-kuraṅga re hasasi kiṃ tvam ity unnadann
kṛ-kṛṣṇa vavada drutaṃ ha-ha-hasanti kiṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ |
mada-skhalitam ālapan hala-dharaḥ śriyaḥ vaḥ kriyāt || RBhrs_2,4.37 ||
uttamas tu madāc chete madhyo hasati pāyati |
kaniṣṭhaḥ krośati svairaṃ puruṣaṃ vakti roditi || RBhrs_2,4.38 ||
atra nātyupayogitvād vistārya na hi varṇitaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.39 ||
pralapati muhur ālīṃ vandate paśya vṛnde
hastam utkṣipya yāto 'si balāt kṛṣṇa kim adbhutam |
hṛdayād yadi niryāsi pauruṣaṃ gaṇayāmi te || RBhrs_2,4.43 ||
dṛk-pātam ācaratu kṛṣṇa kathaṃ sakhī me || RBhrs_2,4.44 ||
kṛṣṇo madīyāṃ hṛdi vismitaḥ srajam || RBhrs_2,4.45 ||

sarvottamāśrayeṇa, yathā śrī-daśame (10.2.33)
tathā na te mādhava tāvakāḥ kvacid
svāniṣṭotprekṣaṇaṃ yat tu sā śaṅkety abhidhīyate |
śriyam aviśaṅkam alaṅkuru tvam aindrīm || RBhrs_2,4.51 ||
śaṅkā tu pravara-strīṇāṃ bhīrutvād bhaya-kṛd bhavet || RBhrs_2,4.53 ||
rakṣa kṛṣṇeti cukrośa ko 'pi gopī-stanandhayaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.55 ||
pūrvāpara-vicārotthaṃ bhayaṃ trāsāt pṛthag bhavet || RBhrs_2,4.58 ||
cittasya sambhramo yaḥ syād āvego 'yaṃ sa cāṣṭadhā |
saṅkulā pulakair āsīd ākulā gokuleśvarī || RBhrs_2,4.64 ||
kim idaṃ kim idaṃ kim etad uccair
dhīr vyagrājani naḥ samasta-suhṛdāṃ tāṃ prāṇa-rakṣā-maṇiṃ
gavyā gauravataḥ samīkṣya niviḍe tiṣṭhantam antar-vane |
vahniḥ paśya śikhaṇḍa-śekhara kharaṃ muñcann akhaṇḍa-dhvaniṃ
kṣauṇyām aprekṣya putraṃ vrajapati-gṛhiṇī paśya sambambhramīti || RBhrs_2,4.69 ||
gopā gopyaś ca śītārtā govindaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ || RBhrs_2,4.70 ||
ajaniṣata yuvāno 'py ākulās tvaṃ tu bālaḥ
sphuṭam asi tad-agārān mā sma bhūr niryiyāsuḥ || RBhrs_2,4.71 ||
upari ghuranti ca hanta ghoram ulkāḥ |
taṭam aṭatīty adhunā kim atra kuryām || RBhrs_2,4.72 ||
dragiṣṭhe muhur atra jāgrati bhuje vyagrāsi mātaḥ katham || RBhrs_2,4.75 ||
sthūlas tāla-bhujān natir giritaṭī-vakṣāḥ kva yakṣādhamaḥ
nāsty anyaḥ saha-kāritā-paṭur iha prāṇī na jānīmahe
hā goṣṭheśvari kīdṛg adya tapasāṃ pākas tavonmīlati || RBhrs_2,4.76 ||
saptiḥ saptī ratha iha rathaḥ kuñjaro me
tūṇas tūṇo dhanur uta dhanur bhoḥ kṛpāṇī kṛpāṇī |
kā bhīḥ kā bhīr ayam ayam ahaṃ hā tvaradhvaṃ tvaradhvaṃ
rājñaḥ putrī bata hṛta-hṛtā kāminā vallavena || RBhrs_2,4.77 ||
paśūn api kṛtāñjalir namati māntrikā ity alaṃ
tarūn api cikitsakā iti viṣauṣadhaṃ pṛcchati |
hradaṃ bhujaga-bhairavaṃ hari hari praviṣṭe harau
vrajendra-gṛhiṇī muhur bhrama-mayīm avasthāṃ gatā || RBhrs_2,4.82 ||
unmādaḥ pṛthag ukto 'yaṃ vyādhiṣv antarbhavann api |
yat tatra vipralambhādau vaicitrīṃ kurute parām || RBhrs_2,4.84 ||
śrutvā hanta hataṃ tvayā yadu-kulottaṃsātra kaṃsāsuraṃ
daityas tasya suhṛttamaḥ pariṇatiṃ ghorāṃ gataḥ kām api |
ghūrṇann arṇava-sīmni maṇḍalatayā bhrāmyan na viśrāmyati || RBhrs_2,4.88 ||
parāṃ bhayānakābhāse yat karoti camatkṛtim || RBhrs_2,4.89 ||
iha tat-prabhavo bhāvo vyādhir ity abhidhīyate |
moho hṛn-mūḍhatā harṣād viśleṣād bhayatas tathā |
viṣādādeś ca tatra syād dehasya patanaṃ bhuvi |
itthaṃ sma pṛṣṭaḥ sa tu bādarāyaṇis
avasthā tastāra sphuṭam atha suṣupteḥ priya-sakhī || RBhrs_2,4.95 ||
babhūvur indriyāṇīva vinā prāṇaṃ vicetasaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.97 ||
kṛṣṇa-sphūrti-viśeṣas tu na kadāpy atra līyate || RBhrs_2,4.98 ||
vivṛṇvantaḥ kāye kim api nava-vaivarṇyam abhitaḥ |
prajalpantaḥ prāṇān jahati mathurāyāṃ sukṛtinaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.100 ||
kṣayam agamad akasmāt pūtanā kāla-rātriḥ || RBhrs_2,4.101 ||
prāyo 'tra maraṇāt pūrvā citta-vṛttir mṛtir matā |
mṛtir atrānubhāvaḥ syād iti kenacid ucyate |
kintu nāyaka-vīryārthaṃ śatrau maraṇam ucyate || RBhrs_2,4.102 ||
viprāṇāṃ nas tathā tṛptir āsīd govardhanotsave |
nāśīrvāde 'pi gopendra yathā syāt prabhaviṣṇutā || RBhrs_2,4.105 ||
pūjāyāṃ nāvidat kṛtyaṃ pramādopahato nṛpaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.110 ||
yāvad ālakṣyate ketur yāvad reṇū rathasya ca |
mukunda viraheṇa te vidhuritāḥ sakhāyaś cirād
alaṅkṛtibhir ujjhitā bhuvi niviśya tatra sthitāḥ |
adhṛṣṭatā bhaved vrīḍā tatra maunaṃ vicintanam |
vikrīte kariṇi kim aṅkuśe vivādaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.114 ||
tvam avāg iha mā śiraḥ kṛthā
uddhavasya vyarociṣṭa namrī-bhūtaṃ tadā śiraḥ || RBhrs_2,4.116 ||
avajñayā, yathā hari-vaṃśe (2.67.19) {*In critical editon, appendix 29.} satyādevī-vākyam--
priyā bhūtvā'priyā bhūtā kathaṃ drakṣyāmi taṃ punaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.117 ||
sauśīlyataḥ kila na ko 'pi vidāmbabhūva || RBhrs_2,4.122 ||
dūti yatra smṛte mūrtir bhītyā romāñcitā mama || RBhrs_2,4.124 ||
prauḍhāpy asyā ratiḥ kṛṣṇe durvitarkā parair abhūt || RBhrs_2,4.125 ||
yatnena smitam atha saṃvavāra patrī || RBhrs_2,4.126 ||
hetuḥ kaścid bhavet kaścid gopyaḥ kaścana gopanaḥ |
hetutvaṃ gopanatvaṃ ca gopyatvaṃ cātra sambhavet |
bhaved atra śiraḥ-kampo bhrū-vikṣepādayo 'pi ca || RBhrs_2,4.129 ||
smāraṃ smāraṃ mukunda tvāṃ smāraṃ vikramam anvabhūt || RBhrs_2,4.130 ||
praṇidhāna-vidhim idānīm akurvato 'pi pramādato hṛdi me |
vimarṣāt saṃśayādeś ca vitarkas tūha ucyate |
na jānīṣe mūrdhnaś cyutam api śikhaṇḍaṃ yad akhilaṃ
na kaṇṭhe yan mālyaṃ kalayasi purastāt kṛtam api |
asau kiṃ tāpiñcho na hi tad-amala-śrīr iha gatiḥ
payodaḥ kiṃ vāmaṃ na yad iha niraṅko himakaraḥ |
dhruvaṃ mūrdhany adrer vidhu-mukhi mukundo viharati || RBhrs_2,4.134 ||
vinirṇayānta evāyaṃ tarka ity ūcire pare || RBhrs_2,4.135 ||
tasthur mṛjantya uru-duḥkha-bharāḥ sma tūṣṇīm || RBhrs_2,4.137 ||
katham api cirād adhyāsīnā praghāṇam aghāntaka |
vidhūrita-mukhī ghūrṇaty antaḥ prasūs tava cintayā
kim ahaha gṛhaṃ krīḍā-lubdha tvayādya visasmare || RBhrs_2,4.138 ||
tava sutam aham eva drāk parāvartayāmi || RBhrs_2,4.139 ||
upadeśaś ca śiṣyāṇām ūhāpohādayo 'pi ca || RBhrs_2,4.141 ||
vyāmohāya carācarasya jagatas te te purāṇāgamās
tāṃ tām eva hi devatāṃ paramikāṃ jalpantu kalpāvadhi |
siddhānte punar eka eva bhagavān viṣṇuḥ samastāgama-
ātmātmadaś ca jagatām iti me vṛto 'si |
śayīmahi mahī-pṛṣṭhe kurvīmahi kim īśvaraiḥ || RBhrs_2,4.145 ||
mano mama catur-vargaṃ tṛṇāyāpi na manyate || RBhrs_2,4.147 ||
harṣaḥ syād iha romāñcaḥ svedo 'śru mukha-phullatā |
candanāliptam āghrāya hṛṣṭaromā cucumba ha || RBhrs_2,4.150 ||
sadyo visṛjya gṛha-karma patīṃś ca talpe
draṣṭuṃ yayur yuvatayaḥ sma narendra-mārge || RBhrs_2,4.152 ||
druta-gati harim ārāt prāpya kuñje smitākṣī |
snapayati nija-dāsye rādhikā māṃ kadā nu || RBhrs_2,4.153 ||
huta-bhuji bata kuryāṃ jāṭhare vauṣaḍ enaṃ
sapadi danuja-hantuḥ kintu roṣād bibhemi || RBhrs_2,4.156 ||
na hi danuja-ripor yaḥ prauṅdha-kīrter visoḍhum |
śirasi pṛthuni tasya nyasyate savya-pādaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.157 ||
hahā bata viḍambanā śiva śivādya naḥ śṛṇvatāṃ
haṭhād iha kaṭākṣayanty akhila-vandyam apy acyutam || RBhrs_2,4.158 ||
kalyāṇī me nivasati vadhūḥ paśya pārśve navoḍhā |
niḥśaṅkas tvaṃ bhramasi bhavitā nākulatvaṃ kuto me || RBhrs_2,4.161 ||
jane bhavati mad-vidhe paribhavo hi nātaḥ paraḥ |
varāpi yad ayogyayā sphuṭam adūṣi tārākhyayā || RBhrs_2,4.162 ||
kitava yoṣitaḥ kas tyajen niśi || RBhrs_2,4.163 ||
tatra anya-saubhāgyena, yathā padyāvalyām (302) {*Attributed to Dāmodara in Padyāvalī. Also found in Amaru 55; SKM 2.140.5 keśaṭasya; Smv 86.14; SāhD 3.105 (as an example of mada); Daśa 2.22.}--
anyāpi kiṃ na sakhi bhājanam īdṛśīnāṃ
vairī na ced bhavati vepathur antarāyaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.165 ||
tasyā amūni naḥ kṣobhaṃ kurvanty uccaiḥ padāni yat |
svayaṃ parājayaṃ prāptān kṛṣṇa-pakṣān vijitya naḥ |
baliṣṭhā bala-pakṣāś ced durbalāḥ ke tataḥ kṣitau || RBhrs_2,4.167 ||
guror api puro nīvīṃ yā bhraṃśayati subhruvām || RBhrs_2,4.170 ||
sukham avicalad-aṅgāḥ śerate paśya gopāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.174 ||
vakṣasi nikṣiptāṅgī harer viśākhā yayau nidrām || RBhrs_2,4.175 ||
hṛn-mīlanāt puro 'vasthā nidrā bhakteṣu kathyate || RBhrs_2,4.176 ||
darpaḥ sarpa-pates tad asya tarasā nirdhūyatām uddhūraḥ |
ity utsvapna-girā cirād yadu-sabhāṃ vismāpayan smerayan
niḥśvāsena darottaraṅgad-udaraṃ nidrāṃ gato lāṅgalī || RBhrs_2,4.178 ||
drutaṃ mūrcchām antaḥ sakhi sukha-mayīṃ pallavayati || RBhrs_2,4.185 ||
iyaṃ te hāsa-śrīr viramatu vimuñcāñcalam idaṃ
iti svapne jalpanty aciram avabuddhā gurum asau
puro dṛṣṭvā gaurī namita-mukha-bimbā muhur abhūt || RBhrs_2,4.188 ||
dūtī cāgāt tad-āgāraṃ jajāgāra ca rādhikā |
tūrṇaṃ puṇyavatīnāṃ hi tanoti phalam udyamaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.189 ||
klaibyaṃ kṣamā ca kutukam utkaṇṭhā vinayo 'pi ca || RBhrs_2,4.192 ||
saṃśayo dhārṣṭyam ity ādyā bhāvā ye syuḥ pare 'pi ca |
ukteṣv antarbhavantīti na pṛthaktvena darśitāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.193 ||
asūyāyāṃ tu mātsaryaṃ trāse 'py udvega eva tu |
viveko nirṇayaś cemau dainye klaibyaṃ kṣamā dhṛtau || RBhrs_2,4.194 ||
saṃśayo 'ntarbhavet tarke tathā dhārṣṭyaṃ ca cāpale || RBhrs_2,4.195 ||
vibhāvaś cānubhāvaś ca bhaved eva parasparam || RBhrs_2,4.196 ||
nirvede tu yatherṣyāyā bhaved atra vibhāvatā |
asūyāyāṃ punas tasyā vyaktam uktānubhāvatā || RBhrs_2,4.197 ||
nidrāṃ prati vibhāvatvam evaṃ jñeyaḥ pare 'py amī || RBhrs_2,4.198 ||
eṣāṃ ca sāttvikānāṃ ca tathā nānā-kriyā-tateḥ |
kārya-kāraṇa-bhāvas tu jñeyaḥ prāyeṇa lokataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.199 ||
augryaṃ pratyanubhāvatvam evaṃ jñeyāḥ pare 'pi ca || RBhrs_2,4.201 ||
sañcāriṇām iha kvāpi bhaved raty-anubhāvatā || RBhrs_2,4.202 ||
sākṣād-rater na sambandhaḥ ṣaḍbhis trāsādibhiḥ saha |
paratantrāḥ svatantrāś cety uktāḥ sañcāriṇo dvidhā || RBhrs_2,4.205 ||
varāvaratayā proktāḥ paratantrā api dvidhā || RBhrs_2,4.206 ||
sākṣād vyavahitaś ceti varo 'py eṣa dvidhoditaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.207 ||
mukhyām eva ratiṃ puṣṇan sākṣād ity abhidhīyate || RBhrs_2,4.208 ||
vyarthena kiṃ hanta dṛśor dvayena || RBhrs_2,4.209 ||
puṣṇāti yo ratiṃ gauṇīṃ sa vyavahito mataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.210 ||
dhig astu me bhuja-dvandvaṃ bhīmasya parighopamam |
mādhavākṣepiṇaṃ duṣṭaṃ yat pinaṣṭi na cedipam || RBhrs_2,4.211 ||
nirvedaḥ krodha-vaśyatvād ayaṃ vyavahito rateḥ || RBhrs_2,4.212 ||
rasa-dvayasyāpy aṅgatvam agacchann avaro mataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.213 ||
na svaṃ viśuṣyan smarati sma jiṣṇuḥ || RBhrs_2,4.214 ||
durvarāvirabhūd bhītir moho 'yaṃ bhī-vaśas tataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.215 ||
rati-gandhiś ca te tredhā svatantrāḥ parikīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.217 ||
janeṣu rati-śūnyeṣu rati-śūnyo bhaved asau || RBhrs_2,4.218 ||
dhig janma nas trivṛd-vidyāṃ dhig vrataṃ dhig bahujñatām |
dhik kulaṃ dhik kriyā-dīkṣāṃ vimukhā ye tv adhokṣaje || RBhrs_2,4.219 ||
paścād ratiṃ spṛśed eṣa raty-anusparśano mataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.220 ||
hā kṛṣṇa pāhi pāhīti cukrośābhīra-bālikā || RBhrs_2,4.221 ||
yaḥ svātantrye 'pi tad-gandhaṃ rati-gandhir vyanakti saḥ || RBhrs_2,4.222 ||
saṅgopanāya na hi naptri vidhehi yatnam |
ābhāsaḥ punar eteṣām asthāne vṛttito bhavet |
vipakṣe vṛttir eteṣāṃ prātikūlyam itīryate || RBhrs_2,4.225 ||
aprāṇini bhaved ādyaḥ tiryag-ādiṣu cāntimam || RBhrs_2,4.228 ||
chāyā na yasya sakṛd apy upasevitābhūt
kṛṣṇena hanta mama tasya dhig astu janma |
mā tvaṃ kadamba vidhuro bhava kāliyāhiṃ
mṛdnan kariṣyati hariś caritārthatāṃ te || RBhrs_2,4.229 ||
adhirohatu kaḥ pakṣī kakṣām aparo mamādya medhyasya |
hitvāpi tārkṣya-paksaṃ bhajate pakṣaṃ harir yasya || RBhrs_2,4.230 ||
daśāś catasra etāsām utpattis tv iha sambhavaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.232 ||
uṣasi sakhi tavālī mekhalā paśya bhāti |
dṛśam anṛju kirantī rādhikā vaḥ punātu || RBhrs_2,4.234 ||
sarūpayor bhinnayor vā sandhiḥ syād bhāvayor yutiḥ || RBhrs_2,4.235 ||
sandhiḥ sarūpayos tatra bhinna-hetūtthayor mataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.236 ||
durvāracāpalo 'yaṃ dhāvann antar bahiś ca goṣṭhasya |
śiśur akutaścid bhītir dhinoti hṛdayaṃ dunoti ca me || RBhrs_2,4.239 ||
himam uṣṇaṃ ca jalaṃ dṛśor dadhe || RBhrs_2,4.240 ||
bahūnām api bhāvānāṃ sandhiḥ sphuṭam avekṣyate || RBhrs_2,4.241 ||
dṛśaṃ nyasyanty asmin jayati vṛṣabhānoḥ kula-maṇiḥ || RBhrs_2,4.242 ||
harim api dara-dūre svāminaṃ tatra cāsīn
śavalatvaṃ tu bhāvānāṃ saṃmardaḥ syāt parasparam || RBhrs_2,4.244 ||
śaktaḥ kiṃ nāma kartuṃ sa śiśur ahaha me mitra-pakṣānadhākṣīd
ātiṣṭheyaṃ tam eva drutam atha śaraṇaṃ kuryur etan na vīrāḥ |
āṃ divyā malla-goṣṭhī viharati sa kareṇoddadhārādri-varyaṃ
kuryām adyaiva gatvā vraja-bhuvi kadanaṃ hā tataḥ kampate dhīḥ || RBhrs_2,4.245 ||
dhig dīrghe nayane mamāstu mathurā yābhyāṃ na sā prekṣyate
vidyeyaṃ mama kiṅkarī-kṛta-nṛpā kālas tu sarvaṅkaraḥ |
lakṣmī-keli-gṛhaṃ gṛhaṃ mama hahā nityaṃ tanuḥ kṣīyate
sadmany eva hariṃ bhajeya hṛdayaṃ vṛndāṭavī karṣati || RBhrs_2,4.246 ||
atyārūḍhasya bhāvasya vilayaḥ śāntir ucyate || RBhrs_2,4.247 ||
trayastriṃśad ime 'ṣṭau ca vakṣyante sthāyinaś ca ye |
mukhya-bhāvābhidhās tv eka-catvāriṃśad amī smṛtāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.250 ||
kvacit svābhāviko bhāvaḥ kaścid āgantukaḥ kvacit |
yas tu svābhāviko bhāvaḥ sa vyāpyāntar-bahiḥ-sthitaḥ || RBhrs_2,4.252 ||
mañjiṣṭhādye yathā dravye rāgas tan-maya īkṣyate |
atra syān nāma-mātreṇa vibhāvasya vibhāvatā || RBhrs_2,4.253 ||
eka-rūpāpi yā bhakter vividhā pratibhāty asau || RBhrs_2,4.254 ||
āgantukas tu yo bhāvaḥ paṭādau raktimeva saḥ |
tais tair vibhāvair evāyaṃ dhīyate dīpyate 'pi ca || RBhrs_2,4.255 ||
vividhānāṃ tu bhaktānāṃ vaiśiṣṭyād vividhaṃ manaḥ |
samyag-unmīlitāś cāmī na lakṣyante sphuṭaṃ janaiḥ || RBhrs_2,4.258 ||
manāg-unmīlitāś cāmī lakṣyante bahir ulbaṇāḥ || RBhrs_2,4.259 ||
pattanābhaṃ mahiṣṭhaṃ syāt kṣodiṣṭhaṃ tu kuṭiravat |
karkaśaṃ trividhaṃ proktaṃ vajraṃ svarṇaṃ tathā jatu |
īdṛśaṃ tāpasādīnāṃ cittaṃ tāvad avekṣyate || RBhrs_2,4.264 ||
jatu dravatvam āyāti tāpa-leśena sarvataḥ || RBhrs_2,4.265 ||
amṛtaṃ ceti bhāvo 'tra prāyaḥ sūryātapāyate || RBhrs_2,4.266 ||
govinda-preṣṭha-varyāṇāṃ cittaṃ syād amṛtaṃ kila || RBhrs_2,4.267 ||
samavetaṃ sadāmībhir dvitrair api mano bhavet || RBhrs_2,4.268 ||
kintu suṣṭhu mahiṣṭhatvaṃ bhāvo bāḍham upāgataḥ |
sarva-prakāram evedaṃ cittaṃ vikṣobhayaty alam || RBhrs_2,4.269 ||
ahāryāṃ maryādāṃ dadhad api harer āspadam api |
satāṃ stomaḥ premaṇy udayati samagre sthagayituṃ
vikāraṃ na sphāraṃ jala-nidhir ivendau prabhavati || RBhrs_2,4.270 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau dakṣiṇa-vibhāge
bhakti-rasa-sāmānya-nirūpaṇe vyabhicāri-laharī caturthī ||
aviruddhān viruddhāṃś ca bhāvān yo vaśatāṃ nayan |
su-rājeva virājeta sa sthāyī bhāva ucyate || RBhrs_2,5.1 ||
sthāyī bhāvo 'tra sa proktaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-viṣayā ratiḥ |
mukhyā gauṇī ca sā dvedhā rasa-jñaiḥ parikīrtitā || RBhrs_2,5.2 ||
mukhyāpi dvi-vidhā svārthā parārthā ceti kīrtyate || RBhrs_2,5.3 ||
aviruddhaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāvaiḥ puṣṇāty ātmānam eva yā |
viruddhair duḥkha-glāniḥ sā svārthā kathitā ratiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.4 ||
aviruddhaṃ viruddhaṃ ca saṅkucantī svayaṃ ratiḥ |
yā bhāvam anugṛhṇāti sā parārthā nigadyate || RBhrs_2,5.5 ||
śuddhā prītis tathā sakhyaṃ vātsalyaṃ priyatety asau |
svaparārthyaiva sā mukhyā punaḥ pañca-vidhā bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.6 ||
sāmānyāsau tathā svacchā śāntiś cety ādimā tridhā |
bālikadaiś ca kṛṣṇe syāt sāmānyā sā ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.9 ||
asmin mathurā-vīthyām udayati madhure virocane purataḥ |
kathasva sakhe mradimānaṃ mānasa-madanaṃ kim eti mama || RBhrs_2,5.10 ||
yā puraḥ kṛṣṇam ālokya huṅkurvaty abhidhāvati || RBhrs_2,5.11 ||
sādhākānāṃ tu vaividhyaṃ yāntī svacchā ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.12 ||
yadā yādṛśī bhakte syād āsaktis tādṛśaṃ tadā |
rūpaṃ sphaṭikavad dhatte svacchāsau tena kīrtitā || RBhrs_2,5.13 ||
kvacit prabhur iti stuvan kvacana mitram ity uddhasan
kvacit tanaya ity avan kvacana kānta ity ullasan |
kvacin manasi bhāvayan parama eṣa ātmety asāv
abhūd vividha-sevayā vividha-vṛttir āryo dvijaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.14 ||
āryāṇām atiśuddhānāṃ prāyaḥ svacchā ratir bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.15 ||
mānase nirvikalpatvaṃ śama ity abhidhīyate || RBhrs_2,5.16 ||
ātmanaḥ kathyate so 'tra svabhāvaḥ śama ity asau || RBhrs_2,5.17 ||
paramātmatayā kṛṣṇe jātā śānta-ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.18 ||
sanakasya tanau kampo brahmānubhavino 'py abhūt || RBhrs_2,5.19 ||
paramaṃ brahma didṛkṣate mano me || RBhrs_2,5.20 ||
rater asyā asamparkād iyaṃ śuddheti bhaṇyate || RBhrs_2,5.21 ||
atha bheda-trayī hṛdyā rateḥ prīty-ādir īryate |
tri-vidheṣu trayī prītiḥ sakhyaṃ vatsalatety asau || RBhrs_2,5.23 ||
kevalā saṅkulā ceti dvi-vidheyaṃ rati-trayī || RBhrs_2,5.24 ||
gurau ca vrajanāthādau krameṇaiva sphuraty asau || RBhrs_2,5.25 ||
eṣāṃ dvayos trayāṇāṃ vā sannipātas tu saṅkulā |
udbhavādau ca bhīmādau mathurādau krameṇa sā |
yasyādhikyaṃ bhaved yatra sa tena vyapadiśyate || RBhrs_2,5.26 ||
svasmād bhavanti ye nyūnās te 'nugrāhyā harer matāḥ |
ārādhyatvātmikā teṣāṃ ratiḥ prītir itīritā || RBhrs_2,5.27 ||
tatrāsakti-kṛd anyatra prīti-saṃhāriṇī hy asau || RBhrs_2,5.28 ||
divi vā bhuvi vā mamāstu vāso
ye syus tulyā mukundasya te sakhāyaḥ satāṃ matāḥ |
sadyas tvayā tad api kathanam eva kṛtvā
devyai hriye trayam adāyi jvalāñjalīnām || RBhrs_2,5.32 ||
guravo ye harer asya te pūjyā iti viśrutāḥ |
gās tatra rakṣitum asau gahane mṛdur me
bālaḥ prayāty avirataṃ bata kiṃ karomi || RBhrs_2,5.34 ||
ratir vāsanayā svādvī bhāsate kāpi kasyacit || RBhrs_2,5.38 ||
saṅkucantyā svayaṃ ratyā sa gauṇī ratir ucyate || RBhrs_2,5.39 ||
hāso vismaya utsāhaḥ śokaḥ krodho bhayaṃ tathā |
jugupsā cety asau bhāva-viśeṣaḥ saptadhoditaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.40 ||
syād dehādi-vibhāvatvaṃ saptamyās tu rater vaśāt || RBhrs_2,5.41 ||
parārthāyā rater yogād rati-śabdaḥ prayujyate || RBhrs_2,5.42 ||
hāsottarā ratir yā syāt sā hāsa-ratir ucyate |
evaṃ vismaya-raty-ādyā vijñeyā ratayaś ca ṣaṭ || RBhrs_2,5.43 ||
kañcit kālaṃ kvacid bhakte hāsādyāḥ sthāyitām amī |
sahajā api līyante baliṣṭhena tiraskṛtāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.45 ||
syur etasyā vinā-bhāvād bhāvāḥ sarve nirarthakāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.46 ||
nirvedādyā vilīyante nārhanti sthāyitāṃ tataḥ || RBhrs_2,5.48 ||
ity ato mati-garvādi-bhāvānāṃ ghaṭate na hi |
sthāyitā kaiścid iṣṭāpi pramāṇaṃ tatra tad-vidaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.49 ||
sapta hāsādayas tv ete tais tair nītāḥ supuṣṭatām |
bhakteṣu sthāyitāṃ yānto rucir ebhyo vitanvate || RBhrs_2,5.50 ||
mayā dṛg api nārpitā sumukhi dadhni tubhyaṃ śape
sakhī tava nirargalā tad api me mukhaṃ jighrati |
praśādhi tad imāṃ mudhā cchalita-sādhum ity acyute
vadaty ajani dūtikā hasita-rodhane na kṣamā || RBhrs_2,5.54 ||
pūrvokta-rītyā niṣpannaḥ sa vismaya-ratir bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.55 ||
para-brahmollāsān vahati kim idaṃ hanta kim idam || RBhrs_2,5.56 ||
satvarā mānasāsaktir utsāha iti kīrtyate || RBhrs_2,5.57 ||
siddhaḥ pūrvokta-vidhinā sa utsāha ratir bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.58 ||
niṣpannaṃ pūrvavad idaṃ budhā bhaya-ratiṃ viduḥ |
eṣāpi krodha-rativad dvi-vidhā kathitā budhaiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.68 ||
rater anugrahāj jātā sā jugupsā-ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.71 ||
ity aṣṭau sthāyino yāvad rasāvasthāṃ na saṃśritāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.73 ||
ihāṣṭau sāttvikāś caite bhāvākhyās tān asaṅkhyakāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.74 ||
prāyaḥ sukha-mayāḥ śītā uṣṇā duḥkha-mayā iha |
citreyaṃ paramānanda-sāndrāpy uṣṇā ratir matā || RBhrs_2,5.77 ||
śītair bhāvair baliṣṭhais tu puṣṭā śītāyate hy asau |
uṣṇais tu ratir atyuṣṇā tāpayantīva bhāsate || RBhrs_2,5.78 ||
ratir dvidhāpi kṛṣṇādyaiḥ śrutair avagataiḥ smṛtaiḥ |
tair vibhāvāditāṃ yadbhis tad-bhakteṣu raso bhavet || RBhrs_2,5.79 ||
gacchanto rasa-rūpatvaṃ militā yānty akhaṇḍatām || RBhrs_2,5.83 ||
udbhāsaḥ kasyacit kvāpi vibhāvādes tathā rase || RBhrs_2,5.84 ||
stambhādyāḥ kāra-bhūtāś ca nirvedādyāḥ sahāyakāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.85 ||
vibhāvayanti kurvantīty uktā dhīrair vibhāvakāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.87 ||
ity uktā anubhāvās te kaṭākṣādyāḥ sa-sāttvikāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.88 ||
ye nirvedādayo bhāvās te tu sañcāriṇo matāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.89 ||
sevām āhuḥ paraṃ hetuṃ kecit tat-pakṣa-rāgiṇaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.90 ||
rater asyāḥ prabhāvo 'yaṃ bhavet kāraṇam uttamam || RBhrs_2,5.91 ||
raty-ākhyā ity ayaṃ yukto na hi tarkeṇa bādhitum |
bhāratādy-uktir eṣā hi prāktanair apy udāhṛtā || RBhrs_2,5.92 ||
acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃs tarkeṇa yojayet
prakṛtibhyaḥ paraṃ yac ca tad acintyasya lakṣaṇam || RBhrs_2,5.93 ||
etair eva tathābhūtaiḥ svaṃ saṃvardhayati sphuṭam || RBhrs_2,5.94 ||
yathā svair eva salilaiḥ paripūrya balāhakān |
ratnālayo bhavaty ebhir vṛṣṭais tair eva vāridhiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.95 ||
rater eva prabhāvo 'yaṃ hetus teṣāṃ tathākṛtau || RBhrs_2,5.97 ||
tathānubhūyamānās te vistīrṇāṃ kurvate ratim || RBhrs_2,5.98 ||
atra sāhāyikaṃ vyaktaṃ mitho 'jasram avekṣyate || RBhrs_2,5.99 ||
kintv etasyāḥ prabhāvo 'pi vairūpye sati kuñcati |
vairūpyas tu vibhāvāder anaucityam udīryate || RBhrs_2,5.100 ||
yatra sādhāraṇatayā bhāvāḥ sādhu sphuranty amī || RBhrs_2,5.101 ||
sādhāraṇyaṃ tad evoktaṃ bhāvānāṃ pūrva-sūribhiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.102 ||

tad uktaṃ śrī-bharatena--
śaktir asti vibhāvādeḥ kāpi sādhāraṇī-kṛtau |
pramātā tad-abhedena svaṃ yayā pratipadyate || RBhrs_2,5.103 || iti |
duḥkhādayaḥ sphuranto 'pi jātu bhāntaḥ svīyatayā hṛdi |
rasaḥ syān neti nāṭya-jñā yad āhur yuktam eva tat || RBhrs_2,5.107 ||
yoge rasa-viśeṣatvaṃ gacchanty eva hari-priye || RBhrs_2,5.108 ||
rasasya sva-prakāśatvam akhaṇḍatvaṃ ca sidhyati || RBhrs_2,5.112 ||
pūrvam uktād dvidhā bhdedān mukhya-gauṇatayā rateḥ |
bhaved bhakti-raso 'py eṣa mukhya-gauṇatayā dvidhā || RBhrs_2,5.113 ||
pañcadhāpi rater aikyān mukhyas tv eka ihoditaḥ |
saptadhātra tathā gauṇa iti bhakti-raso 'ṣṭadhā || RBhrs_2,5.114 ||
mukhyas tu pañcadhā śāntaḥ prītaḥ preyāṃś ca vatsalaḥ |
madhuraś cety amī jñeyā yathā-pūrvam anuttamāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.115 ||
hāsyo 'dbhutas tathā vīraḥ karuṇo raudra ity api |
bhayānakaḥ sa bībhatsa iti gauṇaś ca saptadhā || RBhrs_2,5.116 ||
vastutas tu purāṇādau pañcadhaiva vilokyate || RBhrs_2,5.117 ||
gauro dhūmras tathā raktaḥ kālo nītaḥ kramād amī || RBhrs_2,5.118 ||
balaḥ kūrmas tathā kalkī rāghavo bhārgavaḥ kiriḥ |
mīna ity eṣu kathitāḥ kramād dvādaśa devatāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.119 ||
pūrtiḥ śānte vikāśas tu prītādiṣv api pañcasu |
bhayānake 'tha bībhatse kṣobho dhīrair udāhṛtaḥ || RBhrs_2,5.121 ||
pratīyamānā apy ajñair grāmyaiḥ sapadi duḥkhavat |
karuṇādyā rasāḥ prājñaiḥ prauḍhānanda-mayā matāḥ || RBhrs_2,5.123 ||
sad-uktyā ca sukhaṃ tebhyaḥ syāt suvyaktam iti sthitiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.124 ||
karuṇādāv api rase jāyate yat paraṃ sukham |
sucetasām anubhavaḥ pramāṇaṃ tatra kevalam || RBhrs_2,5.125 ||
prītyā rāmāyaṇaṃ nityaṃ hanumān śṛṇuyāt katham || RBhrs_2,5.127 ||
sañcārī syāt samāno vā kṛṣṇa-ratyāḥ suhṛd-ratiḥ |
adhikā puṣyamāṇā ced bhāvollāsā ratiḥ || RBhrs_2,5.128 ||
ity eṣa bhakti-rasikaś caurād iva mahā-nidhiḥ |
hṛdi sattvojjvale bāḍhaṃ svadate sa raso mataḥ || RBhrs_2,5.132 ||
bhāvyate gāḍha-saṃskāraiś citte bhāvaḥ sa kathyate || RBhrs_2,5.133 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau dakṣiṇa-vibhāge
bhakti-rasa-sāmānya-nirūpaṇe sthāyi-bhāva-laharī pañcamī |
sa mayi sanātana-mūrtis tanotu puruṣottamas tuṣṭim || RBhrs_3,1.1 ||
mukhyo bhakti-rasaḥ pañcavidhaḥ śāntādīr īryate || RBhrs_3,1.2 ||
athāmī pañca lakṣyante rasāḥ śāntādayaḥ kramāt || RBhrs_3,1.3 ||
sthāyī śānti-ratir dhīraiḥ śānta-bhakti-rasaḥ smṛtaḥ || RBhrs_3,1.4 ||
prāyaḥ sva-sukha-jātīyaṃ sukhaṃ syād atra yoginām |
kintv ātma-saukhyam aghanaṃ ghanaṃ tv īśam ayaṃ sukham || RBhrs_3,1.5 ||
caturbhujaś ca śāntāś ca asminn ālambanā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,1.7 ||
paramātmā paraṃ brahma śamo dāntaḥ śucir vaśī || RBhrs_3,1.9 ||
vibhur ity ādi guṇavān asminn ālambano hariḥ || RBhrs_3,1.10 ||
prādhānyāt sanakādīnāṃ rūpaṃ bhaktiś ca kathyate || RBhrs_3,1.12 ||
gate kim api vastuni svayam adīpi tāvat sukham |
mukunda sukha-cid-ghanā tava babhūva sākṣāt-kṛtiḥ || RBhrs_3,1.14 ||
anujjhita-mumukṣā ye bhajante te tu tāpasāḥ || RBhrs_3,1.15 ||
hṛdi dhyāyaṃ dhyāyaṃ muhur iha mukundābhidham ahaṃ
cidānandaṃ jyotiḥ kṣaṇam iva vineṣyāmi rajanīḥ || RBhrs_3,1.16 ||
eṣv asādhāraṇāḥ proktā budhair uddīpanā amī || RBhrs_3,1.19 ||
ityādy uddīpanā sādhāraṇās teṣāṃ kilāśritaiḥ || RBhrs_3,1.22 ||
harer dviṣy api na dveṣo nātibhaktiḥ priyeṣv api |
siddhatāyās tathā jīvan-mukteś ca bahu-mānitā || RBhrs_3,1.25 ||
maunam ity ādayaḥ śītāḥ syur asādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,1.26 ||
stavādayaś ca dāsādyaiḥ śītāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,1.28 ||
sāttvikās tu jvalanty eva na tu dīptā bhavanty amī || RBhrs_3,1.32 ||
sañcārino 'tra nirvedo dhṛtir harṣo matiḥ smṛtiḥ |
vṛthā gato bata ciraṃ kālaḥ || RBhrs_3,1.34 ||
atra śānti-ratiḥ sthāyī samā sāndrā ca sā dvidhā || RBhrs_3,1.35 ||
līlayā mayi labdhe 'sya babhūvotkampinī tanuḥ || RBhrs_3,1.36 ||
