vilocana-camatkṛtiṃ kathaya kiṃ nu nirmāsyati || RBhrs_3,1.39 ||
na pratyag-ātmani mano ramate pureva || RBhrs_3,1.40 ||
mūrdhnā ruddha-dṛg-aśrubhiḥ pulakito drāg eṣa līna-vrataḥ |
akṣṇor aṅganam añjana-tviṣi para-brahmaṇy avāpte mudā
mudrābhiḥ prakaṭīkaroty avamatiṃ yogī svarūpa-sthitau || RBhrs_3,1.42 ||
prathamaṃ jñāna-niṣṭho 'pi so 'traiva ratim udvahet || RBhrs_3,1.43 ||
eṣa bhakti-rasānanda-nipuṇaḥ syād yathā śukaḥ || RBhrs_3,1.45 ||
śānty-ākhyāyā rater atra svīkārān na virudhyate || RBhrs_3,1.46 ||
tan-niṣṭhā durghaṭā buddher etāṃ śānta-ratiṃ vinā || RBhrs_3,1.47 ||
nāsti yatra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na dveṣo na ca matsaraḥ |
samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sa śāntaḥ prathito rasaḥ || RBhrs_3,1.48 ||
śāntam eva rasaṃ pūrve prāhur ekam anekadhā || RBhrs_3,1.50 ||
nirvedo viṣaye sthāyi tattva-jñānodbhavaḥ sa cet |

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau
paścima-vibhāge mukhya-bhakti-rasa-pañcaka-nirūpaṇe
śānta-bhakti-rasa-laharī prathamā |
śāntatvenāyam evāddhā sudevādyaiś ca varṇitaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.2 ||
nītā cetasi bhaktānāṃ prīti-bhakti-raso mataḥ || RBhrs_3,2.3 ||
anugrāhyasya dāsatvāl lālyatvād apy ayaṃ dvidhā |
bhidyate sambhrama-prīto gaurava-prīta ity api || RBhrs_3,2.4 ||
hariś ca tasya dāsāś ca jñeyā ālambanā iha || RBhrs_3,2.6 ||
anyatra dvi-bhujaḥ kvāpi kutrāpy eṣu catur-bhujaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.7 ||
prabhur divi divaukaso bhuvi dhinoti naḥ kiṅkarān || RBhrs_3,2.8 ||
sakhyenojjvalitais tathā jalajayor āḍhyaś caturbhir bhujaiḥ |
māṃ vyasmārayad eṣa kaṃsa-vijayī vaikuṇṭha-goṣṭhī-śriyam || RBhrs_3,2.10 ||
vadānyas tejasā yuktaḥ kṛtajñaḥ kīrti-saṃśrayaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.14 ||
varīyān balavān prema-vaśya ity ādibhir guṇaiḥ |
yutaś catur-vidheṣv eṣa dāseṣv ālambano hariḥ || RBhrs_3,2.15 ||
rūpaṃ prasiddham evaiṣāṃ tena bhaktir udīryate || RBhrs_3,2.19 ||
kā paryety ambikeyaṃ harim avakalayan kampate kaḥ śiro 'sau
taṃ kaḥ stauty eṣa dhātā praṇamati viluṭhan kaḥ kṣitau vāsavo 'yam |
kaḥ stabdho hasyate 'ddhā danujabhid-anujaiḥ pūrvajo 'yaṃ mametthaṃ
kālindī jāmbavatyāṃ tridaśa-paricayaṃ jāla-randhrād vyatānīt || RBhrs_3,2.20 ||
te śaraṇyā jñāni-carāḥ sevā-niṣṭhās tridhāśritāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.21 ||
kecid bhītāḥ śaraṇam abhitaḥ saṃśrayante bhavantaṃ
śrāvaṃ śrāvaṃ tava nava-navāṃ mādhurīṃ sādhu-vṛndād
vṛndāraṇyotsava kila vayaṃ deva sevemahi tvām || RBhrs_3,2.22 ||
kāmādīnāṃ kati na katidhā pālitā durnideśās
teṣāṃ jātā mayi na karuṇā na trapā nopaśāntiḥ |
tvām āyātaḥ śaraṇam abhayaṃ māṃ niyuṅkṣvātma-dāsye || RBhrs_3,2.25 ||
ye mumukṣāṃ parityajya harim eva samāśritāḥ |
śaunaka-pramukhās te tu proktā jñāni-carāḥ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_3,2.26 ||
kṛtādya no yena kṛśā mumukṣā || RBhrs_3,2.27 ||
dhyānātītaṃ kim api paramaṃ ye tu jānanti tattvaṃ
ikṣvākuḥ śrutadevāś ca puṇḍarīkādayaś ca te || RBhrs_3,2.29 ||
śūnyodyāne nayati vihagān apy alaṃ bhikṣu-caryām |
ity utkarṣaṃ kam api sa-camatkāram ākarṇya citraṃ
sevāyāṃ te sphuṭam aghahara śraddhayā gardhito 'smi || RBhrs_3,2.30 ||
uddhavo dāruko jaitraḥ śrutadevaś ca śatrujit |
tathāpi kvāpy avasare paricaryāṃ ca kurvate |
dvāri dvāravatī-purasya purataḥ sevotsukas tiṣṭhati || RBhrs_3,2.34 ||
eteṣāṃ pravaraḥ śrīmān uddhavaḥ prema-viklavaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.35 ||
mukhyaṃ pāriṣadeṣu bhakti-laharī-ruddhaṃ bhajāmy uddhavam || RBhrs_3,2.36 ||
mantraṃ pṛcchati mām apeśala-dhiyaṃ vijñāna-vārāṃ nidhir
vikrīḍaty asakṛd vicitra-caritaḥ so 'yaṃ prabhur mādṛśām || RBhrs_3,2.37 ||
purasthāś ca vrajasthāś cety ucyate anugā dvidhā || RBhrs_3,2.38 ||
ānandaś candrahāsaś ca payodo vakulas tathā |
rasadaḥ śāradādyāś ca vrajasthā anugā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.42 ||
varair agurubhir jalaṃ racaya vāsitaṃ vārida |
parāga-paṭalī gavāṃ diśam arundha paurandarīm || RBhrs_3,2.44 ||
vrajānugeṣu sarveṣu varīyān raktako mataḥ || RBhrs_3,2.45 ||
dhūryo dhīraś ca vīraś ca tridhā pāriṣad-ādikaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.48 ||
yaḥ prītiṃ tanute bhaktaḥ sa dhūrya iha kīrtyate || RBhrs_3,2.49 ||
devaḥ sevyatayā yathā sphurati me devyas tathāsya priyāḥ
smṛtvā sāhasikaṃ bibhemi tam ahaṃ bhaktābhimānonnataṃ
prītiṃ tat-praṇate khare 'py avidadhad yaḥ svāsthyam ālambate || RBhrs_3,2.50 ||
tasya prasāda-pātraṃ syān mukhyaṃ dhīraḥ sa ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.51 ||
kṛpāṃ tasya samāśritya prauḍhāṃ nānyam apekṣate |
atulāṃ yo vahan kṛṣṇe prītiṃ vīraḥ sa ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.53 ||
pralamba-ripur īśvaro bhavatu kā kṛtis tena me
kumāra-makara-dhvajād api na kiñcid āste phalam |
priyā pariṣad-agrimāṃ na gaṇayāmi bhāmām api || RBhrs_3,2.54 ||
sva eva dhiṣṇye 'bhiratasya kiṃ tayā || RBhrs_3,2.55 ||
nitya-siddhāś ca siddhāś ca sādhakāḥ parikīrtitaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.56 ||
ity ādayo vibhāvāḥ syur eṣv asādhāraṇā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.57 ||
kṛṣṇasya paśyata kṛpāṃ kṛpādyāḥ kṛpaṇe mayi |
dhyeyo 'sau nidhane hanta dṛśor adhvānam abhyagāt || RBhrs_3,2.58 ||
tad-aṅga-saurabhādyās tu sarvaiḥ sādhāraṇā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.59 ||
citraṃ vāri-dharān vināpi tarasā yair adya dhārā-mayair
dūrāt paśyata deva-mātṛkam abhūd vṛndāṭavī-maṇḍalam || RBhrs_3,2.60 ||
tan-niṣṭhādyāḥ śītāḥ syur eṣv asādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.61 ||

tatra svaniyogasya sarvata ādhikyaṃ, yathā--
aṅga-stambhārambham uttuṅgayantaṃ
virāgādyāś ca ye śītāḥ proktāḥ sādhāraṇās tu te || RBhrs_3,2.63 ||
natvā munīṃś ca saṃhṛṣṭo dhunvan vāso nanarta ha || RBhrs_3,2.64 ||
stambhādyāḥ sāttvikāḥ sarve prītādi-tritaye matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.66 ||
dainyaṃ cintā smṛtiḥ śaṅkā matir autsukya-cāpale || RBhrs_3,2.69 ||
bodhaḥ svapnaḥ klamo vyādhir mṛtiś ca vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.70 ||
yoge trayaḥ syur dhṛty-antā ayoge tu klamādayaḥ |
ubhayatra pare śeṣā nirvedādyāḥ satāṃ matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.71 ||
ādhis tad-virahe deva grīṣme sara ivāṃśumān || RBhrs_3,2.74 ||
dhanyāḥ sphurati tava sūrya karāḥ sahasraṃ
dūre muhūrtam api yā na vilokate tam || RBhrs_3,2.75 ||
eṣā rase 'tra kathitā sthāyi-bhāvatayā budhaiḥ || RBhrs_3,2.76 ||
tatra pāriṣadādes tu hetuḥ saṃskāra eva hi |
vṛddhiṃ premā tataḥ snehas tato rāga iti tridhā || RBhrs_3,2.78 ||
mamādyāmaṅgalaṃ naṣṭaṃ phalavāṃś caiva me bhavaḥ |
kadā namaskariṣāmi gopa-rūpaṃ tam īśvaram || RBhrs_3,2.80 ||
naya māṃ vikṛtir na hi me tvat-pada-kamalāvalambasya || RBhrs_3,2.82 ||
arajyata sa mayy aho dviguṇam eva vairocaniḥ || RBhrs_3,2.83 ||
sāndraś citta-dravaṃ kurvan premā sneha itīryate |
kṣaṇikasyāpi neha syād visleṣasya sahiṣṇutā || RBhrs_3,2.84 ||
citrā na te dāruka dāru-kalpatā || RBhrs_3,2.85 ||
patnīṃ ratna-nidheḥ parām upaharan pūreṇa bāṣpāmbhasāṃ
stabdho 'py abhyadhikāṃ śriyaṃ praṇamatāṃ vṛndād dadhāroddhavaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.86 ||
snehaḥ sa rāgo yena syāt sukhaṃ duḥkham api sphuṭam |
tat-sambandha-lave 'py atra prītiḥ prāṇa-vyayair api || RBhrs_3,2.87 ||
gurur api bhujagād bhīs takṣakāt prājya-rājya-
cyutir atiśayinī ca prāya-caryā ca gurvī |
prāya ādya-dvaye premā snehaḥ pāriṣadeṣv asau |
parīkṣiti bhaved-rāgo dāruke ca tathoddhave || RBhrs_3,2.90 ||
asminn abhyudite bhāvaḥ prāyaḥ syāt sakhya-leśa-bhāk || RBhrs_3,2.91 ||
ayoga-yogāv etasya prabhedau kathitāv ubhau || RBhrs_3,2.93 ||
saṅgābhāvo harer dhīrair ayoga iti kathyate |
utkaṇṭhitaṃ viyogaś cety ayoge 'pi dvidhocyate || RBhrs_3,2.95 ||
pakṣapātena tan-nāmni mṛge padme ca tad-dṛśi || RBhrs_3,2.97 ||

yathā va, śrī-daśame (10.38.10)--
apy adya viṣṇor manujatvam īyuṣor
mahyaṃ na na syāt phalam añjasā dṛśaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.98 ||
hā hanta hā hanta kathaṃ nayāmi || RBhrs_3,2.100 ||
mano mama manāg api kvacid anāpnuvan nirvṛtiṃ
kṣaṇārdham api manyate vraja-mahendra varṣa-vrajam || RBhrs_3,2.101 ||
dainyaṃ, yathā tatraiva {*Karṇāmṛta? Not found in any of the three centuries.}--
laghur aghahara kīṭād apy ahaṃ kūṭa-karmā |
bhaven na hi yayoḥ padaṃ madhurima-śriyām āspadaṃ
padāmbujanakhāṅkurād api visāri rocis tava || RBhrs_3,2.104 ||
hari hari niḥśvasato niśāḥ prayāti || RBhrs_3,2.105 ||
mac-cāpalaṃ ca tava vā mama vādhigamyam |
kṛṣṇa-graha-gṛhītātmā na veda jagad īdṛśam || RBhrs_3,2.108 ||
tanuṃ bibhrad bhavyaḥ pratikṛtir ivāste dvija-patiḥ |
puraḥ śyāmāmbhode bata vinihitā dṛṣṭir amunā || RBhrs_3,2.109 ||
nadati kvacid utkaṇṭho vilajjo nṛtyati kvacit |
kvacin naṭati niṣpaṭaṃ kvacid asambhavaṃ stambhate
kvacid vihasati sphuṭaṃ kvacid amandam ākrandati |
lasaty analasaṃ kvacit kvacid apārtham ārtāyate
kṣipata nanu satīrthāś ceṣṭatāṃ prāṇa-haṃsaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.113 ||
adhṛtir jaḍatā vyādhir unmādo mūrcchitaṃ budhaiḥ |
arāgitā tu sarvasminn adhṛtiḥ kathitā budhaiḥ |
anye 'ṣṭau prakaṭārthatvāt tāpādyā na hi lakṣitāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.117 ||
taṃ smārayan munipate dahatīha sabhyān || RBhrs_3,2.118 ||
kṣaṇadāḥ kṣaṇa-dāyitojjhitā bahulāśve bahulās tadābhavan || RBhrs_3,2.120 ||
na kila kuṭumbam ihāsti nas trilokyām |
kvacid api na vyavatiṣṭhate 'dya cetaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.121 ||
svedāśrubhir na hi paraṃ jalatām avāpur
vraja-bhuvi tathā nāsīn nidrā-lavo 'pi yathā purā |
satatam adhunā niśceṣṭāṅgās taṭāny adhiśerate || RBhrs_3,2.126 ||
na kila vasatim ārtāḥ kartum icchanti haṃsāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.127 ||
aśivatvān na ghaṭate bhakte kutrāpy asau mṛtiḥ |
kṛṣṇena saṅgamo yas tu sa yoga iti kīrtyate |
yoge 'pi kathitaḥ siddhis tuṣṭiḥ sthitir iti tridhā || RBhrs_3,2.129 ||
utkaṇṭhite hareḥ prāptiḥ siddhir ity abhidhīyate || RBhrs_3,2.130 ||
mandaṃ mandam aye ka eṣa mathurā-vīthīṃ mitho gāhate || RBhrs_3,2.131 ||
jāte viyoge kaṃsāreḥ samprāptis tuṣṭir ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.133 ||
dāruko dvārakā-dvāri tatra citra-daśāṃ yayau || RBhrs_3,2.135 ||
saha-vāso mukundena sthitir nigaditā budhaiḥ || RBhrs_3,2.136 ||
yathā haṃsadūte (50) {*This actually appears to be a mix of verses 50-51. Check my comment in Mystic Poetry.}--
puras tasya niveśādyā yoge 'mīṣāṃ kriyā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.138 ||
bhavatvam eva niścitya na rasāvasthatāṃ jaguḥ || RBhrs_3,2.139 ||
iti tāvad asādhīyo yat purāṇeṣu keṣucit |
śrīmad-bhāgavate caiṣa prakaṭo dṛśyate rasaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.140 ||
bhavanti tūṣṇīṃ param etya nirvṛtāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.141 ||
kintu kālādi-vaiśiṣṭyāt kvacit syāt sīma-laṅghanam || RBhrs_3,2.143 ||
sā vibhāvādibhiḥ puṣṭā gaurava-prītir ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.144 ||
hariś ca tasya lālyāś ca bhavanty ālambanā iha || RBhrs_3,2.145 ||
hitam iha nijayāgre ceṣṭayaivātmajān naḥ || RBhrs_3,2.146 ||
rakṣī lālaka ity ādyair guṇair ālambano hariḥ || RBhrs_3,2.147 ||
ghrātāś ca mūrdhni parirabhya bhavanty adasrāḥ
sāmbādayaḥ kati purā vidadhus tapāṃsi || RBhrs_3,2.150 ||
rukmiṇī-nandanas teṣu lālyeṣu pravaro mataḥ || RBhrs_3,2.151 ||
janayati janeṣu janaka-bhrāntiṃ yaḥ suṣṭhu rūpeṇa || RBhrs_3,2.152 ||
sa eṣa paramo gurur garuḍa-go yadūnāṃ patiḥ |
yataḥ kim api lālanaṃ vayam avāpya daroddhurāḥ
purārim api saṅgare guru-ruṣaṃ tiraskurmahe || RBhrs_3,2.153 ||
lālyānāṃ tu sva-sambandha-sphūrter eva samantataḥ || RBhrs_3,2.154 ||
bhuvam abhi makarāṅko rāṅkavaṃ svīcakāra || RBhrs_3,2.159 ||
dvandve dṛśoḥ padam asau kila niṣprakampā |
naṭaiś ca hṛṣyadbhir akāri nṛtyam || RBhrs_3,2.164 ||
dhanyaḥ sāmba bhavān sa-riṅgaṇam ayan pārśve rajaḥ-karbūro
yas tātena vikṛṣya vatsalatayā svotsaṅgam āropitaḥ |
dhiṅ māṃ durbhagam atra śaṅkara-mayair durdaiva-visphūrjitaiḥ
prāptā na kṣaṇikāpi lālana-ratiḥ sā yena bālye pituḥ || RBhrs_3,2.165 ||
tanmayī lālake prītir gaurava-prītir ucyate || RBhrs_3,2.166 ||
sthāyi-bhāvo 'tra sā caiṣām āmūlāt svayam ucchritā |
kañcid viśeṣam āpannā premeti sneha ity api |
rāga ity ucyate cātra gaurava-prītir eva sā || RBhrs_3,2.167 ||
dhīraḥ paraṃ kim api saṅkucatīṃ jhaṣāṅko
karād ākṛṣyaiva prasabham abhimanyāv api hate |
prapede kalyāṇī na hi malinimānaṃ lavam api || RBhrs_3,2.169 ||
nidhehi savidhe pituḥ kathaya vatsa kaḥ sambhramaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.170 ||
viṣam iva tāṃ tu sudhāṃ sa eva sadyaḥ || RBhrs_3,2.171 ||
triṣv evāyoga-yogādyā bhedāḥ pūrvavad īritāḥ || RBhrs_3,2.172 ||
militaḥ śambara-purato madanaḥ purato vilokayan pitaram |
ko 'ham iti svaṃ pramadān na dhīr adhīr apy asau veda || RBhrs_3,2.175 ||
ajani mudā yadu-nagare sambhrama-bhūmā kumārāṇām || RBhrs_3,2.176 ||
vandate pādayor dvandvaṃ pituḥ prati-dinaṃ smaraḥ || RBhrs_3,2.177 ||
utkaṇṭhita-viyogādye yad yad vistāritaṃ na hi |
sambhrama-prītivaj jñeyaṃ tat tad evākhilaṃ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_3,2.178 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau
paścima-vibhāge mukhya-bhakti-rasa-pañcaka-nirūpaṇe
prīti-bhakti-rasa-laharī dvitīyā |
nītaś citte satāṃ puṣṭiṃ rasaḥ preyān udīryate || RBhrs_3,3.1 ||
hariś ca tad-vayasyāś ca tasminn ālambanā matāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.2 ||
dvibhujatvādi-bhāg atra prāgvad ālambano hariḥ || RBhrs_3,3.3 ||
vrajād aghaharo haraty ahaha naḥ sakhīnāṃ manaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.4 ||
sakhyenojjvalitais tathā jalajayor āḍhyaṃ caturbhir bhujaiḥ |
sukhī varīyān ity ādyā guṇās tasyeha kīrtitā || RBhrs_3,3.7 ||
te pura-vraja-sambandhād dvi-vidhāḥ prāya īritāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.10 ||
arjuno bhīmasenaś ca duhitā drupadasya ca |
śirasi nṛpatir drag aghrāsīd aghārim adhīra-dhīr
tam avaśādhiyaḥ prauḍhānandād arundhata pāṇḍavāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.12 ||
ataḥ sarva-vayasyeṣu pradhānatvaṃ bhajanty amī || RBhrs_3,3.16 ||
sadā praṇaya-śālinaḥ sahacarā hareḥ pāntu vaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.17 ||
unnidrasya yayus tavātra viratiṃ sapta-kṣapās tiṣṭhato
hanta śrānta ivāsi nikṣipa sakhe śrīdāma-pāṇau girim |
ādhir vidhyati nas tvam arpaya kare kiṃ vā kṣaṇaṃ dakṣiṇe
doṣṇas te karavāma kāmam adhunā savyasya saṃvāhanam || RBhrs_3,3.18 ||
kṣaṇam aham avasīdan śūnya-cittas tadāsam || RBhrs_3,3.20 ||
suhṛdaś ca sakhāyaś ca tathā priya-sakhāḥ pare |
priya-narma-vayasyāś cety uktā goṣṭhe catur-vidhāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.21 ||
sāyudhās tasya duṣṭebhyaḥ sadā rakṣā-parāyaṇāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.22 ||
vijayo balabhadrādyāḥ suhṛdas tasya kīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.23 ||
dhunvan dhāvasi maṇḍalāgram amalaṃ tvaṃ maṇḍalībhadra kiṃ
gurvīṃ nārya gadāṃ gṛhāṇa vijaya kṣobhaṃ vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ |
śaktiṃ na kṣipa bhadravardhana puro govardhanaṃ gāhate
garjann eṣa ghano balī na tu balīvardākṛtir dānavaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.24 ||
sukhaṃ svapitu naḥ suhṛd vraja-niśānta-madhye niśi |
ahaṃ śirasi mardanaṃ mṛdu karomi karṇe kathāṃ
tvam asya visṛjann alaṃ subala sakthinī lālaya || RBhrs_3,3.27 ||
iti subala girā me sandiśa tvaṃ mukundaṃ
yad ugra-bhuja-saṅgare gurum agāt klamaṃ naḥ sakhā || RBhrs_3,3.32 ||
sarveṣu sakhiṣu śreṣṭho devaprastho 'yam īritaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.33 ||
śrīdāmnaḥ pṛthulāṃ bhujām abhi śiro vinyasya viśrāmiṇaṃ
madhye sundari kandarasya padayoḥ saṃvāhanena priyaṃ
devaprastha itaḥ kṛtī sukhayati premṇā vrajendrātmajam || RBhrs_3,3.35 ||
śrīdāmā ca sudāmā ca dāmā ca vasudāmakaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.36 ||
prasārya bhujayor yugaṃ pulaki kaścid āśliṣyati |
kareṇa calatā dṛśau nibhṛtam etya rundhe paraḥ
kṛśāṅgi sukhayanty amī priya-sakhāḥ sakhāyaṃ tava || RBhrs_3,3.39 ||
eṣu priya-vayasyeṣu śrīdāmā pravaro mataḥ || RBhrs_3,3.40 ||
tvaṃ naḥ projjhya kaṭhora yāmuna-taṭe kasmād akasmād gato
diṣṭyā dṛṣṭim ito 'si hanta niviḍāśleṣaiḥ sakhīn prīṇaya |
brūmaḥ satyam adarśane tava manāk kā dhenavaḥ ke vayaṃ
kiṃ goṣṭhaṃ kim abhīṣṭam ity acirataḥ sarvaṃ viparyasyati || RBhrs_3,3.42 ||
rādhā-sandeśa-vṛndaṃ kathayati subalaḥ paśya kṛṣṇasya karṇe
pālī-tāmbūlam āsye vitarati caturaḥ kokilo mūrdhni dhatte
tārā-dāmeti narma-praṇayi-sahacarās tanvi tanvanti sevām || RBhrs_3,3.44 ||
dūtaḥ sameti sakhi yatra milaty adūre |
kā vā vṛṣasyati na gopa-vṛṣaṃ kiśorī || RBhrs_3,3.49 ||
tad iyam aghahara tvām eti sarvādhvanaiva || RBhrs_3,3.51 ||
eteṣu ke 'pi śāstreṣu ke 'pi lokeṣu viśrutāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.52 ||
nitya-priyāḥ sura-carāḥ sādhakāś ceti te tridhā |
kecid eṣu sthirā jātyā mantrivat tam upāsate || RBhrs_3,3.53 ||
kecid ārjava-sāreṇa saralāḥ śīlayanti tam || RBhrs_3,3.54 ||
saumyāḥ sūnṛtayā vācā dhanyā dhinvanti taṃ pare || RBhrs_3,3.55 ||
evaṃ vividhayā sarve prakṛtyā madhurā amī |
kaumāraṃ vatsale vācyaṃ tataḥ saṅkṣipya likhyate || RBhrs_3,3.59 ||
bibhrad veṇuṃ jaṭhara-paṭayoḥ śṛṅga-vetre ca kakṣe
tiṣṭhan madhye sva-parisuhṛdo hāsayan narmabhiḥ svaiḥ
svarge loke miṣati bubhuje yajña-bhug bāla-keliḥ || RBhrs_3,3.60 ||
ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ paugaṇḍaṃ ca tridhā bhavet || RBhrs_3,3.61 ||
kambu-grīvodgamādyaṃ ca paugaṇḍe prathame sati || RBhrs_3,3.62 ||
tundaṃ vindati te mukunda śanakair aśvattha-patra-śriyaṃ
kaṇṭhaṃ kambuvad ambujākṣa bhajate rekhā-trayīm ujjvalām |
lakṣmīr ādhunikī dhinoti suhṛdām akṣīṇi sā kāpy asau || RBhrs_3,3.63 ||
karṇābhyāṃ karṇikāre dadhad alam urasā phulla-mallīka-mālyaṃ
nṛtyan dor-yuddha-raṅge naṭavad iha sakhīn nandayaty eṣa kṛṣṇaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.66 ||
pārśvādy-aṅgaṃ suvalitaṃ paugaṇḍe sati madhyame || RBhrs_3,3.67 ||
bhāṇḍīre krīḍanaṃ śailoddhāraṇādyaṃ ca ceṣṭitam || RBhrs_3,3.69 ||
paśya krīḍan sukhayati sakhe mitra-vṛndaṃ mukundaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.70 ||
aṃsayos tuṅgatety ādi paugaṇḍe carame sati || RBhrs_3,3.72 ||
nyasyann eva priya-savayasāṃ gokulān nirjihīte || RBhrs_3,3.73 ||
veṣaḥ keśava peśalaḥ subalam apy āghūrṇayaty adya te
vikrāntaṃ kim uta svabhāva-mṛdulāṃ goṣṭhābalānāṃ tatim || RBhrs_3,3.75 ||
dhūrtas tvaṃ yad avaiṣi hṛd-gatam ataḥ karṇe tava vyāhare
pañceṣur jagatāṃ jaye nija-dhurāṃ yatrārpayan mādyati || RBhrs_3,3.77 ||
kaiśoraṃ pūrvam evoktaṃ saṅkṣepeṇocyate tataḥ || RBhrs_3,3.78 ||
tena yauvana-śobhāsya neha kācit prapañcitā || RBhrs_3,3.80 ||
sakhīn kevalam evedaṃ dhāmnā dhīman dhinoti naḥ || RBhrs_3,3.81 ||
api nivahāḥ samam eva jāgrati sma || RBhrs_3,3.82 ||
pañcāsya paśya muditāḥ pañcāsya-pratimāṃ yayuḥ || RBhrs_3,3.84 ||
priya-sakhi subalo 'bhūd vismitaḥ sa-smitaś ca || RBhrs_3,3.85 ||
prāyaḥ puraḥsaratvādyāḥ suhṛdām īritāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.90 ||
tābhiḥ keli-kalau sākṣāt sakhyuḥ pakṣa-parigrahaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.93 ||
puras tauryatrikaṃ tasya gavāṃ sambhālana-kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.95 ||
etāḥ sādhāraṇā dāsair vayasyānāṃ kriyā matāḥ |
pūrvokteṣv aparāś cātra jñeyā dhīrair yathocitam || RBhrs_3,3.96 ||
api guru-puras tvām utsaṅge nidhāya visaṅkaṭe
praṇayati tava skandhe cāsau bhujaṃ bhujagopamaṃ
kva subala purā siddha-kṣetre cakatha kiyat-tapaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.99 ||
rase preyasi bhāva-jñaiḥ kathitā vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.102 ||
tatrāyoge madaṃ harṣaṃ garvaṃ nidrāṃ dhṛtiṃ vinā |
yoge mṛtiṃ klamaṃ vyādhiṃ vināpasmṛti-dīnate || RBhrs_3,3.103 ||
vimukta-sambhramā yā syād viśrambhātmā ratir dvayoḥ |
prāyaḥ samānayor atra sā sakhya-sthāyi-śabda-bhāk || RBhrs_3,3.105 ||
eṣā sakhya-ratir vṛddhiṃ gacchantī praṇayaḥ kramāt |
premā snehas tathā rāga iti pañca-bhidoditā || RBhrs_3,3.106 ||
garuḍāṅka guḍākeśas tvāṃ kadā parirapsyate || RBhrs_3,3.107 ||
tad-gandhenāpy asaṃspṛṣṭā ratiḥ praṇaya ucyate || RBhrs_3,3.108 ||
samaskuruta pāṃśumān śirasi candrakān arjunaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.109 ||
mukunda vasatir vane para-gṛhe ca dāsya-kriyā |
iyaṃ sphuṭam amaṅgalā bhavatu pāṇḍavānāṃ gatiḥ
parantu vavṛdhe tvayi dvi-guṇam eva sakhyāmṛtam || RBhrs_3,3.110 ||
gāyanti sma mahārāja sneha-klinna-dhiyaḥ śanaiḥ || RBhrs_3,3.111 ||
yā prāg āsta sarasvatī drutam asau līnopakaṇṭha-sthale
yā nāsīd udagād dṛśoḥ pathi sadā nīrorudhāvātra sā || RBhrs_3,3.112 ||
davasya kavalād api tvam avitātra yeṣām abhūḥ |
kathaṃ na viraha-jvarād avasitān sakhīn adya naḥ || RBhrs_3,3.116 ||
atrāpi pūrvavat proktās tāpādyās tā daśā daśa || RBhrs_3,3.117 ||
balīyān uttāpas tava viraha-janmā jvalayati || RBhrs_3,3.118 ||
samīrasya ghrānādhvani pṛthulatā kevalam abhūt || RBhrs_3,3.119 ||
na hi bhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ bhajati caṭulaṃ tulam iva me
nirālambaṃ cetaḥ kvacid api vilambaṃ lavam api || RBhrs_3,3.121 ||
kim aparam iha vācyaṃ jīvite 'py adya dhatte
yaduvara virahāt te nārthitāṃ bandhu-vargaḥ || RBhrs_3,3.122 ||
sphurati suhṛdāṃ gaṇāḥ śikhara-jāta-vṛkṣā iva || RBhrs_3,3.123 ||
yaduvīra taṭe viceṣṭate ciram ābhīra-kumāra-maṇḍalī || RBhrs_3,3.124 ||
luṇṭhanti bhuvi śerate bata hasanti dhāvanty amī
rudanti mathurā-pate kim api vallavānāṃ gaṇāḥ || RBhrs_3,3.125 ||
vāraṃ vāram akharva-locana-jalair āplāvya tān niścalān
śocanty adya yathā ciraṃ paricaya-snigdhāḥ kuraṅgā api || RBhrs_3,3.127 ||
kṛṣṇena viprayogaḥ syān na jātu vraja-vāsinām || RBhrs_3,3.128 ||
vatsair vatsatarībhiś ca sadā krīḍati mādhavaḥ |
citrākāraṃ bhajann eva mitrākāram adarśayat || RBhrs_3,3.130 ||
kiṃ varṇyate diṣṭam ato vrajaukasām || RBhrs_3,3.133 ||
preyān kām api puṣṇāti rasaś citta-camatkṛtim || RBhrs_3,3.134 ||
prīte ca vatsale cāpi kṛṣṇa-tad-bhaktayoḥ punaḥ |
preyān eva bhavet preyān ataḥ sarva-raseṣv ayam |

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau
paścima-vibhāge mukhya-bhakti-rasa-pañcaka-nirūpaṇe
preyo-bhakti-rasa-laharī tṛtīyā |
vibhāvādyais tu vātsalyaṃ sthāyī puṣṭim upāgataḥ |
eṣa vatsala-nāmātra prokto bhakti-raso budhaiḥ || RBhrs_3,4.1 ||
kṛṣṇaṃ tasya gurūṃś cātra prāhur ālambanān budhāḥ || RBhrs_3,4.2 ||
dātety-ādi-guṇo kṛṣṇo vibhāva iti kathyate || RBhrs_3,4.4 ||
trayyā copaniṣadbhiś ca sāṅkhya-yogaiś ca sātvataiḥ |
viṣṇur nityam upāsyate sakhi mayā tenātra nītāḥ kṣayaṃ
pratyakṣaṃ girir eṣa goṣṭa-patinā rāmeṇa sārdhaṃ dhṛtas
tat-tat-karma duranvayaṃ mama śiśoḥ kenāsya sambhāvyate || RBhrs_3,4.7 ||
lālakatvādināpy atra vibhāvā guravo matāḥ || RBhrs_3,4.8 ||
te tu tasyātra kathitā vraja-rājñī vrajeśvaraḥ |
rohiṇī tāś ca vallavyo yāḥ padmaja-hṛtātmajāḥ || RBhrs_3,4.10 ||
śyāma-śyāma-rucir vicitra-sicayā goṣṭheśvarī pātu vaḥ || RBhrs_3,4.13 ||
snuvānā pratyūṣe diśati ca bhuje kārmaṇam asau
ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ kaumāraṃ tri-vidhaṃ matam || RBhrs_3,4.18 ||
pravyakta-mārdavatvaṃ ca kaumāre prathame sati || RBhrs_3,4.19 ||
kṣaṇam iha virudantaṃ smera-vaktraṃ kṣaṇaṃ sā
tilam api viratāsīn nekṣituṃ goṣṭha-rājñī || RBhrs_3,4.22 ||
paṭṭa-ḍorī kaṭau haste sūtram ity ādi maṇḍanam || RBhrs_3,4.23 ||
vrajeśa-gṛhiṇī sutaṃ na kila vīkṣya tṛptiṃ yayau || RBhrs_3,4.24 ||
kalokti-riṅganādyaṃ ca kaumāre sati madhyame || RBhrs_3,4.25 ||
tanayam amṛta-sindhau prekṣya mātā nyamāṅkṣīt || RBhrs_3,4.26 ||
kiṅkiṇy-ādi ca kaṭyādau prasādhanam ihoditam || RBhrs_3,4.27 ||
atra kiñcit kṛśaṃ madhyam īṣat-prathima-bhāg uraḥ |
śiraś ca kāka-pakṣāḍhyaṃ kaumāre carame sati || RBhrs_3,4.29 ||
kare ca laguḍīṃ laghuṃ savayasāṃ kulair āvṛtaḥ |
avann iha śakṛt-karīn parisare vrajasya priye
sutas tava kṛtārthayaty ahaha paśya netrāṇi naḥ || RBhrs_3,4.33 ||
paugaṇḍādi puraivoktaṃ tena saṅkṣipya likhyate || RBhrs_3,4.34 ||
vraja-bhuvi mama vatsaḥ kacca-deśād upaiti || RBhrs_3,4.35 ||
mātuḥ pramoda-bharam eva haris tanoti || RBhrs_3,4.39 ||
prekṣya prekṣya diśaḥ sa-śaṅkam asakṛn mandaṃ padaṃ nikṣipan
nāyāty eṣa latāntare sphuṭam ito gavyaṃ hariṣyan hariḥ |
trasyal-locanam asya śuṣyad-adharaṃ ramyaṃ didṛkṣe mukham || RBhrs_3,4.40 ||
ghrāṇair avāpuḥ paramāṃ mudaṃ te || RBhrs_3,4.42 ||
upālambhādayaś cātra mitraiḥ sādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_3,4.44 ||
navātra sāttvikāḥ stanya-srāvaḥ stambhādayaś ca te || RBhrs_3,4.45 ||
matvā paraṃ brahma sutān apāyayan || RBhrs_3,4.46 ||
tava navam abhiṣekaṃ dugdha-pūraiḥ karoti || RBhrs_3,4.47 ||
katham api parirabdhuṃ na kṣamā stabdha-gātrī
na ca sutam upadeṣṭuṃ ruddha-kaṇṭhī samarthā
dadhatam acalam āsīd vyākulā gokuleśā || RBhrs_3,4.48 ||
ratiḥ saivātra vātsalyaṃ sthāyī bhāvo nigadyate || RBhrs_3,4.52 ||
premavat snehavad bhāti kadācit kila rāgavat || RBhrs_3,4.53 ||
mūrdhny upāghrāya paramāṃ mudaṃ lebhe kurūdvaha || RBhrs_3,4.54 ||
gehād aṅganam aṅganāt punar asau gehaṃ viśanty ākulā
govindasya muhur vrajendra-gṛhiṇī panthānam ālokate || RBhrs_3,4.55 ||
premā vallava-nāthayor atitarām ullāsam evāyayau || RBhrs_3,4.57 ||
vṛttāsi vraja-rājñi tat-suta-mukha-prekṣāṃ sphuṭaṃ vāñchasi || RBhrs_3,4.58 ||
sthitā yadi na tatra te vadana-padmam udvīkṣyate || RBhrs_3,4.59 ||
paśya srasta-tanuḥ kaṭhora-luṭhanair dehe vraṇaṃ kurvatī |
kṣīṇā goṣṭha-mahī-mahendra-mahiṣī hā putra putrety asau
krośantī karayor yugena kurute kaṣṭād uras-tāḍanam || RBhrs_3,4.63 ||
bahūnām api sad-bhāve viyoge 'tra tu kecana |
unmāda-mohāv ity ādyā atyudrekaṃ vrajanty amī || RBhrs_3,4.64 ||
manda-spandam abhūt klamair alaghubhiḥ sandānitaṃ mānasaṃ
niśvāsaiḥ sravad eva pākam ayate stanyaṃ ca taptair idaṃ
śirasi kuliśaṃ hanta kṣiptaṃ śvaphalka-sutena me || RBhrs_3,4.66 ||
dhig astu hata-jīvitaṃ niravadhi-śriyo 'py adya me
yayā na hi hareḥ śiraḥ snuta-kucāgram āghrāyate |
sadā nava-sudhā-duhām api gavāṃ parārdhaṃ ca dhik
sa luñcati na cañcalaḥ surabhi-gandhi yāsāṃ dadhi || RBhrs_3,4.67 ||
kim iva kurute harmye tiṣṭhann ayaṃ nirapatrapo
vrajapatir iti brūte mugdho 'yam atra mudā janaḥ |
ahaha tanayaṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi priyaṃ parihṛtya taṃ
kaṭhina-hṛdayo goṣṭhe svairī praviśya sukhīyati || RBhrs_3,4.70 ||
kva me putro nīpāḥ kathayata kuraṅgāḥ kim iha vaḥ
sa babhrāmābhyarṇe bhaṇata tam udantaṃ madhukarāḥ |
bhavantaṃ pṛcchantī diśi diśi yaśodā vicarati || RBhrs_3,4.71 ||
kuṭumbini manas taṭe vidhuratāṃ vidhatse kathaṃ
prasāraya dṛśaṃ manāk tava sutaḥ puro vartate |
idaṃ gṛhiṇi gṛhaṃ na kuru śūnyam ity ākulaṃ
sa śocati tava prasūṃ yadu-kulendra nandaḥ pitā || RBhrs_3,4.72 ||
tava muhur atiharṣād varṣati kṣīra-dhārām || RBhrs_3,4.76 ||
svīkurvate rasam imaṃ nāṭya-jñā api kecana || RBhrs_3,4.77 ||
sphuṭaṃ camatkāritayā vatsalaṃ ca rasaṃ viduḥ |
preyasas tu tirobhāvo vatsalaysāsya na kṣatiḥ || RBhrs_3,4.79 ||
tatra keṣucid apy asyāḥ saṅkulatvam udīryate || RBhrs_3,4.80 ||
yudhiṣṭhirasya vātsalyaṃ prītyā sakhyena cānvitam || RBhrs_3,4.81 ||
evaṃ keṣucid anyeṣu vijñeyaṃ bhāva-miśraṇam || RBhrs_3,4.84 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau
paścima-vibhāge mukhya-bhakti-rasa-pañcaka-nirūpaṇe
vatsala-bhakti-rasa-laharī caturthī |
ātmocitair vibhāvādyaiḥ puṣṭiṃ nītā satāṃ hṛdi |
madhurākhyo bhaved bhakti-raso 'sau madhurā ratiḥ || RBhrs_3,5.1 ||
rahasyatvāc ca saṃkṣipya vitatāṇgo vilikhyate || RBhrs_3,5.2 ||
asmin ālambanaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ priyās tasya tu subhruvaḥ || RBhrs_3,5.3 ||
āśrayatvena madhure harir ālambano mataḥ || RBhrs_3,5.4 ||
śṛṅgāraḥ sakhi mūrtimān iva madhau mugdho hariḥ krīḍati || RBhrs_3,5.5 ||
preyasīṣu harer āsu pravarā vārṣabhānavī || RBhrs_3,5.7 ||
rādhā lāghavam apy anādara-girāṃ bhaṅgībhir ātanvatī
maitrī-gauravato 'py asau śata-guṇāṃ mat-prītim evādadhe || RBhrs_3,5.9 ||
rādhām ādhāya hṛdaye tatyāja vraja-sundarīḥ || RBhrs_3,5.10 ||
krāntvā sapta jaganti samprati vayaṃ sarvordhvam adhyāsmahe || RBhrs_3,5.14 ||
ālasyaugrye vinā sarve vijñeyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_3,5.16 ||
nālambituṃ katham api kṣamate 'dya jīvaḥ || RBhrs_3,5.17 ||
sthāyī bhāvo bhavaty atra pūrvoktā madhurā ratiḥ || RBhrs_3,5.19 ||
rādhā-mādhavayor eva kvāpi bhāvaiḥ kadāpy asau |
ito dūre rājñī sphurati parito mitra-paṭalī
dṛśor agre candrāvalir upari śailasya danujaḥ |
anta-śrīr lolā taḍid iva mukundasya valate || RBhrs_3,5.22 ||
ghorā khaṇḍita-śaṅkhacūḍam ajiraṃ rundhe śivā tāmasī
rādhāyās tad api praphullam abhajan mlāniṃ na bhāvāmbujam || RBhrs_3,5.23 ||
sa pūrva-rāgo mānaś ca pravāsādi-mayas tathā |
vipralambho bahu-vidho vidvadbhir iha kathyate || RBhrs_3,5.25 ||
prāg-asaṅgatayor bhāvaḥ pūrva-rāgo bhaved dvayoḥ || RBhrs_3,5.26 ||
akasmād ekasmin pathi sakhi mayā yāmuna-taṭaṃ
sa dṛg-bhaṅgyā kiṃ vākuruta na hi jāne tata idaṃ
mano me vyālolaṃ kvacana gṛha-kṛtyo na lagate || RBhrs_3,5.27 ||
yathā vinidrā yac cittā rukmiṇī kamalekṣaṇā |
tathāham api tac-citto nidrāṃ ca na labhe niśi |
vedāhaṃ rukmiṇyā dveṣān mamodvāho nivāritaḥ || RBhrs_3,5.28 ||
mukhara-nikhare līnā dīnāpy uvāca rahaḥ sakhīm || RBhrs_3,5.30 ||
na bhuṅkte na svapiti ca cintayan vo hy aharniśam || RBhrs_3,5.33 ||
dvayor militayor bhogaḥ sambhoga iti kīrtyate || RBhrs_3,5.34 ||
tanutāṃ sanātanātmā bhagavān mayi sarvadā tuṣṭim || RBhrs_4,1.1 ||
rasaḥ sapta-vidho gauṇo maitrī-vaira-sthitir mithaḥ || RBhrs_4,1.2 ||
rasābhāsāś ca tenātra laharyo nava kīrtitāḥ |
prāg atrāniyatādhārāḥ kadācit kvāpy uditvarāḥ || RBhrs_4,1.3 ||
gauṇā bhakti-rasāḥ sapta lekhyā hāsyādayaḥ kramāt || RBhrs_4,1.4 ||
bhaktānāṃ pañcadhoktānām eṣāṃ madhyata eva hi |
kvāpy ekaḥ kvāpy anekaś ca gauṇeṣv ālambano mataḥ || RBhrs_4,1.5 ||
hāsya-bhakti-raso nāma budhair eṣa nigadyate || RBhrs_4,1.6 ||
vṛddhāḥ śiśu-mukhāḥ prāyaḥ proktā dhīrais tad-āśrayāḥ |
vibhāvanādi-vaiśiṣṭyāt pravarāś ca kvacin matāḥ || RBhrs_4,1.7 ||
yāsyāmy asya na bhīṣaṇasya savidhaṃ jīrṇasya śīrṇākṛter
mātar neṣyati māṃ pidhāya kapaṭād ādhārikāyām asau |
ity uktvā cakitākṣam adbhuta-śiśāv udvīkṣyamāṇe harau
hāsyaṃ tasya niruddhato 'py atitarāṃ vyaktaṃ tadāsīn muneḥ || RBhrs_4,1.8 ||
yac ceṣṭā kṛṣṇa-viṣayā proktaḥ so 'tra tad-anvayī || RBhrs_4,1.9 ||
dadāmi dadhi-phāṇitaṃ vivṛṇu vaktram ity agrato
tayā kusumam arpitaṃ navam avetya bhugnānane
harau jahasur uddhuraṃ kim api suṣṭhu goṣṭhārbhakāḥ || RBhrs_4,1.10 ||
asya prekṣya karaṃ śiśor munipate śyāmasya me kathyatāṃ
tathyaṃ hanta cirāyur eṣa bhavitā kiṃ dhenu-koṭīśvaraḥ |
ity ukte bhagavan mayādya paritaś cīreṇa kiṃ cāruṇā
drāg āvirbhavad-uddhura-smitam idaṃ vaktraṃ tvayā rudhyate || RBhrs_4,1.11 ||
ṣoḍhā hāsa-ratiḥ syāt smita-hasite vihasitāvahasite ca |
apahasitātihasitake jyeṣṭhādīnāṃ kramād dve dve || RBhrs_4,1.14 ||
bhaved vihasitādyaṃ ca bhāvajñair iti bhaṇyate || RBhrs_4,1.15 ||
kva yāmi jaratī khalā dadhi-haraṃ didhīrṣanty asau
pradhāvati javena māṃ subala maṅkṣu rakṣāṃ kuru |
vikasvara-mukhāmbujaṃ kulam abhūn munīnāṃ divi || RBhrs_4,1.17 ||
tad eva dara-saṃlakṣya-dantāgraṃ hasitaṃ bhavet || RBhrs_4,1.18 ||
mad-vaśena puraḥ-sthito harir asau putro 'ham evāsmi te
mām eti skhalad-akṣare jaṭilayā vyākruśya niṣkāsite
putre prāṅgataḥ sakhī-kulam abhūd dantāṃśu-dhautādharam || RBhrs_4,1.19 ||
sa-svanaṃ dṛṣṭa-daśanaṃ bhaved vihasitaṃ tu tat || RBhrs_4,1.20 ||
muṣāṇa dadhi meduraṃ viphalam antarā śaṅkase
kṛtaṃ hasitam utsvanaṃ kapaṭa-suptayā vṛddhayā || RBhrs_4,1.21 ||
lagnas te nitarāṃ dṛśor api yuge kiṃ dhātu-rāgo ghanaḥ
prātaḥ putra balasya vā kim asitaṃ vāsas tvayāṅge dhṛtam |
dūtī saṅkucad-īkṣaṇāvahasitaṃ jātā na roddhuṃ kṣamā || RBhrs_4,1.23 ||
jaratyāḥ prastobhān naṭati tad anaiṣīd dṛśam asau || RBhrs_4,1.25 ||
sahasra-tālaṃ kṣiptāṅgaṃ tac cātihasitaṃ viduḥ || RBhrs_4,1.26 ||
vṛddhe tvaṃ valitānanāsi valibhiḥ prekṣya suyogyām atas
tvām udvoḍhum asau balī-mukha-varo māṃ sādhayaty utsukaḥ |
ābhir vipluta-dhīr vṛṇe na hi paraṃ tvatto bali-dhvaṃsanād
ity uccair mukharā-girā vijahasuḥ sottālikā bālikāḥ || RBhrs_4,1.27 ||
yasya hāsaḥ sa cet kvāpi sākṣān naiva nibadhyate |
kā tvattaḥ kuṭile parāsti jaṭilā-putri kṣitau sundarī
puṇyena vraja-subhruvāṃ tava dhṛtiṃ hartuṃ na vaṃśī kṣamā || RBhrs_4,1.29 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhāv uttara-vibhāge
hāsya-bhakti-rasa-nirūpaṇe adbhuta-bhakti-rasa-laharī prathamā ||
sā vismaya-ratir nītād- bhuto-bhakti-raso bhavet || RBhrs_4,2.1 ||
sākṣād anumitaṃ ceti tac ca dvividham ucyate || RBhrs_4,2.4 ||
citraṃ bataitad ekena vapuṣā yugapat pṛthak |
gṛheṣu dvy-aṣṭa-sāhasraṃ striya eka udāvahat || RBhrs_4,2.7 ||
khelann iva sphurati hanta kim indra-jālam || RBhrs_4,2.8 ||
yāny akṣipan praharaṇāni bhaṭāḥ sa devaḥ
vatsāś ceti vadan kṛto 'smi vivaśaḥ stambha-śriyā paśyata |
āścaryaṃ kathayāmi vaḥ śṛṇuta bhoḥ pratyekam ekaikaśaḥ
stūyante jagad-aṇḍavadbhir abhitas te hanta padmāsanaiḥ || RBhrs_4,2.10 ||
apriyādeḥ kriyā kuryān nālaukiky api vismayam |
asādhāraṇy api manāk karoty eva priyasya sā || RBhrs_4,2.12 ||
ity atra vismaye proktā raty-anugraha-mādhurī || RBhrs_4,2.13 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhāv uttara-vibhāge
gauṇa-bhakti-rasa-nirūpaṇe adbhuta-bhakti-rasa-laharī dvitīyā ||
ālambana iha prokta eṣa eva caturvidhaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.2 ||
utsāhas tv eṣa bhaktānāṃ sarveṣām eva sambhavet || RBhrs_4,3.3 ||
sakhā bandhu-viśeṣo vā yuddha-vīra ihocyate || RBhrs_4,3.4 ||
pratiyoddhā mukundo vā tasmin vā prekṣake sthite |
yadi na tvaṃ samarāt parāñcasi || RBhrs_4,3.6 ||
śrīdāmnaś ca bakī-dviṣaś ca samarāṭopaḥ paṭīyān abhūt || RBhrs_4,3.7 ||
tathādya laguḍaṃ kramād bhramayati sma dāmā kṛtī |

tathā ca hari-vaṃśe--
tathā gāṇḍīva-dhanvānaṃ vikrīḍan madhusūdanaḥ |
jigāya bharata-śreṣṭhaṃ kuntyāḥ pramukhato vibhuḥ || RBhrs_4,3.10 || iti |
pratiyodha-sthitāḥ santo bhavanty uddīpanā iha || RBhrs_4,3.11 ||
jitvā dāmodara yudhi vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ katthitāni |
mandradhvāno naṭati nikaṭe stokakṛṣṇaḥ kalāpī || RBhrs_4,3.12 ||
divyārgalā pratibhaṭas trapate bhujo me || RBhrs_4,3.15 ||
sudāmnaḥ sotkaṇṭhaṃ jayati muhur āhopuruṣikā || RBhrs_4,3.16 ||
jigīṣā stheyasī yuddhe sā yuddhotsāha īryate || RBhrs_4,3.18 ||
mā tvaṃ bhaiṣīḥ kṣudra re bhadrasena |
hareḥ pramadam ekakaḥ samiti bhadraseno vyadhāt || RBhrs_4,3.21 ||
sāhāyyam atra subalaḥ kurute balī cej
suhṛd eva pratibhaṭo vīre kṛṣṇasya na tvariḥ |
sa bhakta-kṣobha-kāritvād raudre tv ālambano rase |
rāgābhāvo dṛg-ādīnāṃ raudrād asya vibhedakaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.24 ||
dvi-vidho dāna-vīraḥ syād ekas tatra bahu-pradaḥ |
sahasā dīyate yena svayaṃ sarvasvam apy uta |
dāmodarasya saukhyāya procyate sa bahu-pradaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.26 ||
pragāḍhā stheyasī ditsā dānotsāha itīryate || RBhrs_4,3.29 ||
dvidhā bahu-prado 'py eṣa vidvadbhir iha kathyate |
syād ābhyudayikas tv ekaḥ paras tat-sampradānakaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.30 ||
arthibhyo brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ sa ābhyudāyiko bhavet || RBhrs_4,3.31 ||
iti nijagadur uccair bhūsurā yena tṛptāḥ || RBhrs_4,3.32 ||
sarvasvaṃ dīyate yena sa syāt tat-sampradānakaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.33 ||
tad-dānaṃ prīti-pūjābhyāṃ bhaved ity uditaṃ dvidhā || RBhrs_4,3.34 ||
prīti-dānaṃ tu tasmai yad dadyād bandhv-ādi-rūpiṇe || RBhrs_4,3.35 ||
dattvā rājyaṃ kuṭumbaṃ svam api bhagavate ditsur apy anyad uccair
deyaṃ kutrāpy adṛṣṭvā makha-sadasi tadā vyākulaḥ pāṇḍavo 'bhūt || RBhrs_4,3.36 ||
pujā-dānaṃ tu tasmai yad vipra-rūpāya dīyate || RBhrs_4,3.37 ||
sa eva viṣṇur varado 'stu vā paro
dāsyāmy amuṣmai kṣitim īpsitāṃ mune || RBhrs_4,3.38 ||
balinaiva sa yenāsya bhikṣā-pātrīkṛtaḥ karaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.39 ||
hariṇā dīyamāno 'pi sārṣṭy-ādis tuṣyatā varaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.40 ||
atra sañcāritā bhūmnā dhṛter eva samīkṣyate || RBhrs_4,3.42 ||
tyāgecchā tādṛśī prauḍhā tyāgotsāha itīryate || RBhrs_4,3.43 ||
svāmin kṛtārtho 'smi varaṃ na yāce || RBhrs_4,3.44 ||
kiṃ vānyad arpita-bhayaṃ bhruva unnayais te |
dhuryādīnāṃ tṛtīyasya vīrasya padavīṃ vrajet || RBhrs_4,3.46 ||
āśvāsanoktayaḥ sthairyam ity ādyās tatra vikriyāḥ |
autsukyam atiharṣādyā jñeyāḥ sañcāriṇo budhaiḥ || RBhrs_4,3.49 ||
vande kuṭmalitāñjalir muhur ahaṃ vīraṃ mayūra-dhvajaṃ
sollāsaṃ krakacena dāritam abhūt patnī-sutābhyāṃ śivaḥ || RBhrs_4,3.51 ||
hareś cet tattva-vijñānaṃ naivāsya ghaṭate dayā |
tad-abhāve tv asau dāna-vīre 'ntar-bhavati sphuṭam || RBhrs_4,3.52 ||
kṛtātra dvija-rūpe ca bhaktis tenāsya bhaktatā || RBhrs_4,3.53 ||
vopadevādayo dhīrā vīram ācakṣate tridhā || RBhrs_4,3.54 ||
prāyeṇa dhīra-śāntas tu dharma-vīraḥ sa ucyate || RBhrs_4,3.55 ||
dharmaikābhiniveśas tu dharmotsāho mataḥ satām || RBhrs_4,3.57 ||
dhyātvendrādy-āśrayatvena yad eṣv āhutir arpyate || RBhrs_4,3.59 ||
ayaṃ tu sākṣāt tasyaiva nideśāt kurute makhān |
dharma-vīraṃ na manyante katicid dhanikādayaḥ* || RBhrs_4,3.61 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhāv uttara-vibhāge
vīra-bhakti-rasa-nirūpaṇe adbhuta-bhakti-rasa-laharī tṛtīyā ||
ātmocitair vibhāvādyair nītā puṣṭiṃ satāṃ hṛdi |
bhavec choka-ratir bhakti-raso hi karuṇābhidhaḥ || RBhrs_4,4.1 ||
aniṣṭāpteḥ padatayā vedyaḥ kṛṣṇo 'sya ca priyaḥ || RBhrs_4,4.2 ||
ity asya viṣayatvena jñeyā ālambanās tridhā || RBhrs_4,4.3 ||
tat-tad-vedī ca tad-bhakta āśrayatvena ca tridhā |
uktā śoka-ratiḥ saiva sthāyī bhāva ihocyate || RBhrs_4,4.7 ||
viṣam agatim avasthāṃ goṣṭha-rājasya rājñī || RBhrs_4,4.9 ||
nīlāmbarasya vaktrendur nīlimānaṃ muhur dadhe || RBhrs_4,4.10 ||
sa devarṣir muktān api tanu-bhṛtaḥ śocati bhṛśam || RBhrs_4,4.11 ||
mātar mādri gatā kutas tvam adhunā hā kvāsi pāṇḍo pitaḥ
sāndrānanda-sudhābdhir eṣa yuvayor nābhūd dṛśāṃ gocaraḥ |
ity uccair nakulānujo vilapati prekṣya pramodākulo
ratiṃ vināpi ghaṭate hāsyāder udgamaḥ kvacit |
kadācid api śokasya nāsya sambhāvanā bhavet || RBhrs_4,4.13 ||
rater bhūmnā kraśimnā ca śoko bhūyān kṛśaś ca saḥ |
ratyā sahāvinā-bhāvāt kāpy etasya viśiṣṭatā || RBhrs_4,4.14 ||
ataḥ prādurbhavan śoko labdhāpy udbhaṭatāṃ muhuḥ |
durūhām eva tanute gatiṃ saukhyasya kām api || RBhrs_4,4.16 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhāv uttara-vibhāge
gauṇa-bhakti-rasa-nirūpaṇe karuṇa-bhakti-rasa-laharī caturthī ||
kṛṣṇo hito 'hitaś ceti krodhasya viṣayas tridhā |
bhaktāḥ sarva-vidhā eva hite caivāhite tathā || RBhrs_4,5.2 ||
sakhī-krodhe bhavet sakhyāḥ kṛṣṇād atyāhite sati || RBhrs_4,5.3 ||
antaḥ-kleśa-kalaṅkitāḥ kila vayaṃ yāmo 'dya yāmyāṃ purīṃ
hā medhāvini rādhike tava kathaṃ premā garīyān abhūt || RBhrs_4,5.4 ||
krodho jaratyā vadhv-ādi-sambandhe prekṣite harau || RBhrs_4,5.5 ||
are yuvati-taskara prakaṭam eva vadhvāḥ paṭas
tavorasi nirīkṣyate bata na neti kiṃ jalpasi |
aho vraja-nivāsinaḥ śṛṇuta kiṃ na vikrośanaṃ
sarveṣām eva govinde ratiḥ prauḍhā virājate || RBhrs_4,5.7 ||
hitas tridhānavahitaḥ sāhasī cerṣyur ity api || RBhrs_4,5.8 ||
kvacit tatra pramatto yaḥ prokto 'navahito 'tra saḥ || RBhrs_4,5.9 ||
yaḥ prerako bhaya-sthāne sāhasī sa nigadyate || RBhrs_4,5.11 ||
ahitaḥ syād dvidhā svasya hareś ceti prabhedataḥ || RBhrs_4,5.15 ||
ahitaḥ svasya sa syād yaḥ kṛṣṇa-sambandha-bādhakaḥ || RBhrs_4,5.16 ||
iti uttuṅgā mama madhu-pure yātrayā tatra tāsāṃ
ahitas tu hares tasya vairi-pakṣo nigadyate || RBhrs_4,5.18 ||
trir asya mukuṭopari sphuṭam udīrya savyaṃ padam || RBhrs_4,5.19 ||
kṛṣṇāhita-hitasthāḥ syur amī uddīpanā iha || RBhrs_4,5.20 ||
atra stambhādayaḥ sarve prākaṭyaṃ yānti sāttvikāḥ || RBhrs_4,5.23 ||
atra krodha-ratiḥ sthāyī sa tu krodhas tridhā mataḥ |
kopo manyus tathā roṣas tatra kopas tu śatru-gaḥ || RBhrs_4,5.25 ||
roṣas tu dayite strīṇām ato vyabhicaraty asau || RBhrs_4,5.26 ||
dṛg-anta-pāṭalatvādyā roṣe tu kathitāḥ kriyāḥ || RBhrs_4,5.27 ||
mṛdhe magadha-bhūpatau kim api vaktram ākrośati |
{*Three syllables missing in the last line. Copyist error or typo?}
krośantyāṃ kara-pallavena balavān sadyaḥ pidhatte mukhaṃ
dhāvantyāṃ bhaya-bhāji vistṛta-bhujo rundhe puraḥ paddhatim |
pādānte viluṭhaty asau mayi muhur daṣṭādharāyāṃ ruṣā
mātaś caṇḍi mayā śikhaṇḍa-mukuṭād ātmābhirakṣyaḥ katham || RBhrs_4,5.29 ||
tava girā jaṭile niṭile ca me |
kuṭena māṃ tad api vañcayate vadhūṭī || RBhrs_4,5.31 ||
asmin na tādṛśo manyau vartate raty-anugrahaḥ |
krodho rati-vinābhāvān na bhakti-rasatāṃ vrajet || RBhrs_4,5.33 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhāv uttara-vibhāge
gauṇa-bhakti-rasa-nirūpaṇe raudra-bhakti-rasa-laharī pañcamī ||
kṛṣṇaś ca dāruṇāś ceti tasminn ālambanā dvidhā |
anukampyeṣu sāgassu kṛṣṇas tasya ca bandhuṣu || RBhrs_4,6.2 ||
darśanāc chravaṇāc ceti smaraṇāc ca prakīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_4,6.3 ||
kiṃ śuṣyad-vadano 'pi muñca khacitaṃ citte pṛthuṃ vepathuṃ
viśvasya prakṛtiṃ bhajasva na manāg apy asti mantuṃ tava |
uṣma-mrakṣitam ṛkṣa-rāja rabhasād vistīrya vīryaṃ tvayā
pṛthvī pratyuta yuddha-kautuka-mayī sevaiva me nirmitā || RBhrs_4,6.4 ||
mura-mathana puras te ko bhujaṅgas tapasvī
laghu-haram iti kārṣīr mā sma dīnāya manyum |
aśaraṇam atimūḍhaṃ rakṣa rakṣa prasīda || RBhrs_4,6.5 ||
vapur atipuruṣaṃ yā ghoram āviścakāra || RBhrs_4,6.8 ||
krośanādyāḥ kriyāś cātra sāttvikāś cāśru-varjitāḥ || RBhrs_4,6.10 ||
asmin bhagna-ratiḥ sthāyī bhāvaḥ syād aparādhataḥ |
bhīṣaṇebhyaś ca tatra syād bahudhaivāparādhitā || RBhrs_4,6.12 ||
taj-jā bhīr nāparatra syād anugrāhya-janān vinā |
ākṛtyā ye prakṛtyā ye ye prabhāveṇa bhīṣaṇāḥ || RBhrs_4,6.13 ||
sadā bhagavato bhītiṃ gatā ātyantikīm api |
kaṃsādyā rati-śūnyatvād atra nālambanā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,6.16 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhāv uttara-vibhāge
gauṇa-bhakti-rasa-nirūpaṇe bhayānaka-bhakti-rasa-laharī ṣaṣṭhī ||
asau bhakti-raso dhīrair bībhatsākhya itīryate || RBhrs_4,7.1 ||
asminn āśrita-śāntādyā dhīrair ālambanā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,7.2 ||
citraṃ so 'yam udīrayan hari-guṇān udbāṣpa-dṛṣṭir jano
dṛṣṭe strī-vadane vikūṇita-mukho viṣṭabhya niṣṭhīvati || RBhrs_4,7.3 ||
jugupsā-ratir atra syāt sthāyī sā ca vivekajā |
prāyikī ceti kathitā jugupsā dvi-vidhā budhaiḥ || RBhrs_4,7.6 ||
vivekotthā tu dehādau jugupsā syād vivekajā || RBhrs_4,7.7 ||
bhagavati hanta rater lave 'py udīrṇe || RBhrs_4,7.8 ||
yā prāyo jāyate seyaṃ jugupsā prāyikī matā || RBhrs_4,7.9 ||
vasann eṣa klinno jaḍa-tanur ahaṃ mātur udare |
tad asmin kaṃsāre kuru mayi kṛpā-sāgara kṛpām || RBhrs_4,7.10 ||
kṣiptās te smṛtim ākalayya naraka-dhvaṃsinn iha prāṇimaḥ || RBhrs_4,7.11 ||
labdha-kṛṣṇa-rater eva suṣṭhu pūtaṃ manaḥ sadā |
kṣubhyaty ahṛdy aleśe 'pi tato 'syāṃ raty-anugrahaḥ || RBhrs_4,7.12 ||
prācāṃ matānusāreṇa tad vijñeyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ || RBhrs_4,7.13 ||
amī pañcaiva śāntādyā harer bhakti-rasā matāḥ |
eṣu hāsyādayaḥ prāyo bibhrati vyabhicāritām || RBhrs_4,7.14 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhāv uttara-vibhāge
gauṇa-bhakti-rasa-nirūpaṇe bībhatsa-bhakti-rasa-laharī saptamī ||
mitratvaṃ śātravatvaṃ ca rasānām abhidhīyate || RBhrs_4,8.1 ||
adbhutaś caiṣa prītādiṣu catuḥṣv api || RBhrs_4,8.2 ||
dviṣann asya śucir yuddhavīro raudro bhayānakaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.3 ||
vairī śucir yuddha-vīro raudraś caika-vibhāvakaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.4 ||
preyasas tu śucir hāsyo yuddha-vīraḥ suhṛd-varāḥ |
dviṣo vatsala-bībhatsa-raudrā bhīṣmaś ca pūrvavat || RBhrs_4,8.5 ||
śatruḥ śucir yuddha-vīraḥ prīto raudraś ca pūrvavat || RBhrs_4,8.6 ||
śucer hāsyas tathā preyān suhṛd asya prakīrtitaḥ |
prāhur eke 'sya suhṛdaṃ vīra-yugmaṃ pare ripum || RBhrs_4,8.7 ||
mitraṃ hāsyasya bībhatsaḥ śuciḥ preyān savatsalaḥ |
pratipakṣas tu karuṇas tathā prokto bhayānakaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.8 ||
adbhutasya suhṛd vīraḥ pañca śāntādayas tathā |
pratipakṣo bhaved asya raudro bībhatsa eva ca || RBhrs_4,8.9 ||
vīrasya tv adbhuto hāsyaḥ preyān prītis tathā suhṛt |
bhayānako vipakṣo 'sya kasyacic chānta eva ca || RBhrs_4,8.10 ||
vairī hāsyo 'sya sambhoga-śṛṅgāraś cādbhutas tathā || RBhrs_4,8.11 ||
raudrasya karuṇaḥ prokto vīraś cāpi suhṛd-varaḥ |
pratipakṣas tu hāsye 'sya śṛṅgāro bhīṣaṇo 'pi ca || RBhrs_4,8.12 ||
bībhatsasya bhavec chānto hāsyaḥ prītis tathā suhṛt |
śatruḥ śucis tathā preyān jñeyā yuktyā pare ca te || RBhrs_4,8.14 ||
kathitebhyaḥ pare ye syus te taṭasthāḥ satāṃ matāḥ || RBhrs_4,8.15 ||
suhṛdā miśraṇāṃ samyag āsvādaṃ kurute rasam || RBhrs_4,8.16 ||
dvayos tu miśraṇe sāmyaṃ duḥśakaṃ syāt tulā-dhṛtam |
tasmād aṅgāṅgi-bhāvena melanaṃ viduṣāṃ matam || RBhrs_4,8.17 ||
bhaven mukhyo 'tha vā gauṇo raso 'ṅgī kila yatra yaḥ |
kartavyaṃ tatra tasyāṅgaṃ suhṛd eva raso budhaiḥ || RBhrs_4,8.18 ||
aṅgatāṃ yatra suhṛdo mukhyā gauṇāś ca bibhrati || RBhrs_4,8.19 ||
tasya padāmbuja-yugalaṃ kiṃ vā saṃvāhayiṣyāmi || RBhrs_4,8.20 ||
atra mukhya eva mukhyasya gauṇayoś ca |
yas tu dṛṣṭyā padminīnām api suṣṭhu hṛṇīyate || RBhrs_4,8.24 ||
na tṛpyati na sarvataḥ sukha-maye samādhāv api |
na siddhiṣu ca lālasāṃ vahati labhyamānāsv api
prabho tava padārcane param upaiti tṛṣṇāṃ manaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.25 ||
adharaṃ piñcha-cūḍasya calāś culūkayanti yāḥ || RBhrs_4,8.26 ||
dṛśos taralitair alaṃ vraja nivṛtya mugdhe vrajaṃ
vitarkayasi māṃ yathā na hi tathāsmi kiṃ bhūriṇā |
vatsān avati vatso me hanta santapyate manaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.29 ||
putras te navanīta-piṇḍam atanuṃ muṣṇan mamāntar-gṛhād
ity uktā kula-vṛddhayā suta-mukhe dṛṣṭiṃ vibhugna-bhruṇi
smerāṃ nikṣipatī sadā bhavatu vaḥ kṣemāya goṣṭheśvarī || RBhrs_4,8.30 ||
kevale vatsale nāsti mukhyasya khalu sauhṛdam |
ato 'tra vatsale tasya natarāṃ likhitāṅgatā || RBhrs_4,8.32 ||
sandeśam arpayati tanvi mad-artham eva || RBhrs_4,8.33 ||
svasāsmi tava nirdaye paricinoṣi na tvaṃ kutaḥ
kṛtaṃ smitam abhijñayā guru-puras tadā rādhayā || RBhrs_4,8.34 ||
smara-smerām ārād dṛśam asakalām arpayati ca |
bhujām aṃse sakhyuḥ pulakini dadhānaḥ phani-nibhām
tenaiṣām aṅgitā vyaktā mukhyānāṃ ca tathāṅgatā |
tathāpy alpa-viśeṣāya kiñcid eva vilikhyate || RBhrs_4,8.36 ||
māṃ yoddhuṃ milasi puraḥ kathaṃ viśāla |
śrīdāmā gaṇayati re tvam atra ko 'si || RBhrs_4,8.38 ||
yaṣṭyā durbalayā vijitya purataḥ solluṇṭham udgāyataḥ |
kṛṣṇaḥ phulla-kapolakaḥ pulakavān visphāra-dṛṣṭir babhau || RBhrs_4,8.40 ||
evam anyasya gauṇasya jñeyā kavibhir aṅgitā |
tathā ca mukhya-gauṇānāṃ rasānām aṅgatāpi ca || RBhrs_4,8.41 ||
so 'ṅgī sarvātigo yaḥ syān mukhyo gauṇo 'thavā rasaḥ |
sa evāṅgaṃ bhaved aṅgi-poṣī sañcāritāṃ vrajan || RBhrs_4,8.42 ||
eka eva bhavet sthāyī raso mukhyatamo hi yaḥ |
rasās tad-anuyāyitvād anye syur vyabhicāriṇaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.43 ||
rasānāṃ samavetānāṃ yasya rūpaṃ bhaved bahu |
sa mantavyo rasaḥ sthāyī śeṣāḥ saṅcāriṇo matāḥ || RBhrs_4,8.44 ||
puṣṇan nija-prabhuṃ mukhyaṃ gauṇas tatraiva līyate || RBhrs_4,8.45 ||
kuñcatā nija-nāthena gauṇo 'py aṅgitvam aśnute || RBhrs_4,8.46 ||
mukhyas tv aṅgatvam āsādya puṣṇann indram upendravat |
bhāty eva na tu līnaḥ syād eṣa sañcāri-gauṇavat || RBhrs_4,8.48 ||
aṅgī mukhyaḥ svam atrāṅgair bhāvais tair abhivardhayan |
sajātīyair vijātīyaiḥ svatantraḥ san virājate || RBhrs_4,8.49 ||
yasya mukhyasya yo bhakto bhaven nitya-nijāśrayaḥ |
aṅgī sa eva tatra syān mukhyo 'py anyo 'ṅgatāṃ vrajet || RBhrs_4,8.50 ||
tad vinā tasya sampāto vaiphalyāyaiva kalpate || RBhrs_4,8.51 ||
janayaty eva vairasyaṃ rasānāṃ vairiṇā yutiḥ |
śiraḥ kṛṣṇa tavāghrāya vihariṣye tatas tvayā || RBhrs_4,8.56 ||
adyaiva dūti tena tvaṃ mayā ramaya mādhavam || RBhrs_4,8.58 ||
ciraṃ jīveti saṃyujya kācid āśīrbhir acyutam |
kvacid bhavet tataḥ suṣṭhu vairasyāyaiva kalpate || RBhrs_4,8.60 ||
smaryamāṇatayāpy uktau sāmyena vacane 'pi ca || RBhrs_4,8.63 ||
ity ādiṣu na vairasyaṃ vairiṇo janayed yutiḥ || RBhrs_4,8.64 ||
tatra ekatarasya bādhyatvena varṇane, yathā vidagdha-mādhave (2.18)--
pratyāhṛtya muniḥ kṣaṇaṃ viṣayato yasmin mano dhitsate
bālāsau viṣayeṣu dhitsati tataḥ pratyāharantī manaḥ |
yasya sphūrti-lavāya hanta hṛdaye yogī sumutkaṇṭhate
mugdheyaṃ kila tasya paśya hṛdayān niṣkrāntim ākāṅkṣati || RBhrs_4,8.65 ||
bādhyatvam atra śāntasya śucer utkarṣa-varṇanāt || RBhrs_4,8.66 ||
sukhātmā bhavatī rādhe brahma-vidyeva rājate || RBhrs_4,8.68 ||
rādhā śāntir ivonnidraṃ nirnimeṣekṣaṇaṃ ca mām |
kurvatī dhyāna-lagnaṃ ca vāsayaty adri-kandare || RBhrs_4,8.69 ||
yā te padābja-makarandam ajighratī strī || RBhrs_4,8.71 ||
tatrāsmākaṃ yad-avadhi sakhe dṛṣṭir eṣā niviṣṭā |
satyaṃ brūmas tad-avadhi bhaved indum indīvaraṃ ca
saṅgatiḥ kila mukhyasya vairasyāyaiva jāyate || RBhrs_4,8.74 ||
yāmi kāśya-gṛhaṃ yūnā manaḥ śyāmena me hṛtam || RBhrs_4,8.75 ||
sadānandaṃ paraṃ brahma dṛṣṭyā seviṣyate mayā || RBhrs_4,8.76 ||
aṅgayor aṅginaḥ puṣṭyai bhaved ekatra saṅgatiḥ || RBhrs_4,8.78 ||
gariṣṭho 'yaṃ keśī girivad iti me vellati manaḥ |
khalaṃ kṣundan kuryāṃ vrajam atitarāṃ śālinam aham || RBhrs_4,8.79 ||

yathā--
kamprā svedini cūrṇa-kuntala-taṭe ity ādi (BRS 4.8.31) || RBhrs_4,8.80 ||
mitho vairāv api dvau yau bhāvau dharma-sutādiṣu |
kālādi-bhedat prākaṭyaṃ tau vindantau na duṣyataḥ || RBhrs_4,8.81 ||
na syād ity ujjvale rādhā-kṛṣṇayor darśitaṃ purā || RBhrs_4,8.82 ||
daityācāryās tad-āsye vikṛtim aruṇatāṃ malla-varyāḥ sakhāyo
gaṇḍaunnatyaṃ khaleśāḥ pralayam ṛṣigaṇā dhyāna-muṣṇāsram ambāḥ |
romāñcaṃ sāṃyugīnāḥ kam api nava-camatkāram antaḥ sureśā
lāsyaṃ dāsāḥ kaṭākṣaṃ yayur asita-dṛśaḥ prekṣya raṅge mukundam || RBhrs_4,8.84 ||
svasmin dhūrye 'py amānī śiśuṣu gari-dhṛtāv udyateṣu smitāsyas
thūtkārī dadhni visre praṇayiṣu vivṛta-prauḍhir indre 'ruṇākṣaḥ |
goṣṭhe sāśrur vidūne guruṣu hari-makhaṃ prāsya kampaḥ sa pāyād
āsāre sphāra-dṛṣṭir yuvatiṣu pulakī bibhrad adriṃ vibhur vaḥ || RBhrs_4,8.85 ||

iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhāv uttara-vibhāge
rasānāṃ maitrī-vaira-sthiti-nāmnī laharī aṣṭamī ||
rasā eva rasābhāsā rasa-jñair anukīrtitāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.1 ||
syus tridhoparasāś cānu-rasāś cāparasāś ca te |
uttamā madhyamāḥ proktāḥ kaniṣṭhāś cety amī kramāt || RBhrs_4,9.2 ||
śāntādayo rasā eva dvādaśoparasā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.3 ||
tathā bībhatsa-bhūmādeḥ śānto hy uparaso bhavet || RBhrs_4,9.4 ||
sukhaṃ dṛṣṭe tad evādya purāṇa-puruṣe tvayi || RBhrs_4,9.5 ||
tvāṃ vinā kim api nāparam asti || RBhrs_4,9.6 ||
dvayor ekatarasyaiva ratir yā khalu dṛśyate |
yān ekatra tathaikasya sthāyinaḥ sā virūpatā |
ahnāya kāpi gaitri aṅkuritām ayāsīt || RBhrs_4,9.14 ||
etasyāḥ prāg-abhāve tu śucir noparaso bhavet || RBhrs_4,9.15 ||
nāyikāsv apy anekāsu vadanty uparasaṃ śucim || RBhrs_4,9.17 ||
latā-paśu-pulindīṣu vṛddhāsv api sa vartate || RBhrs_4,9.18 ||
ratim iha pallavitāṃ hṛdi vyanakti || RBhrs_4,9.19 ||
harer dṛk-cāpalaṃ vīkṣya sahajaṃ yā vighūrṇate || RBhrs_4,9.21 ||
kailāsa-vāsinīṃ dāsīṃ kṛpā-dṛṣṭyā bhajasva mām || RBhrs_4,9.27 ||
kaṭī-kaṇḍūtir ity ādyaṃ grāmyatvaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ || RBhrs_4,9.28 ||
kiṃ naḥ phaṇi-kiśorīṇāṃ tvaṃ puṣkara-sadāṃ sadā |
prakaṭa-prārthanādiḥ syāt sambhogādes tu dhṛṣṭatā || RBhrs_4,9.30 ||
tvaṃ vidagdho 'si govinda kiṃ vā vācyam ataḥ param || RBhrs_4,9.31 ||
evam eva tu gauṇānāṃ hāsādīnām api svayam |
rasā hāsyādayaḥ sapta śāntaś cānurasā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.33 ||
evam evātra vijñeyā vīrāder apy udāhṛtiḥ || RBhrs_4,9.36 ||
aṣṭāv amī taṭastheṣu prākaṭyaṃ yadi bibhrati |
hāsādīnāṃ tadā te 'tra prājñair aparasā matāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.38 ||
kṛṣṇam ārāj jarāsandhaḥ solluṇṭham ahasīn muhuḥ || RBhrs_4,9.39 ||
uttamās tu rasābhāsāḥ kaiścid rasatayoditāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.40 ||
bhāvāḥ sarve tad-ābhāsā rasābhāsāś ca kecana |
amī prokta-rasābhijñaiḥ sarve 'pi rasanād rasāḥ || RBhrs_4,9.41 ||
iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau gauṇa-bhakti-rasa-nirūpaṇo nāma caturtho vibhāgaḥ samāptaḥ |
